entries.name: 4. Dangerous Shrubbery
entries: 一个20英尺高的干燥壁架（4a区）俯瞰着一个30英尺高的洞穴，里面充满了植被和脚踝深的泥浆（4b区）。这个区域的特点如下。
{@b Vegetation}. 发光的、类似蕨类的植物从泥土中萌发出来，使这个区域充满了昏暗的光线。
{@b Severed Limb}. 壁架墙的一部分被血染红了。在污点的正下方，一条穿着结实靴子的断腿从泥地里伸出来。

entries.name: 4a. Final Rest of Thubid Duskaxe
entries: 这个20英尺高的壁架可以通过成功的DC15力量({@skill Athletics})检查爬上去。在壁架上，在血迹的上方，但从隧道的地面上看不到，一个二哥的尸体躺在一个营地附近。尸体是图比德-杜斯卡克斯（Thubid Duskaxe）的，他是一个正在执行救援任务的杜尔加冒险家。他在与晃动的土丘搏斗时失去了一条腿，随后流血过多而死。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 尸体背着一个皮革挎包，里面有224戈比，一个华丽的猫头鹰石雕（50戈比），还有一本用矮人语写的日记。日记里有一张地图，显示了1到6号区域，以及关于 "东北方向有青蛙人 "和 "东南方向有带邪恶魔法的蛇 "的说明。日记描述了图比德的计划，即寻找盟友帮助他拯救他的表妹阿戈拉，她 "被大蛇迷惑了"。

entries.name: 4b. Shambling Mounds
entries: Any character who succeeds on a DC 12 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check is not {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} when three {@creature Shambling Mound||shambling mounds} attack. The shambling mounds chase creatures through the mud but ignore creatures atop the ledge.

entries.name: 5. Dry Cave
entries: 这个干燥的、20英尺高的洞穴空空如也，是本层休息的好地方。

entries.name: 6. Reflections
entries: 这个沼泽的洞穴有一个50英尺高的锯齿状岩石天花板。从泥沼中升起的是一个干枯的岩石岛，上面有以下特征。
{@b Ruins and Statue}. 在黑石建造的穹顶废墟中，有一尊闭着眼睛的蛇吞下自己的尾巴的雕像。
{@b Apparition}. 一个冒险者的鬼影在这个地区移动，看起来很迷茫。

The ghostly image of a male human warrior in plate armor wanders around the statue as though searching for something he has lost. The image cannot be harmed and does not acknowledge the characters. If a character dies on this level, the image changes to appear as that character, even if the character is later raised from the dead. A {@spell dispel magic} spell that targets the image causes it to disappear for 1 hour.

A successful DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Religion}) check suggests that the statue is a representation of Dendar the Night Serpent, the yuan-ti god of nightmares. Any character who touches the statue is cursed. Until the curse is ended with a {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic, the character is beset by nightmares and gains no benefit from a long rest.

entries.name: 7. Warded Cavern
entries: 一个{@spell glyph of warding}的咒语被施加在10英尺高的洞穴中心的地板上。当除卡斯提斯以外的任何生物经过洞穴的中点时，该石刻会触发一个{@spell cloudkill}的咒语（保存DC15）。咒语的云层持续10分钟。

entries.name: 8. Dweomercore Hideout
entries: Dweomercore（{@adventure level 9|WDMM|9}）的法师们用这些洞穴来监视他们的邻居。山洞里的居民包括一个叫卡斯提斯的法师。

If death or capture seems likely, Karstis grabs his spellbook in area 8b and flees to {@adventure level 9|WDMM|9} after instructing his bodyguards to cover his escape. Thereafter, Karstis can be encountered in area 8c on level 9.

entries.name: 8a. Guards

entries: {@b Golem}. 在这个10英尺高的洞穴中间，有一个{@creature flesh golem}站岗，面对入口。
{@b Wights}. 两个（1%）在洞穴的南端（8b区外）守卫。
{@b Crates}. 在最西边的凹室里存放着三个打开的箱子。里面有羊皮纸、小罐墨水、鹅毛笔、10天的食用口粮和5桶2加仑的干净水。

If the glyph in {@area area 7|463|x} triggers, the flesh golem and the wights can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}. The golem was crafted by Wormriddle the night hag (see {@area level 9|501|x}). If the golem goes berserk, neither Karstis nor any of his other servants can regain control of it.

entries.name: 8b. Karstis's Cave
entries: Karstis (LE male Mulhorandi human {@creature mage}) lurks here with four {@creature Minotaur Skeleton||minotaur skeletons}. The 10-foot-high cave is lit by a hooded lantern that rests on a portable writing desk covered in quills, ink jars, and books. A folding cot rests near the back wall.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Amid the clutter on the desk, characters can find Karstis's spellbook. The book is bound in human flesh and contains all the spells Karstis has prepared, plus {@spell animate dead} and {@spell glyph of warding}.

entries.name: 9. Temple of the Great Snake
entries: 这个30英尺高的洞穴以一个废墟为主，其中包含以下内容。
{@b Carvings}. 内部墙壁上布满了蛇的雕刻，有獠牙的大嘴，还有张开的双眼。
{@b Black Statue}. 寺庙的西北部有一座黑色的石像，是一个戴着面具、戴着头罩的男性人形，身穿皮甲，双手紧握着一把滴水的匕首。无害的蜈蚣在雕像上爬来爬去。
{@b Green Statue}. 中间的密室里有一座绿石雕刻的雕像，描绘了一条15英尺高的带翅膀的蛇，它呲着獠牙。无害的蛇在雕像的底座周围蜿蜒。
{@b Ghost}. Wandering through the ruin is a spectral woman wearing a soiled black gown and a featureless white mask (actually the {@creature ghost} of a slain yuan-ti priest).
一位名叫尤斯塔尔（Yoastal）的元老级纯血祭司被塞特希恩（Ssethian Scourges）所杀，至今仍被束缚在神庙中。因为她不能离开，所以她试图欺骗别人来完成她未完成的事业，因为她知道在塞特西恩祸害死之前她不能休息。
尤斯塔尔对冒险者来说既是朋友又是敌人。这个鬼魂声称自己曾经是面具教士，被诅咒要留在史莱姆沼泽，直到纳迦人被消灭。她向人物提供关卡的布局，以换取释放她的承诺。但她的信息总是偏向于将角色带入可能进一步升级塞西恩祸害和黑顿格之间战争的情况。
如果尤斯塔尔在任何一个纳迦人活着的时候被摧毁，她会在{@dice 1d4}天后在这个被毁坏的建筑中重新形成。

entries.name: Black Statue
entries: Water trickling down from the ceiling falls onto this statue and drips off its daggers like poison. A character who succeeds on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Religion}) check recognizes the statue as a representation of the yuan-ti god Sseth.

A character who searches through the mud around the statue and succeeds on a DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check discovers a rotting sack and also digs up a hostile {@b {@creature swarm of insects} (centipedes)}.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 麻袋里有550戈比。

entries.name: Green Statue
entries: A character who succeeds on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Religion}) check recognizes this statue as another representation of Sseth.

entries.name: 10. Rainfall Caverns
entries: Water pours from the ceiling of these 20-foot-high caves like a heavy rain. Consequently, creatures in this area have disadvantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight or sound.

entries.name: 10a. Venom Pool
entries: 这个洞穴被淹没到4英尺深。水围绕着一颗躺在洞穴中央地板上的绿宝石发着绿光。这颗宝石被Sseth祝福过，使它周围的水变成了毒药。任何在水中开始的生物都必须进行DC12宪法救赎，救赎失败会受到11({@dice 2d10})的毒害，救赎成功则会受到一半的伤害。离开洞穴的水不再是有毒的，一旦绿宝石被移除，洞穴中的水也不再是有毒的。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 有缺陷的绿宝石如果从这里拿走就会失去魔力，价值250金币。

entries.name: 10b. Hissing Stone
entries: 在这个洞穴的中央，一块大石头耸立在3英尺深的水面上，神奇地发出柔和的嘶嘶声。这块石头的天然图案隐约像一群蛇。
触摸石头的人物会听到一个咝咝的低语，让他大声问问题。如果该角色这样做了，声音就会回答，就像该角色施了{@spell augury}的法术一样。一旦石头以这种方式被使用，直到下一个黎明前都不能再次使用。

entries.name: 11. Watch Post
entries: 这片区域由塞西恩祸害的王室成员守卫，以抵御来自布莱克顿古族的可能攻击。

entries.name: 11a. Flooded Cave
entries: 这个20英尺高的洞穴被泥水淹没，深度为3英尺。11b区的乌鸦会攻击他们发现的在这个洞穴中移动的入侵者。

entries.name: 11b. Watchers in the Dark
entries: Dry land rises gently out of the water to create a broad ledge dotted with 4-foot-high piles of loose rocks. Two {@creature Drow Elite Warrior||drow elite warriors}, a female named Dirzanna Freth and a male named Arachnafein Zaphrorzza, hide behind the rocks. These drow are under the effect of the spirit nagas' {@item rod of rulership} and move to the swamp's edge to attack intruders detected in area 11a. If enemies close to melee range, the drow switch to melee weapons.

If one drow elite warrior falls in battle, the other tries to flee to area 13 and alert the creatures there. The drow have orders from the spirit nagas to capture intruders if possible, meaning that any character reduced to 0 hit points by a drow's melee weapon attack is knocked {@condition unconscious}. Characters captured by the drow are brought before the nagas in {@area area 15|479|x}.
如果当他们身上的{@condition charmed}条件结束时，Dirzanna和Arachnafein就会在{@adventure level 12|WDMM|12}上前往Freth之家的基地。

entries.name: 12. Fishery
entries: 这个小山洞有10英尺高的天花板，里面有一个20英尺深的水池，底部有一个裂缝，冷水从天然泉水中冒出来。塞斯提安祸害的侍卫利用在这里游动的看不见的洞穴鱼作为食物来源。

entries.name: 13. Detention Cave
entries: A male {@creature drow elite warrior} named Xirk Dezpeti'il is chained to one of three sets of manacles that hang from the west wall. The nagas use the manacles to bind creatures that resist the magic of their {@item rod of rulership}.
Xirk曾是一名冒险家，也是一名不知悔改的无赖，他不与任何人结盟，他愿意用周围洞穴的信息或王室成员的日常活动来换取返回地下世界的自由。如果他被释放了，他就会避免战斗，并且不惜从他的恩人那里偷东西。

entries.name: 14. Fungal Farm
entries: 两条隧道通向这个潮湿的、10英尺高的洞穴，其中有以下特点。
{@b Spores}. 空气中充斥着孢子的永久阴霾，使得该地区被轻度遮蔽。
{@b Fungi}. 小真菌被整齐地种植在一排，被用作快速生长的粮食作物。西面隧道口边上躺着一堆园艺工具。

entries.name: 15. Lair of the Spirit Nagas
entries: 第15区的所有洞穴要么是干的，要么是地面被1英尺的泥水覆盖。
在任何一个区域发出的警报都会吸引附近所有的生物：{@area area 15c|47d|x}的精神纳迦，以及{@area areas 11b|474|x}、{@area 15c|47d}和{@area 15f|482}的它们的王冠。如果可以的话，灵体纳迦和它们的王族会避免杀死人形的入侵者。不能被奴役的囚犯会被扔进竞技场（15a区），没有武器，被迫与纳迦族人的傀儡决一死战。

entries.name: 15a. Arena
entries: 塞斯提安的祸害们有时会让他们的王室成员与俘虏搏斗，供他们消遣。这个40英尺高的山洞有以下特点。
{@b Ledge}. 在15b区，一个旱地的斜坡从离水面几英寸高的地方上升到20英尺高的壁架。
{@b Weapons}. 破碎和废弃的武器躺在潮湿的泥土中。(被迫在此作战的角色可以很容易地从淤泥和残骸中找到可以使用的近战武器）。

entries.name: 15b. Naga Thrones
entries: 壁架的北侧下降了20英尺到竞技场的地面（15a区）。两块平坦的石头可以看到竞技场，被纳迦人用作宝座。

entries.name: 15c. Steamy Den
entries: 这个狭窄的、充满蒸汽的山洞里有以下内容。
{@b Duergar Thrall}. Agorra Duskaxe，一名女性（1%），就在入口处站岗。
{@b Steamer}. 从天花板的裂缝中滴下的水落入洞穴中心的一个圆柱形金属装置中，蒸汽从里面冒出。
{@b Nagas}. 除非他们被画在其他地方，否则有两个叫Excrutha和Serakath的{@creature Spirit Naga||spirit nagas}在靠近洞穴后面的地板上休息（见"{@area The Ssethian Scourges|451|x}"）。
{@b Chest}. 一个木箱靠着东墙站着。
纳格人并不害怕死亡，但他们害怕自己的{@item rod of rulership}丢失或被盗，并会尽一切努力来保护它。这里的战斗会吸引{@area areas 11b|474|x}和{@area 15f|482}的王室成员，如果他们还在附近的话。
当阿戈拉受到{@item rod of rulership}的影响时，她认为纳格人是她的盟友，并誓死捍卫他们。她携带着{@area area 13|476|x}的法器的钥匙。
蒸笼由两个叠在一起的铁室组成。魔法之火在底层房间燃烧，加热水，水通过天花板的裂缝涌入顶层房间。顶室两侧的小孔允许蒸汽排入洞穴，保持洞穴的温暖和湿润。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: One spirit naga has a {@item rod of rulership} coiled in its tail at all times. The rod's magic has been spent for the day and can't be called upon again until the next dawn.
The chest is unlocked and contains 500 pp, 330 gp, a silver necklace in the form of entwined serpents (250 gp), and a {@item spell scroll} of {@spell modify memory}.

entries.name: 15d. Unused Laboratory
entries: 在这个潮湿的10英尺高的山洞里，一张铺满了炼金术士用品的木桌靠着北墙而立。

entries.name: 15e. Spring
entries: 一股源源不断的水从这个凹室墙上的裂缝中涌出。这些水填满了一个天然石盆，然后又溢出到泥泞的地面上。这个泉眼提供干净的水。

entries.name: 15f. Troll Guard Post
entries: 两个{@creature Troll||trolls}{@condition charmed}的纳格人{@item rod of rulership}被挤在这个凹室里，直到他们被吸引到其他地方。

entries.name: 16. Lair of the Bone Naga

entries: {@b Bones}. 这个30英尺高的洞穴看起来空无一物，只有水底下可见众多生物（人形生物和元神）的骨头。
{@b Hexacali}. 潜伏在骨头中的是一个（1%）（以前是一个叫Hexacali的精神纳迦）。

The bone naga tries to slay any living creature that enters its domain. Creatures moving through this area must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check or be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} when the bone naga attacks.

entries.name: 17. Battlefield Cavern
entries: 这个30英尺高的洞穴是元朝和纳格人之间战斗的主要阵地。

entries.name: 17a. Bones in the Mud
entries: 这里的水有2英尺深，下面的洞穴地面上到处都是元帝的骨头。

entries.name: 17b. Death of a Naga
entries: 幽灵般的场景，即一个精灵娜迦与四个元老级纯种人的战斗，在踏上这座岛屿的人物身上上演。当人物看到这个场景时，他们发现自己真的被卷入其中。
每个被卷入场景的角色都会暂时成为与受伤的Hexacali战斗的元老之一。该角色获得了{@creature yuan-ti pureblood}与{@dice 2d20}剩余命中率的统计数据。

Hexacali, a {@creature spirit naga} with 35 hit points, is trapped on the island and fights yuan-ti characters to the death. Yuan-ti characters who drop to 0 hit points during this fight immediately come to their senses and take 22 ({@dice 4d10}) psychic damage from the shock of their illusory demise. Unlike any damage sustained in the battle, this psychic damage is real. A character free of the vision can free another character from it by using an action to shake or slap them.
如果角色们击败了Hexacali，他们最后的集体记忆是将Naga按倒在地，被杀死并复活为骨Naga。然后，所有角色的幻象就结束了，无法再控制他们。

entries.name: 17c. Mirror Gate to Level 10
entries: 一块楔形的干地从水中升起，成为一个15英尺高的洞穴的地板，其东边的墙上安装着一面镜子。

The mirror is framed by an assemblage of hundreds of tiny interlocking stone gears. This mirror reflects normally and is one of Halaster's gates (see "{@area Gates|028|x}"). Its frame is composed of an assemblage of hundreds of tiny, interlocking stone gears. This gate's rules are as follows:

items: 任何检查框架并成功通过DC15智慧（{@skill Perception}）检查的生物都会看到其中一个齿轮已经轻微弹出。如果它被按下，齿轮就会被锁住，导致所有的齿轮转动，门会打开1分钟。当大门关闭时，一个不同的随机齿轮稍微弹出，导致所有的齿轮再次锁定。

Characters must be 11th level or higher to pass through this gate (see "{@area Jhesiyra Kestellharp|016|x}"). The first creature to pass through the gate triggers an elder rune (see "{@area Elder Runes|027|x}").
A creature that passes through the gate appears in {@area area 25b on level 10|5d1|x}, in the closest unoccupied space next to the identical gate located there.

entries.name: 18. Serpent Gate
entries: These 10-foot-high side caverns feature a standing gate that grants access to {@adventure level 11|WDMM|11}. Strikingly beautiful carvings of serpents decorate the walls of these caverns.

entries.name: 18a. Trapped Approach
entries: An old yuan-ti trap meant to prevent approach to the gate still functions in this area. A pressure plate under the water and mud extends the full width of the cavern entrance. A character searching the cavern for traps who succeeds on a DC 20 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check spots the pressure plate. The trap triggers whenever a weight of 50 pounds or more is placed on the pressure plate. Darts fire from holes in the walls against the creature that triggered the trap, making a ranged weapon attack (+7 to hit) that deals 10 ({@dice 4d4}) piercing damage. The trap resets each round.
搜索墙壁并成功通过DC20智慧({@skill Perception})检查，就足以发现大蛇雕刻上的小孔。角色们可以花1分钟的时间来堵住这些洞，这样可以防止陷阱的攻击。使用盗贼的工具，通过成功的DC15灵巧检查，可以使压板失效。

entries.name: 18b. Standing Gate to Level 11
entries: 两根缠绕着巨大石蛇的柱子从淤泥中升起。横跨顶部的门楣石上凿有矮人语的 "DON THE CRYSTAL CROWN "字样。此门的规则如下。

items: The gate opens for 1 minute if a creature wears King Melair's crystal crown (see {@area level 6, area 11d|349|x}) while standing within 5 feet of it.

Characters must be 11th level or higher to pass through this gate (see "{@area Jhesiyra Kestellharp|016|x}"). The first creature to pass through the gate triggers an elder rune (see "{@area Elder Runes|027|x}").
A creature that passes through the gate appears in {@area area 11a on level 11|617|x}, in the closest unoccupied space next to the identical gate located there.

entries.name: 19. Yuan-ti Temple
entries: 这个洞穴的屋顶高达八十英尺，整个洞穴的泥水深达两英尺。主宰这个洞穴的是一座破败的元始天尊，里面摆满了雕像，描绘的是一条张着獠牙的大蛇。通过DC15智力测验成功的人物可以认出这些雕像是元老级神灵斯赛特的画像。庙宇两侧闪烁的火把照亮了整个建筑。

entries.name: 19a. Amphibious Guards
entries: Eight {@creature Bullywug||bullywugs} and three {@creature Giant Frog||giant frogs} stand guard in the water outside the temple. The bullywugs try to paralyze intruders using their spears, the tips of which are coated with carrion crawler mucus. Characters {@condition paralyzed} by the bullywugs' spears or swallowed by the giant frogs are brought to {@area area 19d|492|x} and held there until Kuketh can be summoned from {@area area 20|495|x} to devour them.

entries.name: 19b. Narthex
entries: 一座10英尺高的带翅膀的大蛇雕像矗立在寺庙的入口处，位于两条被淹没的石板坡道之间。坡道很滑，上升到20英尺高的前厅的地板上，而前厅的地板被淹没在1英尺的浊水之下。
雕刻成交织在一起的蛇形的装饰柱排列在密室的墙壁上。

entries.name: 19c. Nave

entries: {@b Water}. 浑浊的水覆盖在地板上，深度为1英尺。
{@b Ceiling Fresco}. 这个房间有一个30英尺高的拱形天花板。天花板上的壁画大部分已经碎裂，但留下的部分显示出蛇形的图像，可能是相当可怕的。

{@b Statues}. Four statues of winged serpents stand to the north, two in the water and two above the waterline. ({@creature Torbit|WDMM}, a bullywug assassin, hides behind the partially submerged statue in the northwest corner.)
{@b Platform}. 在两个中间的雕像之间，有一个大部分被淹没的斜坡上升到一个干燥的平台顶部，在平台的后面有一扇关闭的门，可以进入19d区。
{@creature Torbit|WDMM}如果不是因为他对库克思的虔诚，他可能已经成为黑顿格人的国王。他嫉妒地保护着作为他主人权力所在地的神庙，杀死任何未经许可进入的人。{@creature Torbit|WDMM}是一个{@creature assassin}，有这些变化。

items: {@creature Torbit|WDMM}是混乱的邪恶。

He has these racial traits: He can breathe air and water. He speaks Bullywug, and can speak with frogs and toads. He has a walking speed of 20 feet and a swimming speed of 40 feet. His long jump is up to 20 feet and his high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start. He has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.
除了他的武器之外，{@creature Torbit|WDMM}还携带一块破碎的玉杖（见下面的 "宝物"）。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: {@creature Torbit|WDMM}携带的那块一英尺长的玉石是在淤泥中发现的。他没有意识到这是一块由古代元帝制作的玉杖的碎片，多年前被哈拉斯特丢弃在地下山。更多关于这个元帝装置的信息，以及它如何被重新组装，请参见{@area area 39b on level 6|3a3|x}。这块玉石碎片本身就价值100金币。

entries.name: 19d. Apse
entries: 这个30英尺高的小教堂有以下特点。
{@b Mud-Caked Statue}. 干燥的泥巴被堆在北边的一个巨大的带翅膀的蛇形雕像上，使它看起来隐约像青蛙。雕像前堆满了劣质的雕刻供品和不值钱的石头。
{@b Altar}. 房间中央的一个石坛上有蛇的雕刻。
任何检查祭坛并成功通过DC15智慧({@skill Perception})检查的角色都会注意到，祭坛的一个雕刻有一个按钮，刻得像蛇眼。如果按下这个按钮，祭坛北侧的一个秘密隔间就会打开。这个隔间里有一个细长的红色锥子（见下文 "宝藏"）。库克思和小霸王们并不知道祭坛的暗格和里面的宝藏。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: The red taper is a {@item candle of invocation} dedicated to Sseth, the neutral evil yuan-ti god. If the candle is removed from the altar by a creature that is not a yuan-ti, green mist billows up through cracks in the floor and coalesces into two {@creature Yuan-ti Abomination||yuan-ti abominations}. These temple guardians attack any creature that is not a yuan-ti. When reduced to 0 hit points, they revert to clouds of green mist and disappear without a trace.
如果不杀元凶，他们就会清除寺庙里的敌人，并把它变成自己的巢穴。

entries.name: 20. Blacktongue Isle

entries: {@b Deep Water}. 在这个30英尺高的洞穴的所有入口处，地面都脱落了，其水深达30英尺。
{@b Island Village}. 十几个简陋的棚屋坐落在一个泥泞的马蹄形岛屿之上。二十五个{@creature Bullywug||bullywugs}和六个{@creature Giant Frog||giant frogs}在窝棚里滑进滑出。
{@b Bonfire}. 一堆篝火在岛的北端燃烧着，散发出刺鼻的烟雾。(恶霸们用干内脏和真菌的混合物来维持燃烧）。
棚屋是用岩石和泥土砌成的。在这里发现的恶霸蛙正忙着养育幼崽、修补渔网、做饭或从事其他家庭必需品的工作。他们和巨蛙对来自{@area area 19|48c|x}的援助呼吁作出迅速反应。
无害的洞穴鱼在岛屿周围的深水中游动。岛中心的水池被一个水下的网封闭起来，防止鱼儿找到里面的路。黑鲔鱼把它们未出生的卵放在这个池子里，藏在水下的厚厚的菌类中。

entries.name: 21. Lord of Fetid Obliteration
entries: 除非他被传唤到{@area area 19|48c|x}，否则不快乐的布莱克顿格人的国王就在这里。

entries.name: 21a. Hydra Den
entries: This cave has a 20-foot-high ceiling and is filled with water to a depth of 30 feet. Lurking in the muddy water at the bottom of the cave is a trained {@creature hydra}. The hydra refrains from announcing its presence or attacking until such time as Kuketh orders it to rise and kill something.

entries.name: 21b. Kuketh's Lair

entries: {@b Ledge}. 在水线以上5英尺的一个干燥的壁架上散落着骨头，有些骨头上还附着肉。

{@b Kuketh's Bed}. The eastern end of the ledge contains a pile of moldering hay and the rotting body of a giant toad. Unless it has been drawn elsewhere, Kuketh the {@creature death slaad} lounges on the hay in bullywug form.
在不对它的臣民发号施令的时候，库克思会静静地反思它的麻烦。它用心灵感应与陌生人交流，并愿意与声称是塞西恩祸害的敌人的人物进行谈判。库克思是一种多变的生物，它不会长时间地遵守协议。它唯一一致的愿望是逃离冥山，回到外域的林波世界。

entries.name: 21c. Secret Vault
entries: 这个山洞隐藏在一个秘密的门后面。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: The vault holds treasure collected by the bullywugs, including 56 pp, 2,417 gp, 540 sp, a platinum holy symbol of Sseth (a flying snake with bared fangs) worth 150 gp, and a {@item headband of intellect}.

entries.name: 22. Stables
entries: The Blacktongue bullywugs raise "livestock" in this 20-foot-high, torch-lit cavern. If the bullywug handlers here are attacked, they release their carrion crawlers and shout for aid from {@area areas 19|48c|x} and {@area 23|4a1}.

entries.name: 22a. Giant Frogs
entries: 六只（0%）在这个洞穴的浅水中跳来跳去，大声地呱呱叫，而四只（1%）将食物（主要是害虫）倒入沿西北墙的槽中。

entries.name: 22b. Carrion Crawlers
entries: 这个高架干燥区包含以下内容。
{@b Wooden Pen}. A pen made of wooden slats confines four {@creature Carrion Crawler||carrion crawlers} to the northeast. Three carrion crawler eggs are inside the pen.
{@b Tools}. 几只水桶和长柄工具站在通往围栏的大门附近，用于抓取腐肉爬虫。

The bullywugs raise carrion crawlers for their poisonous mucus, but they also feed carrion crawler eggs to the hydra in {@area area 21a|498|x}. The carrion crawlers are not treated well. If released, they are as likely to attack the bullywugs as they are the characters.
从整个关卡中收集的木屑被用来把这个干燥的区域从地板到天花板围起来。板条之间的缝隙足够宽，可供近战武器或腐尸爬行者的触手攻击。一个简单的绳圈使大门关闭。
{@b Muck}. 这个20英尺高的山洞被淤泥填满，深度为1英尺。
{@b Bullywug Shacks}. 两座用石头和泥巴搭建的小屋被高高的火把照亮。四个人（1%）正在棚屋附近修补工具，两个人（2%）在旁边看着。

entries.name: 24. Kelp Farm
entries: 五只{@creature Bullywug||bullywugs}在这个30英尺高的洞穴的6英尺深的水中工作海带床，而一只{@creature giant toad}在附近游动。海带是小霸王的主食，会发出微弱的绿光。这种光在植物被采摘后10分钟就会消失。
如果他们受到威胁，恶霸蛙会命令巨型蟾蜍进行攻击，并向{@area areas 2|458|x}和23呼救。

entries.name: Aftermath
entries: 如果人物帮助库克思摧毁或夺回其控制宝石，那么死亡之剑就会抛弃恶霸武者。如果{@creature Torbit|WDMM}还活着，在库克思离开或被杀后，他将成为黑舌部落的统治者。然而，这只是一个时间问题，在塞西恩祸害抓住他之前，使他成为他们的座骑之一，并控制了恶霸虫部落。如果所有的黑舌族恶霸都被打败了，神庙就会成为人物休息的安全场所（假设{@area area 19d|492|x}中的元气大伤者没有占领这个地方）。
杀死塞特希亚人的祸害，使尤阿斯塔尔摆脱了她的诅咒，并允许布莱克顿格人霸占纳加斯的洞穴。不过，卡尔斯提斯和德威默科雷的法师们可能已经在那里了，他们想守住这些洞穴。这样的收获是短暂的，因为精神纳迦人的再生特性确保他们在{@dice 1d6}天内返回。

data.name: Level 9: Dweomercore
entries: Dweomercore是一所魔法学院，旨在测试、陷害和迷惑其学生。该关卡是为四个10级的角色设计的，击败其怪物和恶棍的角色应该获得足够的XP值来达到11级。

entries.name: What Dwells Here?
entries: 一个奥术师和一个夜魔女主持着这一层。寻找奥术知识或哈拉斯特指导的邪恶法师们带着他们的追随者来到这里训练并接受考验。

entries.name: Arcanaloth Headmaster
entries: 一个与疯狂法师结盟的弓箭手掌管着德维尔科雷的邪恶法师学院。弓箭手对自己的真实姓名保密，并使用{@spell alter self}法术来显示为哈拉斯特。
阿卡纳罗斯雇佣了尼卡洛特人和米佐洛特人作为守卫，并以安全通过德乌梅尔核心为条件，换取魔法物品或协助处理逃跑的魔鬼（见"{@area Bone Devil|4b1|x}"）。它还试图诱惑那些身为奥术师的冒险者加入它的学院--免费的学费!

entries.name: Wormriddle the Night Hag
entries: Wormriddle是一个夜魔女，她有四个肉体的戈壁，听从她的指挥。她进行肮脏的交易，提供法术和魔法的秘密，以换取邪恶的行为，使她能够索取灵魂。

The night hag wears a mummified kitten's head around her neck as a talisman, though it has no magical properties. It testifies to her fear of cats, for Wormriddle is {@condition frightened} while there's a feline creature within 30 feet of her that she can see or hear. The night hag also carries a lustrous black gem and a large black sack—her {@i heartstone} and her {@i soul bag}, respectively (see the "Hags" entry in the {@book Monster Manual|MM}).

entries.name: Evil Students
entries: Dweomercore的学生描述如下。与他们的相遇可以在任何时间任何地点发生，尽管他们最经常出现在他们最喜欢的地方。

entries.name: Spite Harrowdale
entries: Dweomercore's most apt pupil, Spite Harrowdale, is a centuries-old wizard (NE male Rashemi human {@creature archmage} who speaks Common, Dwarvish, Elvish, and Giant). He appears to be a 12-year-old boy, thanks to imbibing {@item Potion of Longevity||potions of longevity}. Spite hides the true measure of his magical talent by pretending to know only cantrips and 1st-level spells. This ruse has fooled the other students and most of his instructors, but not the arcanaloth, who is keeping a watchful eye on the wizard. Spite is the only student so far who has discerned that the headmaster is not in fact Halaster, but an arcanaloth disguised as him.
斯比特有一个鬼怪伙伴，它的形态是一个名叫杜玛拉的女性半鬼怪。鬼兽的真名是库玛，它一生中大部分时间都与斯比特为伴。它对待斯比特就像对待兄长一样，它是斯比特唯一倾诉的对象。

Spite wants to get his hands on a spellbook hidden in Halaster's private sanctuary ({@area area 45b|542|x}), and he'll use any kind of distraction to get it. Spite cuts a deal with the adventurers: if they distract the arcanaloth and the night hag long enough for him to steal the spellbook, Spite will show them the stairs leading down to {@adventure level 10|WDMM|10} (see {@area area 44|53d|x}). He will also tell them an Undermountain secret, determined by drawing a random card from the {@deck Secrets Deck|WDMM} (see {@adventure appendix C|WDMM|27}). Spite upholds his end of the deal only as long as it's to his benefit, and he tries to pin the theft of the spellbook on the adventurers once they're gone.
如果这些角色拒绝了斯比特的交易，他就会与尼拉斯-乔德（Nylas Jowd）和斯克瑞娜-影子黄昏（Skrianna Shadowdusk）（见下文）合作，消灭他们。

entries.name: Cephalossk the Mind Flayer
entries: Cephalossk is a solitary mind flayer arcanist (see the sidebar in the "{@creature Mind Flayer}" entry in the {@book Monster Manual|MM}). It is a pariah among its own kind, has no allies at the academy, and isn't looking for friendship from anyone. It shadows adventurers and casts {@spell detect thoughts} spells on them to glean their true intentions.
噬心者认为自己在智力上优于其他人，它厌恶斯比特-哈罗代尔，因为他是哈拉斯特的得意门生。Cephalossk试图说服这些人物在吞噬Spite的大脑时引开并杀死Dumara（Spite的欧尼保镖）。为了换取他们的帮助，Cephalossk承诺会告诉他们 "每个地下山探险家都应该知道的三个秘密"。一旦它吸食了斯比特的大脑，塞法洛斯克就会兑现其承诺，以心灵感应的方式与这些人物分享以下信息。

items: 一个思想絮乱者的聚居地已经占领了地下山的一个楼层，称为Seadeeps。(Cephalossk知道这一点，因为它已经和ulitharid进行了心灵感应{@adventure level 17|WDMM|17}。)
吉斯汉克人已经入侵了山下，并试图消灭塞德普斯的心灵骗子殖民地。
Halaster has commandeered a vessel that can travel between worlds through space and hidden it somewhere in Undermountain (see {@adventure level 19|WDMM|19}).

entries: 如果角色们拒绝协助塞法洛斯克，那么心灵杀手就会攻击他们。

entries.name: Pneumatic Tubes
entries: Dweomercore有一个铜管系统，圆柱形的铜罐通过该系统被气压推动。每根管子的直径为3英寸，每个罐子的长度为9英寸，宽度略小于3英寸，有一个拧上的铜盖。这些管子上标有它们的目的地。
本关的许多居民用这些管子来互相发送卷轴、任务和信笺。任何能够装入管道的物体或生物（包括气态的角色）都可以在几秒钟内从一端运到另一端。如果时间变得很重要，假设一个生物在其回合中插入管子的任何东西都会在该生物的下一回合开始时到达目的地。

entries.name: Nylas Jowd
entries: Nylas Jowd (NE male Thayan human {@creature mage} with {@spell animate dead} prepared instead of {@spell fly}) wanders the halls of Dweomercore with a pair of {@condition invisible} will-o'-wisps that obey his commands. Nylas journeyed from Thay to study under Halaster and learn the deeper secrets of necromancy, and he has all the hallmarks of a Red Wizard of Thay—namely, the red robes, the bald head, and the evil bent. He treats others as soon-to-be corpses and is more interested in their anatomy than what they say or do.
尼拉斯想把有角的姐妹（见下文）变成僵尸，因为她们对他的行为很残忍。他要求角色们杀死她们，这样他就可以用{@spell animate dead}的法术使她们的尸体复活。如果角色们拒绝，尼拉斯和他的意志-o-wisps会攻击他们。

entries.name: Skrianna Shadowdusk
entries: Skrianna Shadowdusk (CE female Illuskan human {@creature mage}) recently enrolled in Dweomercore at Halaster's urging. She is one of the Shadowdusk family (see {@adventure level 22|WDMM|22}) and is spoiling for a challenge. Rude, stuck-up, and privileged, Skrianna shows utter disdain for "common rabble" and takes sadistic pleasure in abusing and manipulating others with her magic. She is accompanied at all times by her shield guardian bodyguard (she wears its amulet), as well as a grell valet that carries her spellbook (which contains all the spells she has prepared).
斯克丽安娜不信任新来的人，一有挑衅就攻击他们，她相信如果发生战斗，她的保镖和男仆会保护她。

entries.name: The Horned Sisters
entries: 两个名叫 "动荡 "和 "暴力 "的铁皮人姐妹试图加入卢斯坎的奥术兄弟会，但被拒绝了。她们在海盗船上服役了几年，最后来到了斯库尔波特，在那里她们听到了地下山深处有一所秘密的魔法使用者学院的传闻。他们为了到达Dweomercore而拼尽全力，但这个地方并没有达到宣传的效果。他们在学院里没有朋友，而且对他们所接受的教学质量感到不满意。现在他们想离开，但校长指示他们留下，同时向他们保证事情会向好的方向发展。夜魔女Wormriddle一直在盯着这对姐妹，她们利用任何分散注意力的机会逃回了斯库尔波特。他们将试图让这些人物来造成这种分心。
The sisters are tiefling {@creature Mage||mages}, with these changes:

items: 姐妹们是合法的邪恶。
Each sister has these racial traits: She has resistance to fire damage. She has {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet. She speaks Common, Draconic, Infernal, and Undercommon.
每个姐妹都带着一本法术书，其中包含她准备的所有法术。

entries.name: Elan Tanor'thal
entries: 伊兰来自一个在斯库尔波特经营有利可图的奴隶贸易的家族，直到它被Xanathar公会赶走。他希望能学到足够的魔法，以便有一天为他的家族征服斯库尔波特。像大多数乌鸦一样，他是可预见的奸诈。他的丝质话语足够动听，但任何与他结成的联盟都注定会有糟糕的结局--而且很可能是流血事件。
伊兰向新来的人伸出了虚假的友谊之手，同时警告他们要避开其他学生和校长。"他们都是疯子，"他说。他喜欢在有行动的地方闲逛，这样他就可以静静地观察人物把他们的魔法物品和咒语书放在哪里（他完全打算在他们死后把这些东西拿走）。

entries.name: Bone Devil
entries: A bone devil was accidentally summoned in the southern wing by Yarek, an overzealous student. After killing its summoner, the devil discovered to its dismay that the magic wards of Dweomercore prevent it from escaping {@area area 47|548|x}. The arcanaloth offers adventurers safe passage through Dweomercore if they defeat the devil and send it back to the Nine Hells.

entries.name: Exploring This Level
entries: Location descriptions for this level are keyed to map 9. There are few light sources here; creatures that reside in Dweomercore rely on {@sense darkvision} or create their own illumination with magic.

entries.name: 1. Entry Hall
entries: 这些房间构成了曾经是一个奢华的地下豪宅的入口。

entries.name: 1a. Left Hand of Manshoon

entries: {@b Alarm}. 一个{@spell alarm}的咒语已经在地图9上标记的20英尺见方的区域被施放。当访客到来时，它会悄悄地通知15区的校长。
{@b Ceiling Mosaics}. 这个房间有一个30英尺高的拱形天花板。拱形屋顶上明亮的马赛克描绘了巫师们在进行令人眼花缭乱的法术决斗。
{@b Undead Guardian}. 漂浮在房间中央，离地面15英尺的地方，是一个男人枯萎的左手和前臂，肘部被切断。
响应{@spell alarm}的咒语，{@creature arcanaloth}向1区走去，迎接新来的人（见"{@area Meeting the Headmaster|4b8|x} "侧边栏）。
这条肢体属于一个叫曼斯霍恩的人类大法师，或者更准确地说，属于他的一个克隆体。这个克隆人向哈拉斯特挑战，进行了一场法术决斗，但他输掉的不仅仅是比赛。哈拉斯特把这个肢体变成了一个守护者，它可以攻击所有的入侵者，直到疯狂法师或者像他一样的生物把它赶走。该肢体具有{@creature archmage}的统计数据，但有这些变化。

items: It is a Tiny, unaligned undead with 63 ({@dice 18d4 + 18}) hit points and {@spell blight} prepared instead of {@spell banishment}.
它的飞行速度为30英尺，并且可以盘旋。
它在60英尺的范围内有{@sense blindsight}的能力，超过这个范围就会失明。它不能说话或听觉，也不能成为{@condition blinded}或{@condition deafened}。

entries.name: 1b. Waiting Room
entries: 这个房间里有六把填充的扶手椅，上面有花花绿绿的装饰。

entries.name: 1c. Coat Room
entries: 这个房间的墙上挂着一排排光秃秃的金属钩子。

entries.name: 1d. Water Closet
entries: 这个房间配备了石制水槽和马桶，每个水槽和马桶上方都刻有一个命令词。水槽和马桶会根据命令神奇地注水和冲水，其内圈的排水孔使它们不会溢出。两个{@creature Living Unseen Servant|WDMM|living unseen servants}（见{@adventure appendix A|WDMM|25}）站在毛巾架附近，准备向客人递送毛巾。

entries.name: Meeting the Headmaster
entries: Characters who trigger the alarm spell in area 1 are met by the headmaster, who otherwise dwells in {@area area 15|4e6|x}. When in the company of visitors, the erudite arcanaloth tries to remain civil even while impersonating the Mad Mage. It describes the academy in glowing terms and sings the praises of its excellent students and their devotion to arcane magic. It claims to have a vested interest in all that happens inside Undermountain and bears no ill will toward adventurers who provide "a much needed sanitary service" by ridding the dungeon of pesky monsters. If the characters are just passing through on their way to the lower levels, the headmaster offers to take them to the top of the stairs leading down to {@adventure level 10|WDMM|10}. For safe passage through Dweomercore, it requires one of the following:

items: 每个党员支付一件魔法物品
在{@area area 47|548|x}中杀死骨魔

entries: If the characters choose to deal with the bone devil rather than give up their magic items, the headmaster leads them south through {@area areas 2|4ba|x}, {@area 3|4bb}, {@area 6|4bf}, {@area 38|52e}, {@area 39|531}, and {@area 46|545}. It waits for them in area {@area 46b|547} while they slay the devil in {@area area 47|548|x}, then escorts them to the top of the stairs leading down to {@adventure level 10|WDMM|10} as promised. After watching them disappear down the stairs, the arcanaloth returns to {@area area 15|4e6|x}.
拒绝校长提议的访客会被礼貌地要求从哪里来就回哪里去，并且永远不要再在Dweomercore露面。拒绝离开的人将受到攻击。

任何声称自己是一个寻找导师的奥术师的角色都被邀请留在Dweomercore并参加入学考试。如果该角色接受了这个提议，校长会使用传送法术将自己和候选人传送到{@area area 11c|4d4|x}，并建议该角色留在那里，直到入学考试可以安排。(如果队伍中包括多个候选人，阿卡纳罗斯会把他们聚在一起。) 事实上，阿卡纳罗斯希望考生能够忽略它的建议，进一步探索这个复杂的地方。入学考试实际上是关于候选人如何处理与其他学生的关系。任何能够与其他学生打成一片的候选人都会被录取，因为他们已经通过了校长的 "考试"。
被Dweomercore录取的角色可以自由地在大厅里闲逛，与其他学生交谈，直到该角色遇到麻烦，被开除或被谋杀。

entries.name: 2. Trapped Hall
entries: 这条走廊的凹壁上刻有八个紧握法杖的巫师，每根法杖代表一个不同的魔法流派。这个大厅也有两个隐藏的功能。

items: 当一个生物在一个回合中第一次进入地图9上标记的10英尺见方的陷阱空间，或者在那里开始回合，位于{@area area 3|4bb|x}的美杜莎雕像就会变成动画并向该生物射出一支魔法箭。(如果校长正陪同角色通过这个大厅，弓箭手会使用{@spell mage hand}的咒语来按下按钮并解除陷阱。)

A stone button is concealed in the north wall, disguised to look like a section of the staff that represents conjuration. A character who searches the wall spots the button with a successful DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check. Pressing the button results in a loud clicking noise as the arrow trap deactivates for 1 minute.

entries.name: 3. Medusa Junction
entries: 这个房间的墙壁垂直上升10英尺，然后向内倾斜到20英尺高的顶点。在房间的中央，站在一个1英尺高的圆柱形石块上的是一个皱眉的美杜莎雕像，手里拿着长弓和一个空箭筒。这座雕像凝视着北方。
当一个生物触发了{@area area 2|4ba|x}的陷阱时，当雕像出现时，一支{@condition poisoned}的箭在美杜莎的手中出现。它立即拉开弓，将箭射向触发陷阱的生物（命中率+6），命中后造成6({@dice 1d8 + 2})的穿刺伤害和14({@dice 4d6})的中毒伤害。

The medusa statue is a Medium object with AC 15, 50 hit points, and immunity to all damage except force damage. It weighs 1,200 pounds. A creature can use an action to try to knock the statue off its base, doing so with a successful DC 18 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. If it is toppled, the statue does not animate until returned to its former position. (If Wormriddle learns about the toppled statue, she and her flesh golems set it right before seeking to punish those responsible.)

entries.name: 4. Fresh Water Fountain
entries: {@b Fountain}. 来自天然泉水的淡水从一个浮雕的口中涌出，浮雕看起来像哈拉斯特欣喜若狂的面容，然后溢出到一个半圆形的石盆中，由一个2英尺高的挡土墙围住，然后通过小孔排出去。
{@b Guards}. 在喷泉的两侧有两个{@b {@creature Mezzoloth||mezzoloths}}。
{@b Braziers}. 房间南端的地板上升起了两个未点燃的石制火炉，其形状像带爪子的手。
这些人确保没有人破坏学院的供水系统或毁坏喷泉。除此以外，他们对访客毫不在意。

entries.name: 5. Portrait of a Mad Mage
entries: 这个房间是空的，只有一个巨大的红色天鹅绒窗帘覆盖着北墙。帘子一侧的拉绳可以将其拉回。帘子后面挂着一幅巨大的抽象画，画中的哈拉斯特被一片片血淋淋的嘴和人们互相吞食的场面所包围。背景中还有来自物质世界之外的各种其他怪异的人物。尽管他周围充满了暴力混乱，但哈拉斯特的脸却平静得令人不寒而栗，他那刺眼的目光似乎一直追随着观看这幅画的人。
任何看到这幅画的生物都必须在DC17智慧救赎中成功，否则就会遭受一种随机的长期疯狂，这是由长期疯狂表上的{@book chapter 8|DMG|8|Madness Effects}的{@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}的滚动决定。拯救失败后，生物可以再次受到画的影响，但要等到其当前的疯狂状态结束。

entries.name: 6. Reading Niche

entries: {@b Desks}. In the middle of the room stands a row of desks. Seated behind one of the desks is Spite Harrowdale (NE male Rashemi human {@creature archmage} who speaks Abyssal, Common, Dwarvish, Elvish, Giant, and Primordial). His {@creature oni} bodyguard, disguised as a half-ogre named Dumara, stands beside him.
{@b Bookshelves}. 高大的书架上挤满了软封面的笔记本，在东北面和西南面的墙上。这些书是按主题组织的。
{@b Pneumatic Tubes}. 一排十个气动管被固定在后墙上。管子下面是一个空铜罐的架子。

Spite is holding a wand with a {@spell light} cantrip cast on the end of it and reading a bone-dry biography of Ahghairon, the archwizard who founded Waterdeep. If the characters are being led through Dweomercore by the headmaster, Spite smiles at them as they pass by. Once they're gone, he and the oni cast {@spell invisibility} on themselves and follow the characters, curious to learn their intentions in Dweomercore. Spite and Dumara confront the characters as soon as they can do so privately (see "{@area Evil Students|4a9|x}").
储存在这里的笔记本又小又薄，可以蜷缩起来塞进气管罐里。这些书涵盖了巫师们感兴趣的主题，包括法术组件的采集、对编织的反思、著名巫师和地衣的传记、创造逼真幻象的技巧，以及以前的学生写的关于广泛的奥秘主题的文章。这套书中的任何一本书从Dweomercore中取出后都会神奇地消失，然后重新出现在它合适的书架上。

entries.name: Pneumatic Tubes
entries: The tubes connect to the students' dormitories ({@area areas 8|4c3|x} and {@area 11|4cd}). From left to right, the tubes are labeled "Turbulence" ({@area area 8a|4c5|x}), "Violence" ({@area area 8b|4c7|x}), "Karstis" ({@area area 8c|4c9|x}), "Yarek" ({@area area 8d|4ca|x}), "Spite" ({@area area 11a|4cf|x}), "Skrianna" ({@area area 11b|4d1|x}), "Vacant" ({@area area 11c|4d4|x}), "Cephalossk" ({@area area 11d|4d5|x}), "Elan" ({@area area 11e|4d7|x}), and "Nylas" ({@area area 11f|4da|x}).

entries.name: 7. Workroom
entries: The door to this room is slightly ajar. Peering out from within is Cephalossk, the {@creature mind flayer arcanist}. It has been too long since the mind flayer has fed on a fresh brain, but it's willing to forgo attacking the characters if they promise to help it feed on Spite's mind instead (see "{@area Cephalossk the Mind Flayer|4ab|x}").
这个工作间里摆满了桌子、火炉和各种各样的炼金设备。

entries.name: 8. Student Dormitories
entries: 每个房间都包含相同的家具。
{@b Pneumatic Tubes}. 一面墙上挂着一排五根气管。这些管子都标有目的地，连接到阅读室({@area area 6|4bf|x})、校长办公室({@area area 15a|4e7|x})、Wormriddle的工作室({@area area 23c|506|x})、厨房({@area area 27a|512|x})和学习厅({@area area 39|531|x})。
{@b Bed and Footlocker}. 靠着远处的墙壁有一张普通的床和一个铁制的脚锁，上面有一把结实的挂锁，可以通过使用小偷的工具并成功地进行DC20的灵巧检查来打开。(如果一个房间是空的，它的钥匙就在锁里；否则，一个房间的钥匙就在这个房间的住户手里）。

{@b Desk}. A plain desk contains quill pens, jars of ink, blank scrolls, notes, notebooks, and {@dice 1d6} empty copper scroll canisters designed to fit inside the pneumatic tubes. Hanging on the wall above the desk is a framed portrait of Halaster. (The portraits in different rooms have different expressions.)

entries.name: 8a. Turbulence's Room
entries: 东墙被钻了一个小洞，使湍流能够在8b区与她的妹妹交谈，而两人在他们的宿舍里。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 湍流的鞋柜里有一套旅行者的衣服和一个五角星形的血石护身符（125gp）。

entries.name: 8b. Violence's Room
entries: 西墙被钻了一个小洞，使暴力可以在8a区与她的妹妹交谈，而两人在他们的宿舍里。暴力在她办公桌上方的哈拉斯特的画像上画了一个大大的、一扫而过的黑色胡子。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 暴力的鞋柜里有一套旅行者的衣服，一个装有75金币的红色皮袋，以及一本从亚雷克的房间里偷来的法术书（区域8d）。书中包含这些法术。{@spell cloud of daggers}, {@spell conjure elemental}, {@spell darkvision}, {@spell fog cloud}, {@spell grease}, {@spell gust of wind}, {@spell Leomund's tiny hut}, {@spell magic missile}, {@spell Mordenkainen's faithful hound}, {@spell sending}, {@spell stinking cloud}, 和 {@spell unseen servant}。

entries.name: 8c. Karstis's Room
entries: This room is set aside for a student named Karstis, whom characters might have encountered on {@adventure level 8|WDMM|8}. If he fled Slitherswamp, Karstis is lying in his bed and reading his spellbook (assuming he still has it). The room is unoccupied otherwise.

entries.name: 8d. Yarek's Room
entries: Yarek was the student responsible for releasing the bone devil in {@area area 47|548|x}. His room hasn't been cleaned out since his demise.
亚雷克死后，"长角姐妹 "翻开了他的鞋柜，拿走了他们认为有价值的东西。她们留下了一根水晶魔杖（价值10戈比的奥术焦点），一套精美的衣服，以及一幅小型的亲笔签名画，画上是一个风流倜傥的黑发人类巫师，肩上栖息着一只鸽子。这幅画上刻着："亚雷克--祝你有个神奇的一天！"。你的朋友，吉姆。"

entries.name: 9. Refuse Pit
entries: 这间屋子里充斥着一股垃圾的气味。地板中间有一个30英尺长、10英尺宽、60英尺深的坑，里面装满了垃圾和失败的实验品，深度达10英尺。这种化学混合物催生了一种有毒的粘液。

Any creature knocked into the pit falls 60 feet onto the soft pile of trash, taking {@dice 1d4} bludgeoning damage per 10 feet fallen. In addition, a creature that lands in the toxic slime takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns until the slime is washed off with water or alcohol. A character can determine how to clean off the slime with a successful DC 10 Intelligence ({@skill Nature}) check.

entries.name: 10. Where's Halaster?
entries: 这个房间是空的，只有一个巨大的红色天鹅绒窗帘覆盖着西北墙。帘子一侧的拉绳可以将其拉回。帘子后面的墙上挂着15幅画，每幅画长5英尺，高3英尺，分成三行，每行5幅。

Each painting depicts a graduating class of dour-faced Dweomercore wizards. Most of the older paintings show the students as skeletons—signifying which graduating students have died. Careful examination reveals that Halaster appears in every class picture except the center portrait in the middle row. Removing that painting from the wall triggers an elder rune hidden behind it (see "{@area Elder Runes|027|x}"). Determine the rune with a random draw from the {@deck Elder Runes Deck|WDMM} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDMM|26}).

entries.name: 11. Student Dormitories
entries: 每个房间都包含相同的家具。
{@b Pneumatic Tubes}. 一面墙上挂着一排五根气管。这些管道连接到阅读室（{@area area 6|4bf|x}）、校长办公室（{@area area 15a|4e7|x}）、虫虫的工作室（{@area area 23c|506|x}）、厨房（{@area area 27a|512|x}）和学习室（{@area area 39|531|x}）。

{@b Bed, Dresser, and Chest}. Against the far wall rests a comfortable bed, a handsome dresser, and a claw-footed iron chest with an {@spell arcane lock} spell cast on it (keyed to the student assigned to the room). A creature can force open the magically locked chest with a successful DC 25 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check.
{@b Desk}. 一张漂亮的卷轴式办公桌上有羽毛笔、墨水罐、空白卷轴、笔记、笔记本和{@dice 1d6}空的铜制卷轴罐，这些卷轴罐被设计在气动管内。书桌上方的墙上挂着一幅镶框的哈拉斯特的画像。(不同房间的画像有不同的表情）。

entries.name: 11a. Spite's Room
entries: 斯比特-哈罗代尔和他的鬼门关保镖共用这个房间。斯比特采取了预防措施，在门框上施了一个{@spell glyph of warding}的咒语，设定为如果他或杜玛拉以外的人跨过门槛就会触发。从房间外面看不到这个字形。它爆发出的魔法能量充满了以它为中心的20英尺半径的球体。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个DC17的灵巧救赎，如果救赎失败，将受到45({@dice 10d8})的雷霆伤害，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Spite keeps a tiny jeweled chest inside his rolltop desk. This chest (50 gp) is a replica of a full-sized chest made of exquisite materials. The larger chest (5,000 gp) is hidden on the Ethereal Plane by means of a {@i Leomund's secret chest} spell.

A character can recognize the miniature chest for what it is with a successful DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check. Spite alone can use the replica to recall the larger chest, which contains two spellbooks titled {@i Spells of Spite}, volumes I and II. These books contain all the spells Spite has prepared, plus the following spells: {@spell arcane lock}, {@spell Bigby's hand}, {@spell disintegrate}, {@spell forcecage}, {@spell gaseous form}, {@spell glyph of warding}, {@spell Leomund's secret chest}, {@spell maze}, {@spell Melf's acid arrow}, {@spell Mordenkainen's private sanctum}, {@spell Otto's irresistible dance}, {@spell Tasha's hideous laughter}, {@spell telekinesis}, {@spell Tenser's floating disk}, and {@spell true polymorph}.

entries.name: 11b. Skrianna's Room
entries: 斯克瑞娜在她的住处装满了舒适的物品，包括丝绸床单、来自异国野兽的柔软毛皮、一碗新鲜水果、一个燃烧着的香炉，以及一张带垫子的柳条阅读椅。

entries.name: Skrianna's Diary
entries: 斯克瑞娜在她的办公桌上放了一本日记。这本书提供了一个难得的机会，让人们看到一个Shadowdusk家族成员的疯狂心态。除了对她在Dweomercore的同龄人表示蔑视之外，Skrianna还抨击了校长对她的限制。她还谈到了一个名叫阿卡玛的想象中的情人，他来自天外的虚空，并谈到了她在梦中对远界的访问。她顺便提到了其他家庭成员，即扎尔萨和德兹密尔，他们住在暗影黄昏之城（见{@adventure level 22|WDMM|22}），并计划在哈拉斯特在阿克图里多姆（{@adventure level 14|WDMM|14}）建造的某种巨型建筑的帮助下，强行返回水底城。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Skrianna的梳妆台上有十套精美的衣服和一套旅行者的衣服。她的箱子，盖子内侧附有一面镜子，里面有一根复杂的暗木雕刻的魔杖，一个毒药师的工具箱，以及一瓶精致的香水（75gp）。

entries.name: 11c. Vacant Room
entries: 这个房间没有人住。

entries.name: 11d. Cephalossk's Room
entries: 这个房间的卷轴桌里有16个浑浊的罐子，里面装着保存的人形大脑。鞋柜里有九个类似的罐子，都是空的。凯法洛斯克渴望得到新鲜的大脑，但当没有其他食物来源时，就靠保存的大脑维持生计。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Cephalossk将其法术书放在办公桌的抽屉里。这本书是由薄薄的铜板用密特拉尔金属丝固定而成。每一页都有类似盲文的浮雕，叫做Qualith，噬心者用它的触手来阅读。非illithid必须使用{@spell comprehend languages}咒语或类似的魔法来理解这些文字。这本书包含了Cephalossk准备的所有法术（见{@book Monster Manual|MM}中的"{@creature Mind Flayer} "条目的侧边栏）。

entries.name: 11e. Elan's Room

entries: {@b Familiar}. Elan's familiar, a black {@creature spider} with blood-red markings, clings to the wall above the door and telepathically alerts the drow mage if it detects intruders in the room.
{@b Shrine}. 床边的床头柜上放着一个供奉恶魔女王洛尔思的小神龛。

After being alerted to the arrival of visitors by his spider familiar, Elan spends 3 rounds traveling from {@area area 13a|4de|x} to his dormitory. Elan greets strangers in a friendly manner (see "{@area Elan Tanor'thal|4b0|x}").

这个神龛几乎就像一个灯笼，设计得很容易运输。里面有一个黑色的玄武岩雕像，是乌鸦形态的洛尔思，用蜘蛛网串起来。一个{@spell detect magic}的法术在雕像周围显示出一个魔法光环。任何触碰雕像的生物都必须在DC17智慧救赎中获得成功，否则就会遭受随机的短期疯狂，这是由{@book chapter 8|DMG|8|Madness Effects}的{@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}的短期疯狂表来决定。成功抵御疯狂效果的生物可以安全地持有雕像。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 伊兰的箱子里有一套黑色的旅行者衣服，一个装着38pp的蜘蛛丝袋，以及一件带罩的黑色斗篷。斗篷上钉着一个刻有塔诺尔家族徽章的黑曜石刀疤（25GP）。

entries.name: 11f. Nylas's Room
entries: A vile stench issues from an {@creature ogre zombie} that stands against the wall opposite the door. Its orders are to defend Nylas while he is asleep in the room and to protect the Red Wizard's spellbook (see "Treasure" below).

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Nylas hides his spellbook inside the ogre zombie's rotting torso. Characters who have a passive Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) score of 15 or higher and come within 5 feet of the zombie can see the spellbook wedged between its ribs. A character can use an action to try to snatch the spellbook while the zombie is animate with a successful DC 12 Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check. No check is needed to remove the book if the zombie is {@condition incapacitated} or destroyed.
尼拉斯的法术书的封面是由棺材木雕刻而成的，书页是由人形肉体缝制而成的，文字是用红袍巫师自己的血写的。它包含了尼拉斯所准备的所有法术（见{@creature mage}状态块），加上{@spell animate dead}、{@spell blight}和{@spell contact other plane}。

entries.name: 12. Communal Showers
entries: 这个房间里有五个淋浴间，铁制的水龙头和淋浴头从墙上伸出来。水从地下水库引到这里，通过魔法加热，如果打开水龙头，房间里很快就会充满蒸汽。

entries.name: 13. Recreation Room
entries: 学生们在课间来这里放松和休整。

entries.name: 13a. Taproom
entries: 这个房间类似于沃特德普的一个舒适的酒馆。吧台里摆放着几瓶上等白酒和几桶葡萄酒，西边的墙上挂着一个木制的镖靶，上面雕刻着飞镖，看起来就像镫骨。

A {@creature drow mage} named Elan Tanor'thal (see "{@area Elan Tanor'thal|4b0|x}") is seated at a table strewn with parchment in the southwest corner, facing the north door. Elan recently acquired a {@item spell scroll} of {@spell legend lore} from Wormriddle the night hag and is carefully copying the spell from the scroll to his spellbook. He greets intruders in a friendly manner and suggests they partake of the wine while he finishes his work. The scroll turns to dust once the work is complete.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 伊兰的黑色皮革包裹的法术书包含了他所准备的所有法术以及以下内容。{@spell confusion}, {@spell counterspell}, {@spell fabricate}, {@spell feather fall}, {@spell glyph of warding}, {@spell magic weapon}, {@spell seeming}, 和{@spell water breathing}。如果他复制 "蠕虫之谜 "的{@item spell scroll}的尝试是成功的，那么伊兰的书也包含{@spell legend lore}。

entries.name: 13b. Arch Gate to Level 6

entries: {@b Arch}. 嵌入南墙的是一个石拱门，上面有持刀人、弗隆斯和斯蒂格的图像（见下文 "拱门"）。
{@b Guard}. 一个{@condition invisible}{@creature nycaloth}站在南墙边，保护着拱门。当尼卡洛斯攻击或施法时，它就会显现出来。

The nycaloth's orders are to prevent anyone from using the arch gate to leave Dweomercore without the arcanaloth's permission, and to haul any creature that enters the room by way of the gate to the headmaster's office ({@area area 15a|4e7|x}) for questioning. Given strict instructions not to kill anyone, the nycaloth knocks creatures {@condition unconscious} instead of killing them, then drags them to the headmaster's office.

entries.name: Arch Gate
entries: The arch is one of Halaster's magic gates (see "{@area Gates|028|x}"). Its rules are as follows:

items: 如果有生物在拱门5英尺范围内飞行或悬浮，大门会打开1分钟。

Characters must be 9th level or higher to pass through this gate (see "{@area Jhesiyra Kestellharp|016|x}"). The first creature to pass through the gate triggers an elder rune (see "{@area Elder Runes|027|x}").
A creature that passes through the gate appears in {@area area 8b on level 6|33b|x}, in the closest unoccupied space next to the identical gate located there.

entries.name: 14. Detention Hall
entries: 有0%的机会，一个名叫 "暴力 "的红袍铁弗林（1%）（见"{@area The Horned Sisters|4af|x}"）在这里，因威胁客座讲师而被拘留。该区域包含以下内容。
{@b Desk}. 一张普通的桌子靠着西墙。如果 "暴力 "在这里，她正坐在椅子上，面对墙壁，阅读一本烧焦的魔法书。
{@b Door Plaque}. 东北面的门上有一块铜牌，上面写着："校长办公室--请敲门"。
在校长释放她之前，暴力不允许离开这个大厅，她不愿意偷偷摸摸地离开并面临更大的惩罚。如果人物以友好的方式接近她，暴力会告诉他们在校长回来之前离开，并建议他们和她的妹妹湍流说话，她在咒语大厅里（{@area area 17|4f0|x}）。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 暴力的烧焦的法术书包含了她所准备的所有法术，另外还有以下内容。{@spell alter self}, {@spell cloud of daggers}, {@spell hypnotic pattern}, 和 {@spell wall of fire}。

entries.name: 15. Arcanaloth's Sanctum
entries: These private chambers belong to the arcanaloth headmaster posing as {@creature Halaster Blackcloak|WDMM}.

entries.name: 15a. Headmaster's Office
entries: 如果在其他地方还没有遇到过，那么{@creature arcanaloth}校长就在这里化身为哈拉斯特。这个房间有一个30英尺高的圆顶天花板，有以下特点。
{@b Statue}. 在门的对面，一个与真人大小相同的哈拉斯特的雕像站在一个3英尺高的花岗岩基座上。巫师的袍子上刻着几十只眼睛，他拿着一根石杖，上面有一团闪烁的魔法火焰（由{@spell continual flame}法术创造）。
{@b Desk}. 躺在雕像前的是一张巨大的橡木书桌，后面站着一张雕刻着尖叫脸的高背椅（见下图）。
{@b Pneumatic Tubes}. 十五根铜质气动管横跨西北墙，下面是一个空铜罐架。
{@b Secret Door}. A secret door opens into {@area area 15b|4ea|x}.
如果在场，奥术师正在卷轴上写个人作业，并使用气管系统将其传递给学院的学生。这些作业涉及阅读书籍，完成实验，以及起草关于各种奥秘主题的论文。
校长的椅子上有一个{@spell antipathy/sympathy}的法术施放。任何不能施放一个或多个七级以上法术的生物都会受到法术的反感效果（保存DC17），被似乎从椅子上发出的尖叫声所淹没。

entries.name: Pneumatic Tubes
entries: 这些管道连接到Dweomercore和{@creature Muiral|WDMM}的Gauntlet(第10层)中的其他不同地点。从左到右，这些管道都标有目的地。"湍流"({@area area 8a|4c5|x}), "暴力"({@area area 8b|4c7|x}), "卡斯提斯"({@area area 8c|4c9|x}), "亚雷克"({@area area 8d|4ca|x}), "怨恨"({@area area 11a|4cf|x}), "斯克里安娜"({@area area 11b|4d1|x}), "空位"({@area area 11c|4d4|x}, "塞法洛斯克"({@area area 11d|4d5|x} )。"Elan" ({@area area 11e|4d7|x}, "Nylas" ({@area area 11f|4da|x}), "Wormriddle" ({@area area 23c|506|x}), "Kitchen" ({@area area 27a|512|x}), "Study Hall" ({@area area 39|531|x}), "Guest Lecturer" ({@area area 42|537|x}, and "{@creature Muiral|WDMM}" ({@area level 10, area 4b|56a|x})。

entries.name: 15b. Arcanaloth's Lair

entries: {@b Bookshelves}. 书籍被装在石头架子上，环绕房间一圈，高度为10英尺。

{@b Symbol}. Inscribed on the floor and covered with a circular rug sewn with repeating eye-like patterns is a nearly {@condition invisible}, 10-foot-diameter glyph that serves as the trigger for a {@spell symbol} spell.
任何非魔族的生物在踏上圆形地毯或以任何方式扰乱地毯时，都会触发{@spell symbol}的咒语。由于地毯覆盖了咒语的触发石刻，除非他们使用{@spell detect magic}的咒语或魔法，使他们能够看穿地毯，否则人物几乎没有机会发现石刻。
当石刻触发时，这个房间和15a区域的所有生物都必须做一个DC17的宪法救赎，救赎失败时受到55({@dice 10d10})的坏死伤害，救赎成功时受到一半的伤害。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 阿卡纳罗斯是个狂热的读者，从整个多元宇宙收集了无数书籍。大多数书都涉及世俗的主题，如礼仪、演说和诗歌。其中有20本是关于外部世界的论文，以及各个物质世界的历史事件编年史，包括托里尔、奥尔斯、阿萨斯和其他世界；这些书对有兴趣的买家来说每本价值100戈比。花费1小时搜索的人物可以找到这些罕见的书籍之一。

弓箭手把它的法术书放在这里。书的封面是皮革的，上面烙着可怕的图像。书中的文字是{@condition invisible}，只有拥有{@sense truesight}或通过{@spell see invisibility}咒语或类似魔法的生物才能阅读。这本书包含了阿卡纳罗斯准备的所有法术，加上{@spell antimagic field}、{@spell cloudkill}、{@spell circle of death}、{@spell delayed blast fireball}、{@spell ice storm}、{@spell legend lore}、{@spell scrying}和{@spell symbol}。

entries.name: 16. Magic Cauldron
entries: {@b Nylas Jowd}. 泰雅人尼拉斯-乔德（Nylas Jowd）（见"{@area Nylas Jowd|4ad|x}"），和他的{@condition invisible}同伴，两个{@creature Will-o'-Wisp||will-o'-wisps}潜伏在东边的凹槽里。
{@b Pillars and Cauldron}. 五根石柱支撑着这个大厅的20英尺高的天花板。最南边的柱子上有一个空洞，里面有一个有盖的铅制大锅，在柱子南边的人都能看到。大锅上方的钩子上挂着一把染色的木勺子。
{@b Illusory Wall}. 一面虚幻的墙隐藏了18区。对墙壁施展的{@spell detect magic}法术显示出一个幻觉魔法的光环。这面墙没有实体，生物和物体可以直接穿过它。如果成功施展{@spell dispel magic}的法术(DC14)，这面墙可以被移除。
Nylas计划在Turbulence（见{@area area 17|4f0|x}）进入大厅喝大锅水时伏击并杀死她。如果角色们在这里抓到尼拉斯，他就会试图说服他们为他杀死湍流，如果他们拒绝就会攻击他们。巫师们聚集在离尼拉斯最近的敌人身上，保护他们的主人。

entries.name: Cauldron
entries: {@spell detect magic}的法术无法穿透大锅的铅壳。它重达10磅，含有{@dice 1d10}剂量的透明魔法液体，闻起来和尝起来都像醋。任何喝下一剂液体的生物都能恢复一个任何等级的已消耗的法术槽。如果将大锅从它的位置上移开，其中的魔法液体就会变成普通的醋。如果醋与任何其他物质混合，也会发生同样的情况。如果空的大锅被留在神龛里，那么在下一个黎明时分，它就会自动装满12个剂量的魔法液体。

entries.name: 17. Spellcasting Hall
entries: 这个房间有一个30英尺高的拱形天花板。它由{@spell continual flame}施放在石墙壁灯上的法术照亮，形状像恶魔的爪子。墙壁、地板和天花板都因法术伤害而被烧焦，并有凹痕。

If the characters are visiting the room for the first time, a black-robed female tiefling {@creature mage} named Turbulence (see "{@area The Horned Sisters|4af|x}") is engaged in a spell duel with three archmages, one of whom appears to be Halaster. Turbulence is losing badly and has only 3 hit points remaining. Before the archmages can finish her off, the tiefling shouts, "I surrender!" On their next turns, the archmages retreat into alcoves and become inanimate gray statues (see "Statues" below).
湍流把他们想知道的关于Dweomercore的事情都告诉了他们，目的是让他们对抗Halaster。她提到疯狂法师在这一层有一个私人避难所（{@area area 45|53f|x}），希望他们能试着抢劫它，并制造一个足够大的分心，让她和她的妹妹暴力逃脱。

entries.name: Statues
entries: 房间里的三个雕像是真人大小的长袍人类巫师的雕刻。他们是用来测试学生的法术能力的。一个{@spell detect magic}的咒语在每个人周围显示出一个转化魔法的光环。
{@b East Statue}. 这座雕像描绘了一个年轻的寿氏女子，她的脸被硫酸毁掉了一半。她的一只手紧握着一个球体。
{@b South Statue}. 这座雕像站在石台之上，描绘了身穿长袍，眼睛一眨不眨的{@creature Halaster Blackcloak|WDMM}。他紧握着一根法杖。
{@b West Statue}. 这座雕像描绘了一个长发女人，她拿着一根虬结的魔杖。她从一个光滑的、没有特征的面具后面向外看。
这些雕像在无生命的状态下是不可摧毁的。当一个生物在西边和东边的雕像之间移动时，三个雕像都会变成肉体，并攻击房间里的所有其他生物。分别对每个雕像进行主动攻击。当雕像被激活时，它们是{@creature Archmage||archmages}，有这些变化。

items: 这些雕像是不结盟的构造物，只有在施放有语言成分的法术时才会说话。他们不能离开房间。
他们准备了{@spell ice storm}的法术而不是{@spell banishment}，准备了{@spell finger of death}的法术而不是{@spell teleport}。
如果{@condition incapacitated}或降低到0命中率，雕像会立即传送到它的凹室，在那里它恢复到无生命的形态，并重新获得所有的命中率。在三个大法师都恢复为雕像之前，它不能再重新复活。

The statues return to their alcoves, revert to their inanimate forms, and regain all their hit points if, when their turn comes up, no other creatures remain in the room that aren't {@condition incapacitated}. This also happens if a creature in the room speaks the words "I surrender!" in any language.
Any creature reduced to 0 hit points by an animated statue is stable and {@condition unconscious}.

entries: 冒险家们第一次击败一个特定的动画大法师雕像时，他们会像在战斗中击败的任何生物一样获得XP。然而，随后对该雕像的胜利并不能提供更多的XP。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 湍流带着一本沾满烟灰的法术书，里面有她准备的所有法术，还有以下内容。{@spell alter self}, {@spell cloud of daggers}, {@spell hypnotic pattern}, 和 {@spell wall of fire}。

entries.name: 18. Illusory Walls
entries: 这条10英尺高的走廊被虚幻的墙壁向西和向东封闭。一个{@spell detect magic}的法术显示，这些墙是没有实质内容的幻象，生物和物体可以直接穿过它们。虚幻的墙壁可以通过一个成功的（1%）法术（DC14）来移除。

entries.name: 19. Ghostly Adventurer

entries: {@b Apparition}. 在这个大厅的东端，一个人类冒险家的微弱幻影似乎正在费力地搜索墙壁上的秘密门。
{@b Walls}. The walls bear mosaics that have been chipped away and damaged beyond recognition or repair. The wall to the west is illusory (see {@area area 18|4f4|x}).
{@b Trophy Case}. 在通往20区的门之间，矗立着一个空的木制奖杯箱。

The apparition is a regional effect created by the Mad Mage (see "{@area Halaster's Lair|bb9|x}"). It resembles a young human woman, dressed in well-worn adventurer's clothes. It can't be harmed, and it doesn't acknowledge creatures or objects in any way.

entries.name: 20. Lecture Hall
entries: 这个倾斜的演讲厅有15英尺高的天花板和以下特点。
{@b Light}. 墙壁上突出的石制壁炉上有{@spell continual flame}的法术。
{@b Benches}. 房间的北半部分有供学生使用的高脚石凳。
{@b Dais}. 在南边，一块大黑板被安装在一个5英尺高的石台上面。黑板上画着三只青蛙一样的双足动物，脸上带着宽大的牙齿笑容。他们呈三角形排列；最上面的一个是用红色粉笔画的，左下方是蓝色，右下方是绿色。
{@b Gurneys}. 房间里停着两辆石质轮床。绑在一张桌子上的是一具夸父的尸体，它的胸膛被炸开，内脏被吃掉。另一张桌子上铺着一张落地黑布，下面藏着一个（1%）的东西（见下文 "Slaad Tadpole"）。
任何研究黑板上的图画并成功通过DC15智力({@skill Arcana})检查的角色都能认出它们是红、蓝、绿的Slaad。黄色的粉笔箭头从红色的Slaad指向其他两个。在每个slaad的旁边都写着深渊语的文字。任何能读懂深渊语的人物都能翻译这些文字。

items: "父母 "写在红色Slaad的旁边。
"父母和主人的后代 "写在蓝色Slaad的旁边。
"如果宿主是施法者，其后代 "写在绿色Slaad旁边。

entries.name: Slaad Tadpole
entries: 夜魔女Wormriddle为学生们准备了一个特别的演示，她将红色的斯拉德卵粒植入了一只被抓获的夸父兽体内。不幸的是，这只蝌蚪比预期的更早孵化。夜妖最近没有检查她的对象，也不知道蝌蚪已经松动。蝌蚪攻击第一个接近它5英尺以内的人形物体。独自一人，蝌蚪在(1%)小时后长成一个{@creature blue slaad}。进入学院的角色可能会被委以重任，为Wormriddle铲除它。

entries.name: 21. Classrooms
entries: 这些教室提供了一个比讲堂更亲密的学习环境。
{@b Chalkboard}. 安装在西墙上的一块空白黑板下面有一个狭窄的石架，用来接住粉笔灰。黑板下的壁龛里放着刷子和彩色粉笔的棍子。
{@b Desks}. 面对黑板的是十二张书桌，每四人排成三行。每张桌子都有铸铁桌腿，一个雕刻好的铜质座椅，以及一个用各种语言涂鸦的木质书写面。
{@b Hooks}. 后墙有一排石钩，用于悬挂斗篷。

entries.name: 21b. South Classroom
entries: 这个房间与21a区相同，只是有人在黑板上匆匆忙忙地用普通话写下了以下文字："昔日的巫师课取消了。研究Ahghairon约1071 DR。期待一次测验！"
任何通过DC20智力({@skill History})检查成功的角色都会想起1071 DR，即狮吼年，在这一年，大法师Ahghairon，第一任水底世界的领主，创造了魔法屏障来保护他的城市免受龙的侵袭。

entries.name: 22. Potion Brewery

entries: {@b Odor}. 这个房间充满了化学添加剂的味道。
{@b Furnishings}. 在房间的北半部排列着一打肥大的石锅和装满原料的柜子。
{@b Stone Basin}. 房间的南半部是一个20英尺宽、5英尺深的碗状石盆，由3英尺高的挡土墙围住。盆里装的是含有两种毒鸟的毒酒（见下文 "毒酒"）。
大锅是学生们用来酿造药剂的。每个大锅底部有一个阀门，可以打开下面的天然气通风口，然后用火石踏板点燃天然气，加热大锅。
橱柜里有近五百个罐子，里面装的是用来酿造普通和不普通的魔法药水以及其他炼金术混合物的材料。每个罐子都有深渊语的标签。这些材料是惰性的，本身并不特别有价值。

entries.name: Toxic Brew
entries: Failed potions are tossed into the stone basin, adding to the toxic brew within. Any creature that starts its turn immersed in the brew is {@condition poisoned} until it leaves the liquid and washes itself off with water.

Two poison weirds lurk in the toxic brew and try to grapple creatures within reach and pull them into the basin. These creatures are {@creature Water Weird||water weirds} with a challenge rating of 4 (1,100 XP) and these changes:

items: The weirds are {@condition invisible} while fully immersed in the toxic brew. They die if forced to leave the basin or if a {@spell purify food and drink} spell is cast on the toxic brew.
一个生物在每个回合开始时受到10({@dice 3d6})的毒药伤害，同时{@condition grappled}被{@creature poison weird|WDMM}。

entries.name: 23. Wormriddle's Sanctum
entries: 这些房间是由夜魔女Wormriddle（见"{@area Wormriddle the Night Hag|4a8|x}"）占领的。如果她还没有被其他地方遇到并击败，那么她有{@chance 50|50 percent}的机会在{@area area 23b|503|x}。否则，她会在{@area area 23c|506|x}。

The hag's {@spell plane shift} spell doesn't work in Undermountain, but she can use her {@i heartstone} to escape to the Ethereal Plane if outmatched. The flesh golems in {@area area 23c|506|x} form Wormriddle's first line of defense. If they're defeated, the hag seeks out the headmaster, who directs the hag to round up the students and form a posse to hunt down and destroy the interlopers.

entries.name: 23a. Smoke-Filled Hall
entries: This chamber is heavily obscured by smoke billowing out of two stone braziers. The night hag uses the smoke to deter students from entering her sanctum. The smoke blocks vision entirely, and creatures in the smoke are effectively {@condition blinded}. Each brazier bowl contains dozens of tiny holes through which the smoke seeps. Liquid poured into a brazier drains away quickly and does nothing to stop the billowing smoke.
Wormriddle为火炉制作了紧贴的铁盖，并将它们放在23b区。如果两个火炉都被适当覆盖，房间里的烟雾开始消散，使该区域在1分钟后变得轻度模糊，5分钟后变得清晰。

entries.name: 23b. Wormriddle's Den
entries: If Wormriddle the {@creature night hag} is here and has been alerted to the presence of intruders, she assumes the form of a young halfling girl named Medley. In this form, she wears a black witch's hat and sweeps the floor with a small twig broom. The hag's den has these features:
{@b Bones}. 猫的骨头覆盖在地板上。
{@b Iron Lids}. 靠着北墙的是一对25磅重的圆形铁盖子（{@area area 23a|502|x}中火炉的盖子）。
{@b Bed}. 靠近南墙的一张破旧的四柱床上挂着木乃伊式的猫。(在一个发霉的枕头下藏着一个罐子，里面装满了夜魔女的肮脏趾甲屑，夜魔女用它来编织邪恶的魔法）。
{@b Dolls}. 在床的后面，安装在墙上的是一个架子，上面放着八个娃娃。第九个娃娃从架子上掉到了地上。
半身人形态的Wormriddle声称自己是Dweomercore最有前途的学生之一，并提出要带人物去参观。如果角色接受，她会带他们去{@area area 23c|506|x}，并命令她的巨妖进攻。如果妖怪已经被打败了，巫婆就会为他们的损失而哭泣，并变成虚无缥缈的东西来逃离队伍，只有在她召集学生并组成队伍后才会回来。如果角色们在这里攻击她，夜魔女就会变成虚无缥缈的样子，然后逃走。

entries.name: Doll Collection
entries: 这些玩偶是按照目前在Dweomercore就读的学生的样子粗制滥造的。架子上的八个代表斯比特、塞法洛斯克、尼拉斯、斯克里亚纳、角之姐妹、伊兰和卡尔斯提斯。地板上的玩偶代表亚雷克，这个学生最近在{@area area 48|54e|x}被骨魔杀死。每个玩偶都包含了学生的头发碎片或其身体上的一些其他样本（在噬心者Cephalossk的情况下是恶臭的粘液）。
在每个玩偶的胸前都嵌有一个夜魔女的趾甲碎片，象征着她对玩偶所代表的人的秘密力量。成功通过DC15智力检查的角色可以确定，夺取这种力量的方法是用角色自己的身体碎片替换掉女巫的指甲剪。这样做可以使角色利用这个雕像来伤害它所代表的学生。
为了让玩偶发挥作用，它和它所代表的生物都必须在山下。一个将自己的一部分放在特定玩偶中的角色可以使用一个动作，以下列方式之一肢解玩偶，以获得所需的结果。

items: 如果娃娃的眼睛被针刺穿，它所代表的学生就会被{@condition blinded}，直到针被拔掉，或者直到{@spell remove curse}的咒语或类似的魔法被施加在该学生身上。
如果玩偶被刀子或类似的利器刺穿背部，它所代表的学生就会被{@condition paralyzed}，直到工具被移除，或直到{@spell remove curse}的咒语或类似的魔法被施于该学生。

If the doll is set on fire or torn apart, it is destroyed, and the student it represents must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the student is {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. On a failed save, the student instantly drops to 0 hit points and is dying.

entries.name: 23c. Flesh Golem Workshop
entries: If Wormriddle the {@creature night hag} is here, she's in her natural form, searching the room for a misplaced wooden coffer (see "Treasure" below).
{@b Stench}. 房间里有腐烂的肉味。
{@b Golems}. 除非人物已经在其他地方遇到并摧毁了它们，否则有四个{@creature Flesh Golem||flesh golems}躺在房间中央的木质栈台上的污渍白单下。
{@b Work Area}. 第五张桌子被成片的干血包围着，上面布满了锯子、针头、黑线轴和腐烂的肉块。这张桌子旁边有一个木桶，里面放着处于不同腐烂阶段的人形肢体。
{@b Hanging Corpses}. 四具基本完整的人类尸体被挂在安装在南墙上的钩子上。(隐藏在一具挂着的尸体后面的暗门拉开，可以看到一条通往{@area area 25|50b|x}的隧道。)
{@b Pneumatic Tubes}. 附在北墙的是一排13个铜制气动管。铜管下面的架子上放着空的铜罐子。
妖怪们为虫谜服务。如果有一只在她面前发狂，她会试图让它平静下来。如果夜魔女不在场，这些地精只有在受到伤害时才会攻击。

entries.name: Pneumatic Tubes
entries: 这些管道连接到Dweomercore的其他不同地点。从左到右，这些管道都标明了它们的目的地。"湍流"({@area area 8a|4c5|x}), "暴力"({@area area 8b|4c7|x}), "Karstis"({@area area 8c|4c9|x}), "Yarek"({@area area 8d|4ca|x}), "怨恨"({@area area 11a|4cf|x}), "Skrianna"({@area area 11b|4d1|x}), "空置"({@area area 11c|4d4|x}。"Cephalossk" ({@area area 11d|4d5|x}), "Elan" ({@area area 11e|4d7|x}), "Nylas" ({@area area 11f|4da|x}), "Halaster" ({@area area 15a|4e7|x}), "Kitchen" ({@area area 27a|512|x}, 和 "Study Hall" ({@area area 39|531|x})。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Buried beneath the rotting body parts in the barrel is a wooden coffer with tiny air holes bored in its sides. The coffer contains an ordinary frog that spits out a {@item gem of seeing} the first time it's picked up by a humanoid. The frog has no other special abilities but seems pleased to be free of the grisly barrel.

entries.name: 24. Halaster Says What?
entries: 在这条10英尺高的走廊上，两座无生命的、9英尺高的疯狂法师雕像站在加宽部分的角落里。一个生物经过这两座雕像之间时，会从其中一座雕像或另一座雕像，或两座雕像中爆发出声音。掷一个{@dice d8}，然后参考雕像声音效果表来决定发生什么。
每个雕像都是一个大型物体，AC值为15，命中率为50，对中毒和精神伤害免疫。摧毁一个雕像并不能阻止声音从它的位置发出，直到它的所有瓦砾被从该地区移走。

entries.caption: Statue Sound Effects
rows: 一个雕像从10缓慢地倒数到1。
两座雕像异口同声地说："砰--砰--砰--砰！"
一座雕像上写着："出去时别忘了领取你的参与奖杯"。
一个雕像问道："嘿，你看到我的猫了吗？"
一座雕像尖叫着说："呼唤来自山里面！"
一座雕像说："死吧！"同时它施放了一个{@spell power word kill}的法术，目标是触发声音效果的生物。

entries.name: 25. School Supplies
entries: {@b Braziers}. 咆哮的绿色火焰从一对8英尺高的石制水壶中喷出，形状像巨大的圣杯。火焰使这个20英尺高的房间保持高温、干燥和光亮。（钎子建在地板上的天然气通风口上，从不熄灭）。
{@b Guards}. 两个{@creature Spectator||spectators}漂浮在离地面15英尺的地方。
{@b Supplies}. 北面墙上刻有石架，上面放着空白的法术书和成堆的羊皮纸。架子之间挂着铜牌，上面压印着以下普通话："没有布莱克洛克校长的书面同意，请勿搬动物资。"
{@b Secret Door}. 一扇暗门打开，进入一个尘土飞扬的大厅，通向{@area area 23c|506|x}。

The spectators guard the supplies on the shelves and use telepathy to warn intruders not to touch anything without presenting a written note from the headmaster. If such a note is presented, the spectators study it closely; they can recognize a forgery with a successful Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check contested by the forger's Intelligence ({@skill Deception}) check. If the spectators believe the note is genuine, they'll permit the removal of one spellbook and up to ten sheets of parchment. They attack anyone caught trying to steal supplies.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 书架上有13本空白的法术书和300张羊皮纸。每本空白的魔法书价值50GP，每张羊皮纸价值1SP。

entries.name: 26. Bent Hallway
entries: 这个10英尺高、20英尺宽的大厅被一个古老的挖掘物所破坏。有一次，乌鸦试图扩大地牢的这一层，并让奴隶们去凿新的通道。当哈拉斯特和他的学徒们把乌鸦赶走后，这个项目被放弃了。

entries.name: 26a. Slamming Doors
entries: The first time the characters reach the midpoint of this hall, they hear a double door slam shut, either to the northeast ({@chance 30|30 percent} chance) or the southwest ({@chance 70|70 percent} chance). The sound is a harmless illusory regional effect created by Halaster (see "{@area Halaster's Lair|bb9|x}").

entries.name: 26b. Rough-Hewn Tunnels
entries: 一只{@creature cloaker}最近潜入了Dweomercore，并在这里居住下来。当它探测到入侵者时，它就在地板上定居下来，并伪装成一件黑暗的、被丢弃的斗篷，希望能出其不意地抓住猎物。

entries.name: 27. School Meals
entries: 真正的Halaster把两个带刺的魔鬼绑在这些房间里，让他们为Dweomercore的学生和教师准备饭菜。

Characters who examine the outermost doors (each marked with an asterisk on the map) notice thin silver tracery and glyphs around the exterior door frames. A successful DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check reveals that the glyphs around each door prevent devils from passing through the doorway. Scratching away any of the glyphs breaks the magic on that door, enabling devils to pass through it normally.

entries.name: 27a. Kitchen
entries: 厨房很整洁，充满了辛辣的香气和食物烧焦的味道。它包含了一个典型厨房的所有陈设和配件，如准备食物的桌子、塞满了锅碗瓢盆的橱柜和餐具架等。它更值得注意的特点如下。

{@b Kitchen Staff}. Two {@creature Barbed Devil||barbed devils} prepare meals here and attack anyone they don't recognize. Also present are three {@creature Living Unseen Servant|WDMM|living unseen servants} (see {@adventure appendix A|WDMM|25}) that deliver meals.
{@b Stove}. 厨房的核心部分是一个巨大的铁炉子，上面有一个圆顶罩，上面有冒泡的大锅和咝咝作响的小锅。
{@b Pneumatic Tubes}. 十三根铜质气管被固定在一面墙上，下面有一个空铜罐的架子。
魔鬼们半心半意地履行自己的职责，通常是把食物煮得不熟或煮得过熟。尽管他们很不高兴，但他们还是保持厨房的清洁和整齐，这与他们有秩序的天性相称。活着的看不见的仆人们除了送饭之外没有其他职能。

The stove is powered by magic from the Elemental Plane of Fire and puts out a lot of heat. Any creature that touches the stove or starts its turn in contact with it takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) fire damage.

entries.name: Pneumatic Tubes
entries: 这些管道连接到Dweomercore的其他各个地方，用来接收食物订单（尽管食物并不通过它们发送）。从左到右，这些管道都标有它们的目的地。"湍流"（{@area area 8a|4c5|x}），"暴力"（{@area area 8b|4c7|x}），"卡尔斯提斯"（{@area area 8c|4c9|x}），"亚雷克"（{@area area 8d|4ca|x}），"怨恨"（{@area area 11a|4cf|x}），"斯克里安娜"（{@area area 11b|4d1|x}），"空缺"（{@area area 11c|4d4|x} ）。"Cephalossk" ({@area area 11d|4d5|x}), "Elan" ({@area area 11e|4d7|x}), "Nylas" ({@area area 11f|4da|x}), "校长" ({@area area 15a|4e7|x}), "Wormriddle" ({@area area 23c|506|x}), 和 "客座讲师" ({@area area 42|537|x}) 。

entries.name: 27b. Scullery
entries: This room is filled with sinks full of soapy water, shelves of dishes and cookware, and racks of damp towels. If she has not been encountered elsewhere, Violence the tiefling {@creature mage} (see "{@area The Horned Sisters|4af|x}") is here, cleaning dishes as punishment for threatening a guest lecturer.
在校长释放她之前，暴力不被允许离开，她不愿意偷偷摸摸地离开，而面临更大的惩罚。如果人物以友好的方式接近她，暴力建议他们和她的妹妹谈谈，她在咒语大厅（{@area area 17|4f0|x}）。

entries.name: 27c. Larder
entries: 这个房间里有板条箱、木桶和麻袋，里面装满了主食。

entries.name: 28. More Halaster Statues
entries: 这个区域与{@area area 24|50a|x}相同，但在西边增加了一道虚幻的墙。
对西边的墙施展{@spell detect magic}的法术，发现这面墙散发出一种幻觉魔法的光环。它没有实体，生物和物体可以直接穿过它。虚幻的墙可以通过一个成功的{@spell dispel magic}法术(DC14)来移除。

entries.name: 29. Old Books

entries: {@b Light}. 用铁链固定在15英尺高的天花板上的灯笼，间隔20英尺，并有{@spell continual flame}的法术施放在上面。
{@b Bookshelves}. 墙壁上刻有五层书架，上面挤满了古老的皮制书刊。

{@b Illusory Frescoes}. At the north end of the east wall is a 20-foot wide, 8-foot-tall painted fresco. A similar fresco adorns the middle of the west wall. These walls and their frescoes are illusions that conceal passages to {@area areas 28|517|x} and {@area 32|51f}. Hidden behind the illusory wall to the west are four altered helmed horrors (each marked with an H on map 9).
存放在这里的书没有一本是有价值的，许多书都很旧，一打开就会散架。大多数是关于八大魔法流派的教科书，由过去的圣人和学者撰写，它们包含以前的主人手写的边注和涂鸦。

The fresco on the east wall depicts a wizard's tower floating above a city being pulverized by meteor swarms. The fresco on the west wall depicts Halaster riding triumphantly on the back of a blue dracolich. The walls and their frescoes are illusions without substance. Creatures can pass right through them, and an illusory wall can be dispelled with a successful {@spell dispel magic} spell (DC 14).

entries.name: "Halaster Horrors"
entries: 哈拉斯特按照他的样子制作了四个金属构件，为它们配备了以他的面容为原型的金属头盔、钢制法杖和由铰接的、重叠的金属板制成的长袍。这些 "Halaster恐怖 "会攻击任何没有与疯狂法师或与他相似的生物在一起的人。

这些构造物有{@creature Helmed Horror||helmed horrors}的金属杖装备。他们对{@spell cone of cold}、{@spell disintegrate}和{@spell fireball}的法术有免疫能力。在它的回合中，{@creature Halaster horror|WDMM}可以用它的行动用它的法杖进行两次攻击，一击造成8({@dice 1d8 + 4})的重击伤害。

entries.name: 30. Dining Hall

entries: {@b Servants}. 六个{@creature Living Unseen Servant|WDMM|living unseen servants}（见{@adventure appendix A|WDMM|25}）隐蔽地站在房间周围。
{@b Dining Set}. 一张20英尺长、5英尺宽的石桌摆放着餐具，周围有12把高脚木椅。
{@b Light}. 桌子上方悬挂着两个灯笼，上面施了{@spell continual flame}的法术。
{@b Tapestry}. 一幅横跨北墙的陈旧、破旧的挂毯描绘了七个巫师般的人物站成一排。(通往(%%)的通道被这幅挂毯所掩盖）。

The unseen servants' job is to serve meals and tidy up afterward. They bring food from the bone devils in the kitchen ({@area area 27a|512|x}) whenever someone sits down at the table. These servants do not attack and are worth 0 XP.

The figures portrayed on the tapestry are Halaster's first seven apprentices: three robed women ({@creature Arcturia|WDMM}, Jhesiyra Kestellharp, and Marambra Nyghtsteel), three robed men ({@creature Nester|WDMM}, Rantantar, and {@creature Trobriand|WDMM}), and an armored male human ({@creature Muiral|WDMM}) in the middle. Each figure's name is stitched into the tapestry below it. Any character who succeeds on a DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill History}) check recognizes these figures as the Seven.

If it is set on fire, the burning tapestry produces toxic green smoke that coalesces into an {@creature efreeti} and attacks all creatures in the room. The efreeti remains in the room thereafter, until set free by Halaster.

entries.name: 31. Halaster's Secretary
entries: A {@creature nothic} is chained to the floor of this otherwise empty room. The nothic's chain is short enough to prevent the creature from reaching the doors but long enough to let it attack anything that enters the room. The chain can be broken with a strike from a magic weapon or an adamantine weapon, or with a successful DC 25 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check.
绑在nothic头上的是一个类似水晶头盔的装置，上面绑着皮筋、铜线圈和闪光的玻璃二极管，发出嗡嗡的声音。Halaster对nothic施了一个{@spell geas}的咒语，防止它摘下头盔。

当nothic戴着它的怪异头盔时，所有通常由{@creature Halaster Blackcloak|WDMM}接收的{@spell sending}法术都会由nothic接收（见"{@area Sending Spells|019|x}"）。任何戴上头盔的其他生物都会成为这些信息的新接收者。Halaster平均每小时会收到一条{@spell sending}的法术信息。大多数信息来自绝望的、疯狂的法师，他们询问学徒的情况。来自冒险者的粗俗嘲弄也很常见。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: If the word "xunderbrok" (Dwarvish for "secret trove") is spoken aloud in this room, a small stone chest materializes on the floor in the northwest corner. The chest is unlocked and contains 750 gp and three {@item Potion of Greater Healing||potions of greater healing}. (See {@area level 6, area 39c|3a6|x}, for the significance of the word "xunderbrok.")

entries.name: 32. Steel-Sheathed Hall
entries: 这条10英尺高的走廊的墙壁上覆盖着10英尺见方的钢板，这些钢板是由魔法融化在一起的剑和盾牌制成。这些物品的模糊轮廓在闪闪发光的钢铁中依稀可见。

entries.name: 33. Illusion Classroom
entries: 强大的幻觉魔法将这个没有灯光、20英尺高的房间变成了被正午的暖阳照亮的沃特达维亚别墅的院子。它有以下特点。
{@b Decor}. 白色大理石长椅环绕着一个中央喷泉，喷泉的中心是一个挥舞着三叉戟的萨瓦金雕像。
{@b Flora and Fauna}. 常春藤爬上了墙壁，鸟儿在涓涓细流的喷泉的石质突起上栖息，飞来飞去。
{@b Tiefling}. 站在喷泉旁边的是一个有着长角和金色长袍的男性铁弗林巫师。(这个人物和它周围的环境一样，是虚幻的）。

The tiefling introduces itself as Professor Figment and invites new arrivals to sit on the benches and make themselves comfortable. It then begins to tell lengthy stories about famous illusionists and their art, in a rather exhaustive and encyclopedic manner. A successful {@spell dispel magic} spell (DC 17) cast on Professor Figment ends the illusion. The first creature that tries to dispel the illusion of Professor Figment and fails is targeted by a {@spell phantasmal killer} spell (save DC 22) as the tiefling instructor briefly and vividly transforms into the target's worst nightmare; then it calmly continues with "Now, where was I?"

The illusory objects and wildlife seem real to the senses. The illusion of the villa, the fountain, the sunlight, and the wildlife can be ended with a successful {@spell dispel magic} spell (DC 19). The first time an attempt to dispel the illusion fails, all creatures in the room are targeted by a {@spell weird} spell (save DC 22) as the surroundings transform to reflect each target's worst nightmares.

entries.name: 34. Transmutation Classroom

entries: {@b Light}. 20英尺高的房间由间隔15英尺的壁灯上的{@spell continual flame}法术照明。火焰每分钟变换一次颜色。
{@b Circle}. 地板上一个直径20英尺的圆圈内刻着一个三角形。三角形的中间矗立着一个人类男孩的金色雕像，他举起双臂以示胜利。(这个雕像是由魔法改造的{@creature wyvern}。)
{@b Iron Cage}. 一个10英尺见方、15英尺高的铁笼子空着，它的大门开着。(笼子的门上没有锁，因为巫师们用{@spell arcane lock}的法术来关住它）。
斯比特-哈罗代尔用一个{@spell true polymorph}的法术将一只狼牙棒变成了自己的金色雕像。见过斯比特的人物会认出这个雕像的模样。雕像不会被发现有魔力，但把它从圆圈中移走会导致{@spell true polymorph}的效果结束，这时它就会恢复成一只狼獾并进行攻击。

entries.name: Thaumaturgic Circle
entries: 一个{@spell detect magic}的咒语揭示了地板上的符号周围有一个转化魔法的光环。任何研究这个圆圈并成功通过DC20智力({@skill Arcana})检查的角色都可以确定其属性。如果该角色是一个魔法师，其奥术传统是转化学派，那么该检查是有优势的。
当一个受转化咒语影响的生物或物体完全包含在圆圈中时，该咒语的效果不会结束，直到圆圈被打破或目标被从圆圈中移除。受转化法术影响的生物在物理上被困于圈内，在法术持续生效时无法自行离开。

entries.name: 35. Necromancy Classroom

entries: {@b Ghastly Decor}. 在这个圆顶的25英尺高的房间里，墙壁和屋顶上贴着数百具人形骨架，以一种装饰性的但却很可怕的方式排列。
{@b Circle}. 地板上刻有一个直径20英尺的魔法阵，上面的石刻散发出昏暗的紫光。七具用麻布包裹的人类尸体堆在圆圈的中间。
{@b Nester}. 漂浮在圆圈旁边的是一个头骨，眼窝里有针尖大的紫光，下面挂着两只骷髅手臂，其中一只攥着一把骨质匕首。(这是哈拉斯特最年长的学徒之一（1%）的全部遗物。）
这七个人的尸体是从斯库尔波特的一个来源获得的，正等待着被变成僵尸。他们目前是无生命的，无害的。

entries.name: Necromantic Circle
entries: A {@spell detect magic} spell reveals a strong aura of necromancy magic around the circle. A character who studies the circle and succeeds on a DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check can ascertain its properties. The check is made with advantage if the character is a wizard whose arcane tradition is the School of Necromancy.
任何在圆圈内被激活的骷髅或尸体都会变成亡灵，命中率等于其最大命中率。此外，亡灵在面对任何变成亡灵的效果时，都会获得蓄力的优势。

entries.name: Nester
entries: {@creature Nester|WDMM}变身为巫师的努力取得了有限的成功。他没有遵循规定的方法，而是设计了自己的技术，并搞砸了仪式的咒语。结果，他的法器被打碎了，他的身体和思想也慢慢崩溃了。漂浮的头骨和悬挂的骷髅手臂是他仅存的东西；它们的动作就像附着在一个{@condition invisible}的身体上。
{@creature Nester|WDMM}在死灵法术方面对德威姆科雷的学生进行教育，但他的知识已经变得支离破碎，而且他的思想倾向于徘徊。他认为这些冒险者是被派来学习最黑暗的魔法的学生，并开始用心灵感应给他们讲授僵尸，经常重复自己的话。他攻击任何试图在讲座结束前离开的人。
{@creature Nester|WDMM}是一个{@creature archmage}，有这些变化。

items: {@creature Nester|WDMM}是亡灵和混乱的邪恶。
他能听懂奥兰语、普通话、德拉贡语、矮人语、巨人语和特兰语，但不能说话。(他使用{@spell Rary's telepathic bond}来交流。)
他准备了{@spell animate dead}的法术而不是{@spell fly}，准备了{@spell blight}的法术而不是{@spell banishment}，准备了{@spell Rary's telepathic bond}的法术而不是{@spell scrying}。他不需要物质成分来施展他准备的任何法术。
He has {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet.

entries.name: 36. Wizards' Library
entries: This 10-foot-high chamber contains rows of 8-foot-tall wooden bookshelves packed with hundreds of arcane textbooks and dusty spellbooks. The spellbooks contain virtually all known wizard spells of 4th level and lower. A character who pores over the books for 1 hour can find a particular spell by succeeding on an Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check with a DC of 10 + the spell's level.
{@b Desks}. 在房间的西北半部，十张石桌排列成一个半圆形，面向内侧。
{@b Orb in Hand}. 在房间的中央，一只幽灵般的手高举着一个灰色的水晶球。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 这个球体是一种罕见的神奇物品，叫做{@item professor orb|WDMM}。每个{@item professor orb|WDMM}都是一个光滑、坚固、5磅重的烟灰色石英球体，大约有柚子那么大。仔细观察可以发现球体深处有两个或更多的银光针尖。

一个{@item professor orb|WDMM}是有知觉的，具有学者的个性。它的排列方式由《{@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}》第七章中"{@book Sentient Magic Items|DMG|7|Sentient Magic Items} "部分的排列表来决定。不管它的性格如何，球体的智力为18，智慧和魅力的分数由滚动{@dice 3d6}来决定每一种能力。球体能说、能读、能理解四种语言，并能在60英尺范围内正常看和听。与大多数有生命的物品不同，球体没有自己的意志，不能与拥有它的生物发生冲突。
A {@item professor orb|WDMM}对四个狭窄的学术科目有广泛的知识。当进行智力检定以回忆其任何专业领域的传说时，球体有一个+9的奖励卷（包括其智力修正值）。
除了它所拥有的知识外，{@item professor orb|WDMM}可以随意施展{@spell mage hand}的咒语。它只在运送自己时使用该咒语。它的法术能力是智力。

entries.name: Professor Bring
entries: 在这个房间里发现的球体是合法中立的，它自我介绍说是Bring教授。它的智慧值为11，魅力值为6。它能说、能读、能理解深渊语、普通话、矮人语和特兰语。它把话语串成长长的、似乎没有尽头的句子，并以沉闷的单调语调说话。它有以下四个方面的专长。

items: The history of Undermountain (see "{@area Dungeon History|006|x}")
盾牌矮人的仪容习惯
宝石鉴定
Xorn（如{@book Monster Manual|MM}中所述）。

entries.name: 38. "I Just Met a Girl Named Skrianna"

entries: {@b Carvings}. 这个大厅的墙壁被雕刻成树干的样子。拱形的、10英尺高的天花板就像一个由枯枝和树枝组成的天幕。

{@b Skrianna Shadowdusk}. The first time the characters enter this hall, they encounter Skrianna Shadowdusk, a female human {@creature mage} (see "{@area Skrianna Shadowdusk|4ae|x}"). She is leaving the study hall ({@area area 39|531|x}) and heading to her quarters ({@area area 11b|4d1|x}), or vice versa. A {@spell light} cantrip cast on the top of her staff lights her path. Skrianna's {@creature shield guardian} marches a few steps behind her. Floating nearby is a {@creature grell} valet that has Skrianna's spellbook wrapped in its tentacles.
如果人物被校长护送通过这个大厅，Skrianna会试图穿过他们的队伍，以表明他们，而不是她，必须靠边站。如果这导致了暴力，校长会尽快平息冲突，并告诉Skrianna，她被限制在她的宿舍里。一旦她离开了校长和人物的视线，她就拿着她的法术书，按照命令回到她的宿舍，但在此之前，她还命令她的格林尔男仆跟踪聚会，监视他们的活动，并向她汇报。
如果人物没有护卫，斯克瑞娜就问他们："你是九层地狱里的谁？" 如果很明显这些人物不属于Dweomercore，Skrianna会在安全距离内攻击他们，而盾牌守护者和Grell则在近距离内与她的攻击者搭讪。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Skrianna的法术书包含了她所准备的所有法术。
{@b Silence}. 一个永久的{@spell silence}法术可以掩盖这个20英尺高的房间里的所有噪音。一个成功的{@spell dispel magic}法术(DC17)可以结束这个效果。
{@b Furnishings}. 房间里有一排排整齐的木质书桌，配有舒适的配套椅子，以及放置在角落里的软垫阅读椅。每张桌子都有一个抽屉，里面有空白的羊皮纸、羽毛笔和墨水瓶。
{@b Pneumatic Tubes}. 十三根铜质气动管被固定在北墙，下面有一个空铜罐的架子。

entries.name: Pneumatic Tubes
entries: 这些管道连接到Dweomercore的其他不同地点。从左到右，这些管道都标有各自的目的地。"湍流"({@area area 8a|4c5|x}), "暴力"({@area area 8b|4c7|x}), "Karstis"({@area area 8c|4c9|x}), "Yarek"({@area area 8d|4ca|x}), "怨恨"({@area area 11a|4cf|x}), "Skrianna"({@area area 11b|4d1|x}), "空置"({@area area 11c|4d4|x}。"Cephalossk" ({@area area 11d|4d5|x}), "Elan" ({@area area 11e|4d7|x}), "Nylas" ({@area area 11f|4da|x}), "Halaster" ({@area area 15a|4e7|x}), "Wormriddle" ({@area area 23c|506|x}), 和 "客座讲师" ({@area area 42|537|x})。

entries.name: 40. Empty Room
entries: 这个房间被扫得干干净净，但目前还没有人使用。东墙的一扇暗门推开后，可以看到一个空的壁橱，壁橱后面还有一个暗门。
{@b Hole in Floor}. 地板上刻着一个光滑的、10英尺见方的石井。(竖井下降了10英尺，然后在{@area area 3b on level 10|566|x}的天花板上打开，直接在那里的巨大祭坛上方）。
{@b Alcoves}. 墙壁上有六个黑暗的凹槽。(在其中一个的后面有一个暗门，通向一个壁橱，壁橱里有另一个暗门，通向{@area area 40|534|x}。)
{@b Parlor}. 房间的南半部被改成了会客室，有一张写字台，一把相配的椅子，和一对铺在地毯上的软垫沙发。书桌附近有三根铜制的气动管，固定在墙上，下面有一个空铜罐的架子。
{@b Bed}. 在房间的北端有一张舒适的红木床，其床柱顶部有小恶魔的雕刻。
{@b Secret Door}. 在挂在墙上的一幅6英尺高的木质画框的Halaster画后面，有一扇秘密的门，拉开后可以看到一个小房间，其后墙上嵌有一个石拱门。

entries.name: Arch Gate to Level 7
entries: The arch hidden behind the secret door is one of Halaster's magic gates (see "{@area Gates|028|x}"). Inscribed on the wall inside the arch is the following riddle in Common: "What appears once in an hour, twice in a blue moon, and never in sunshine?" The answer is "The letter O." The rules of this gate are as follows:

items: 如果拱门附近30英尺内的人大声回答了谜语，并且回答正确，大门就会打开1分钟。

Characters must be 9th level or higher to pass through this gate (see "{@area Jhesiyra Kestellharp|016|x}"). The first creature to pass through the gate triggers an elder rune (see "{@area Elder Runes|027|x}").
A creature that passes through the gate appears in {@area area 22 on level 7|a9d|x}, in the closest unoccupied space next to the identical gate located there.

entries.name: Pneumatic Tubes
entries: 这些管道连接到Dweomercore的其他地点。从左到右，这些管道都标有各自的目的地。"校长办公室"({@area area 15a|4e7|x})，"厨房"({@area area 27a|512|x})和 "学习厅"({@area area 39|531|x})。

entries.name: 43. Dusty Alcoves

entries: {@b Dusty Alcoves}. 这个大厅里有六个10英尺高、10英尺宽、10英尺深的尘土飞扬的凹槽。
{@b Hidden Pit}. 其中一个中间的凹槽有一个断裂的地板，覆盖着一个100英尺深的坑。

The pit can be detected with a successful DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check, but only if the dust covering the floor is swept away. A creature that steps into the alcove with the breakaway floor falls through it and plummets to the bottom of the pit, taking damage as normal. A creature can climb the pit's rough walls with a successful DC 15 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check.

entries.name: 44. Dweomercore's Back Door

entries: {@b Yugoloths}. 两个(1%)(在地图9上标记为M)和一个(2%)(在地图9上标记为N)隐藏在西面和东面的虚幻墙壁后面。

{@b Secret Door}. A secret door set into the west wall pushes open to reveal a corridor. Characters who follow this corridor come to a stone staircase that descends 40 feet to {@area area 1 on level 10|55d|x}.
一个{@spell detect magic}的咒语揭示了虚幻的墙的本质。虚幻的墙没有实体，生物和物体可以直接穿过它。每个虚幻的墙都可以通过成功的（1%）（DC14）来驱除。
尤戈洛特人有命令要杀死任何没有Dweomercore教员陪同的人（无论是阿卡纳罗斯还是夜行者）。

entries.name: 45. Halaster's Sanctuary
entries: 这些区域是哈拉斯特在这一层的私人住所，尽管疯狂法师本人并不在场。

entries.name: 45a. Spectral Skull
entries: 通往这个房间的单门向内打开，向东摆动。这个房间有一个20英尺高的平顶，包含以下特点。

{@b Statues}. Two 11-foot-tall statues of elephant-headed men stand in the southern corners. The one closer to the southern exit is a {@creature stone golem}. The other statue is inanimate and harmless.
{@b Dais}. 一扇雕刻着尖叫的魔鬼脸的拱形双门紧闭着站在台子的后面。漂浮在双门前的是一个巨大的、幽灵般的人类头骨，长着长长的胡须。

The devil-faced doors have nine hidden locks, each of which requires a separate {@spell knock} spell to open. Both doors also swing open when one or the other is touched with a silvered weapon, or if someone speaks Infernal while standing on the dais.

幽灵般的头骨既不是生物也不是物体，而是一种神奇的力量。它有{@sense darkvision}和{@sense truesight}的范围为60英尺，但它不能感知任何被{@spell nondetection}法术或类似魔法所守护的生物。骷髅头不能移动，也不能被移出它的空间，它也不能被损坏。因为它没有实体，其他生物可以占据它的空间。对头骨成功施展{@spell dispel magic}的法术(DC19)会使它消失1分钟。当头骨被包含在一个反魔法场中时，它也会消失。其他魔法对它没有任何影响。

If the skull sees any creature other than the real Halaster in the room, it screams, "You're not me!" When this happens, all creatures in the vicinity must roll initiative, including the stone golem. The skull acts on initiative count 30 and again on initiative count 15. On each of the skull's turns, all creatures in the room except the stone golem are telekinetically thrust straight up into the air, then cast down hard onto the floor. Each target takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) bludgeoning damage and ends the turn {@condition prone} in its space. (Although the telekinesis effect is magical, the damage it deals is not.) Only when there are no more creatures left to toss about does the ghostly skull cease its assault.
当幽灵般的头骨发出尖叫时，巨魔利用它在战斗中的第一个回合堵住了南面的出口，将门推开并自动将较小的生物推开。通过占据门北面的空间，巨魔阻止了门的打开。傀儡保持静止状态，并攻击它所能触及的生物，只有当房间里没有其他生物时，它才会回到原来的位置。

entries.name: 45b. Halaster's Study

entries: {@b Desk}. 一张布满融化的蜡烛和空墨水瓶的黑色水晶桌矗立在房间中央。

{@b Chair}. Behind the desk, attached to a thin iron chain and draped over one corner of a tall black crystal chair, is a fist-sized, gleaming black gemstone—the control gem for the death slaad on level 8 (a {@spell legend lore} spell or similar magic confirms as much).

The desk has a single drawer, in which Halaster has placed one of his many spellbooks. This thin tome has a black leather cover with Halaster's rune burned into it. Any creature other than Halaster that opens the book triggers an elder rune that targets that individual (see "{@area Elder Runes|027|x}"). Draw a card from the {@deck Elder Runes Deck|WDMM} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDMM|26}) to determine which rune appears.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 这本法术书的大部分页面都被撕掉了。在剩下的几页上，写着以下微不足道的咒语集合。{@spell disguise self}, {@spell levitate}, {@spell nondetection}, 和 {@spell unseen servant}。

entries.name: 46. Detention Area
entries: Dweomercore的教师和学生有权自由使用被囚禁在这里的生物，作为他们演示和实验的试验对象。

entries.name: 46a. Prison Cells
entries: A 10-foot-high hallway contains six iron-barred cells, their doors held shut with {@spell arcane lock} spells. Faculty members and students can ignore the spells and open the cell doors normally. Forcing open a door requires a successful DC 25 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check or a {@spell knock} spell.
牢房里除了垃圾桶外没有其他家具。大厅东侧的中间牢房关押着三个{@creature Goblin||goblins}被虫洞从阿兹罗克监狱({@area level 3, area 21|205|x})劫持的人。他们的名字是邪指、普尔克和托布尔。如果他们被救出来，这些地精会等到救他们的人睡着了，然后抢劫他们并逃跑。在那之前，他们会跟着队伍，并尽可能地少做贡献。

entries.name: 46b. Petrified Wizard
entries: 这个房间中间的雕像是一个曾经的学生--一个龙裔法师，一个多世纪前哈拉斯特用{@spell wish}的咒语把他变成了石头。这座雕像站在一个2英尺高、5英尺宽的石柱上，上面刻有以下普通话："遵守规则。服从你的教官。不要成为这个人。"

entries.name: 47. Devil on the Loose
entries: 一个叫亚雷克的魔法师在{@area area 48|54e|x}召唤了一个骨魔，并答应放它自由，条件是它要杀死他的克星--史克丽娜-影子黄昏。骨魔同意了。在亚雷克释放骨魔后，骨魔立即杀死了他。为了履行它与法师的协议，骨魔现在必须杀死斯克瑞娜。然而，放置在这些房间上的防护装置阻止了恶魔的离开，而哈拉斯特在山下放置的更大的防护装置则阻止了它通过飞机转移逃走。

Before he died, Yarek used a {@spell sending} spell to warn the headmaster about the escaped devil. If the arcanaloth persuades the characters to destroy the devil in exchange for safe passage through Dweomercore, it waits patiently for them in {@area area 46b|547|x} while they confront the fiend in these chambers.

entries.name: 47a. Alas, Poor Yarek
entries: Characters who examine the doors to this room (each marked with an asterisk on map 9) notice thin silver tracery and glyphs around the exterior door frames. A successful DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check reveals that the glyphs around each door prevent devils from passing through the doorway. Scratching away any of the glyphs breaks the magic on that door, allowing devils to pass through it normally.
这个房间包含以下内容。
{@b Tapestry}. A blood-spattered tapestry hanging on the west wall depicts scores of demons and devils locked in battle. (A secret door hidden behind the tapestry opens into {@area area 47c|54d|x}.)
{@b Yarek}. 一个穿着血腥长袍的男性人类尸体（亚雷克）躺在挂毯前的地板上。
{@b Illusory Wall}. 北墙有20英尺宽的部分是虚幻的，掩盖了{@area area 47b|54b|x}之外。一个{@spell detect magic}的咒语揭示了虚幻的墙壁的真实面目。它没有实体，生物和物体可以直接穿过它。虚幻的墙会被一个成功的{@spell dispel magic}法术所摧毁（DC14）。

Yarek dragged himself across the floor before he finally expired. The characters can follow Yarek's bloody trail through the illusory wall into {@area area 47b|54b|x}, where the devil mortally wounded him.
