A character who examines the corpse and succeeds on a DC 10 Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check can ascertain that the mage was stabbed several times by a piercing weapon (the devil's hooked polearm) and has a deep, {@condition poisoned} wound in his chest (caused by the bone devil's stinger). A search of the body yields nothing of value.

entries.name: 47b. Dealing with the Bone Devil

entries: {@b Devil}. 在虚幻的墙外，等待着一个拿着钩状杆枪的{@creature bone devil}（见 "变体。Bone Devil Polearm "的侧边栏，在{@book Monster Manual|MM}中的 "Devils "条目中）。
{@b Statue}. 一个凸起的石室里有一尊破损的女鸦人雕像，她骑着一只巨型蜥蜴。蜥蜴的尾巴尖端已经断裂，不见了。(雕像是无生命的，没有魔法。）
骨魔不愿意和一群装备精良的冒险者打交道，因为结果很可能与它的生存和逃跑目标相冲突。如果角色们愿意把它从这些房间的禁锢中解救出来，刮掉守卫出口的银色石刻，那么骨魔就会追求一个互利的安排，同时利用一个措辞不当的协议为自己谋利。一旦逃脱，它就会试图追杀斯克瑞娜-暗影黄昏，从而履行对其已故召唤者的承诺。如果角色们杀死了恶魔，它就会变成一滩臭烘烘的汁液，并留下它的钩状武器。

entries.name: 47c. Dweomercore's Vault
entries: 靠南墙堆放着七个铁箱子，里面装着Dweomercore的运营资金（用于支付客座教员，购买学校用品等）。这些箱子目前是空的，哈拉斯特还没有时间或意愿去补充它们。

entries.name: 48. Conjuration Classroom
entries: 在这个20英尺高的圆顶室的地板上刻有一个巨大的五角星。研究五芒星并成功通过DC20智力检查的人物可以确定它的属性。如果该人物是一个巫师，他的魔法传统是施法学派，那么该检查是有优势的。
任何出现在五角星内的魔物都会被困于此，直到召唤者释放它，直到魔物受到来自外界的伤害，或者直到其他生物进入这个圈子。破坏五芒星会使它失去力量，并释放出被困在里面的任何生物。

entries.name: 49. Arch Gate to Level 14

entries: {@b Arch}. 嵌在东南墙中间的一个石拱门，其基石上刻有一本打开的书的图案。
{@b Secret Door}. 一扇暗门打开，进入一条向东的尘土飞扬的隧道。
The arch is one of Halaster's gates (see "{@area Gates|028|x}"). Its rules are as follows:

items: 当站在拱门5英尺范围内时，拿着一本打开的书会使大门打开1分钟。当大门打开时，书会变成灰尘，即使它是一本法术书。
角色必须达到13级或以上才能通过此门（见"{@area Jhesiyra Kestellharp|016|x}"）。第一个通过此门的生物会触发一个长老符文（见"{@area Elder Runes|027|x}"）。
A creature that passes through the gate appears in {@area area 25 on level 14|74e|x}, in the closest unoccupied space next to the identical gate located there.

entries.name: Aftermath
entries: 卷入学院政治的人物可以与某些学生形成脆弱的休战关系，同时与其他学生为敌。一个或多个学生的死亡对Dweomercore的日常事务影响不大，因为教员对学生没有感情。在一个工作日内，校长会用新来的学生取代死去的学生，并开始对他们进行指导。

杀死弓箭手迫使沃姆里德尔站出来，在她的肉体护卫的支持下担任校长的职务。如果夜魔女也被杀了，所有剩下的学生都会迅速地互相攻击。伊兰-塔诺尔（Elan Tanor'thal）与塞法罗斯克（Cephalossk）联手挑战斯比特-哈罗代尔（Spite Harrowdale），尼拉斯-乔德（Nylas Jowd）试图逐一杀死长角姐妹，而斯克里安娜-影子黄昏（Skrianna Shadowdusk）则等待着看这些冲突如何发展，然后再去找那些幸存的人。任何仍然站着的学生从他们倒下的同龄人身上收集他们能收集到的贵重物品，然后逃离Dweomercore。

data.name: Level 10: Muiral's Gauntlet
entries: {@creature Muiral|WDMM}的高塔是为四个11级的角色设计的。克服这一关的挑战的人应该获得足够的XP，至少可以提升到12级的一半。在进行{@creature Muiral|WDMM}的高塔游戏之前，请回顾一下{@book Monster Manual|MM}的 "精灵族。鸦人 "条目，因为暗黑精灵在整个暗黑山的这一关中占有突出的地位。

entries.name: What Dwells Here?
entries: {@creature Muiral|WDMM}的Misshapen，Halaster的学徒之一，在黑暗精灵被迫放弃这里后，声称这个由乌鸦建造的关卡是他的私人狩猎场。在{@creature Muiral|WDMM}控制下的地牢区域，由于年久失修、无人问津，已经变成了以前的苍白阴影。
在一位名叫Vlonwelv Auvryndar的女祭司的领导下，乌鸦人最近又回到了这里，重新夺回了这一楼层。奥夫林达家族和它的盟友希望在这里建立一个永久的据点，并配备一个完全翻新的供奉洛尔思的神庙。这一层的乌鸦部队得到了一帮由可憎的领袖戈尔齐尔指挥的troglodytes的支持。

entries.name: Muiral the Misshapen
entries: 尽管被哈拉斯特招募为保镖，{@creature Muiral|WDMM}（见{@adventure appendix A|WDMM|25}）也在疯狂法师手下学习魔法。他不再是人类，他把自己的上半身嫁接到一只巨大的蝎子身上。
由于他自己没有希望击退乌鸦，也没有来自哈拉斯特的帮助，{@creature Muiral|WDMM}尽力守住他剩下的东西。任何侵入他领地的行为都会遭到致命的打击。
To determine where the characters first encounter {@creature Muiral|WDMM}, roll a {@dice d20} and consult the following table:

entries.name: House Auvryndar
entries: 奥夫林达家族利用{@creature Muiral|WDMM}的高塔作为突袭其他楼层的中转站，并作为对弗雷斯家族发动攻击的基地，弗雷斯家族是一个敌对的乌鸦家族，在第12层有一座堡垒。

entries.name: Vlonwelv Auvryndar
entries: 弗隆韦尔夫控制着{@area areas 13|59b|x}到{@area 30|5ec}。冒险者可能已经遇到了她的几个孩子：她的儿子Ranaghax和女儿T'rissa、Sylkress、Pellanonia，在第三层，她的女儿Melith，在第四层。这位女祭司是个彻头彻尾的外交家。虽然她对冒险者在她的堡垒中的存在感到愤怒，但一开始她还是亲切地对待他们，为他们提供食物、饮料、住所和安全通道。作为回报，她要求他们追捕并杀死{@creature Muiral|WDMM}，后者已经成为不受欢迎的干扰因素。如果他们拒绝，弗龙威夫就会杀死他们。

The drow priestess is never encountered without her adopted drow daughter, {@creature Zress Orlezziir|WDMM}, and a yochlol advisor disguised as a female drow named Chalizana. To determine where the characters first meet Vlonwelv and her retinue, roll a {@dice d20} and consult the following table:

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 弗隆韦尔夫戴着两个带网的铂金手镯（每个250金币）和一个蜘蛛形状的黑曜石吊坠，这个吊坠被施以魔法使其腿部抽搐（50金币）。这个护身符可以作为Lolth的一个神圣象征。

entries.name: Zress Orlezziir
entries: Zress是一个来自被摧毁的乌鸦家族的致命战士，她被Vlonwelv Auvryndar收养，并准备为她的救世主服务而死。弗隆韦尔夫对兹瑞斯的信任超过了对自己孩子的信任，她把自己的养女留在身边。在确定弗隆韦尔夫的起始地点时，假设兹雷兹与她同行。

If you have {@book Mordenkainen's Tome of Foes|MTF}, use the {@creature drow house captain|MTF} stat block in that book to represent Zress. Otherwise, Zress is a drow {@creature champion|VGM} (see {@adventure appendix A|WDMM|25}), with these changes:

items: Zress是中性的邪恶。

She has these racial traits: She speaks Elvish and Undercommon. She has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep. She has {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet. She can innately cast {@spell dancing lights} at-will, and {@spell darkness}, {@spell faerie fire}, and {@spell levitate}(self only) each once per day. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). While in sunlight, she has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Zress wears {@item mithral armor} (plate). Affixed to her spider silk cloak is an obsidian scarab engraved with the insignia of House Auvryndar (25 gp).

entries.name: Gorzil's Gang
entries: 弗隆韦尔夫有20个troglodytes为她服务。其中一个是一个肥胖的、令人厌恶的标本，名叫戈齐尔。作为爬行动物之神Laogzed的追随者，Gorzil秘密地希望废黜Vlonwelv，夺取{@creature Muiral|WDMM}高塔的控制权，并把它变成一个troglodyte warren。然而，他的梦想远远超出了他的能力范围。
The drow have trained Gorzil's gang to wear armor and fight with swords. All the members are {@creature Troglodyte||troglodytes}, with these changes:

items: 每个蛙人都穿着胸甲（AC14），并挥舞着一把长剑，用它来代替它的爪子。
作为其回合中的一个动作，蛙人可以用长剑进行两次攻击，而不是用它的咬合和爪子进行攻击。它用两只手挥舞长剑，一击造成7({@dice 1d10 + 2})的砍击伤害。
蛙人听得懂暗语，但说不出暗语。

entries.name: Wandering Monsters
entries: If {@creature Muiral|WDMM} survives his first encounter with the adventurers, he begins patrolling {@area areas 1|55d|x} through {@area 5|56d} and {@area areas 7|579|x} through {@area 12|599}, looking for signs of other intrusion. The characters might also encounter small packs of {@creature Skeleton||skeletons}, {@creature Zombie||zombies}, and {@creature Ghoul||ghouls} that {@creature Muiral|WDMM} has created by casting {@spell animate dead} and {@spell create undead} spells on drow corpses. These undead shouldn't pose much of a threat to high-level adventurers, but they help reinforce the danger that {@creature Muiral|WDMM} represents.

Adventurers exploring {@area areas 13|59b|x} through {@area 30|5ec} are likely to encounter one or more drow patrols, each consisting of {@dice 1d4 + 2} {@creature Drow Elite Warrior||drow elite warriors} wearing the insignia of House Auvryndar. The leader of such a patrol is always a female drow who reports directly to {@creature Zress Orlezziir|WDMM}. Most drow patrols are spoiling for a fight; if a battle turns against them, however, they withdraw to a more defensible location.

entries.name: Exploring This Level
entries: 本关的所有位置描述都以地图10为关键。冒险者最可能从{@adventure level 9|WDMM|9}的楼梯(靠近{@area area 1|55d|x})进入{@creature Muiral|WDMM}的高塔，或者从一个竖井下到{@area area 3b|566|x}。
{@creature Muiral|WDMM}的高塔具有乌鸦堡垒中常见的建筑特征。它的20英尺宽、30英尺高的走廊有拱形的天花板，每隔一段距离就有网状的格子拱门作为支撑和椽子来连接。这些 "网状拱门 "中的许多都已破裂和断裂。这些拱门的碎片散落在地板上，还有雕刻成蜘蛛形状的残破石炉。被(1%)杀死的闯入者的骨头也散落在地牢里。
在这一层中发现的15英尺高的双扇门上雕刻着网状的图案，其特征是碎裂和磨损。

entries.name: 1. Shattered Mirrors
entries: 这条走廊位于第九层楼梯的底部。其特点如下。
{@b Broken Mirrors}. 十几面破碎的镜子的碎片覆盖在地板上。(穆里尔在愤怒中摧毁了这些镜子。)
{@b Empty Frames}. 高大的、长方形的石雕框架排列在墙上。它们似乎曾经装过镜子，但现在是空的。（其中一个框架后面的墙壁隐藏着一扇秘密的门，可以旋转到（1%）。

Characters who pass through this hall might catch fleeting glimpses of Halaster reflected in the mirror shards instead of their own reflections—one of the Mad Mage's harmless regional effects (see "{@area Halaster's Lair|bb9|x}").

entries.name: 2. Secret Hallway

entries: {@b Empty Frames}. 空的镜框覆盖在墙上，周围的地板上堆满了反射玻璃的碎片（就像在{@area area 1|55d|x}中）。
{@b Skeleton}. 一个身穿破烂的黑色斗篷的精灵（1%）站在大厅的中央。这具骷髅少了一只手，另一只手紧握着一根魔杖（见 "宝物"）。
骷髅在{@creature Muiral|WDMM}给它加了动画后不久就发现自己被困在这个大厅里。在它的每个回合中，骷髅都会用它的魔杖威胁性地指向入侵者，但它什么也做不了，因为它没有法术也不能说话。由于没有武器，这个骷髅的挑战等级为0，XP值为0。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: The skeleton's wand is a {@item +1 wand of the war mage}.

entries.name: 3. Haunted Temple of Lolth
entries: 这座蜘蛛女王的庙宇有拱形的30英尺高的天花板，上面布满了蜘蛛网。{@creature Muiral|WDMM}参观了这座神庙，听取了三位乌鸦女祭司的哀叹，她们失去了洛尔思的青睐，变成了女妖。

如果{@creature Muiral|WDMM}(见{@adventure appendix A|WDMM|25})在这里，并探测到人物接近，他对自己施展{@spell greater invisibility}，并站在{@area area 3a|564|x}的雕像之间。当第一个角色进入房间时，{@creature Muiral|WDMM}变得可见，因为他施放了一个{@spell wall of force}的法术，利用屏障将该角色与其他成员隔绝开来。然后他与该角色进行单挑。如果墙被推倒或他不敌，他就对{@area area 3a|564|x}中的一个Lolth雕像或{@area area 3b|566|x}中的两个蜘蛛形火炉施放{@spell animate objects}。
{@creature Muiral|WDMM}与女妖保持至少30英尺的距离，以避免它们的悲鸣。他对它们可怕的面孔有免疫力，因为他曾多次凝视过它们。

entries.name: Vlonwelv's Pulpit
entries: 在{@area area 25b|5d1|x}的蜘蛛宝座上，有一种生物可以传送信息，在{@creature Muiral|WDMM}的高塔的每个房间和走廊里回响。鸦人女祭司Vlonwelv用这个装置来进行宣传、传教、召唤下属、调集部队和嘲弄入侵者。当人物通过(2%)的高塔时，他们会听到一个或多个Vlonwelv的公告在整个地牢里回荡，她的话是用精灵语说的。一些翻译包括以下内容。

items: "蜘蛛女王保佑奥夫林达家族！"。打破弗雷斯家族对下面通道的控制的战斗带来了一场又一场的胜利。我们已经夺取了以前由敌人占据的关键位置。弗雷斯家族的失败是不可避免的。赞美Lolth！"
"Gelgos Argonrae和Jevan Kron'tayne因抓获一名弗雷斯家族的间谍而受到表扬。奖励将支付给他们每一个家族。赞美Lolth！"
"蜘蛛女王看着。我们都是她的孩子。赞美Lolth！"
"Minarra。马上到神庙报到。"
"第六巡逻队，向Zress上尉报告，立即下达命令。"
"不要理会关于我们上面的据点受到攻击的虚假报告。我们的部队在T'rissa Auvryndar的指挥下已经占领了Stromkuhldur。斯库尔波特将迅速跟进。赞美Lolth！"

entries.name: 3a. Narthex
entries: Two 20-foot-tall statues of Lolth guard the mouth of the temple. Each statue is a Huge object that can be climbed with a successful DC 10 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check.
{@b West Statue}. 这座雕像描绘了洛尔思的畸形形态，上半身是一个女性乌鸦，下半身是一只臃肿的蜘蛛。雕像从它举起的双手中投出石网，在天花板上扇动。
{@b East Statue}. 这座雕像描绘了洛尔思的乌鸦形态，在石蜘蛛爬过她的身体时，她亲吻着一个祸害。

entries.name: 3b. Nave

entries: {@b Altar}. An altar of pale gray stone carved to look like a rectangular mass of webbing stands atop a dais. Three drow {@creature Banshee||banshees} kneel before the altar, weeping as they utter prayers to their demon goddess. (Twenty-five feet above the altar, a 10-foot-square shaft in the ceiling climbs 10 feet to {@area level 9, area 41|4cc|x}.)
{@b Braziers}. 紫色的火焰从石制火炉中发出，类似于巨大的蜘蛛。(这些火焰来自于地板下的气体通风口，在15英尺范围内发出明亮的光，在另外15英尺范围内发出暗淡的光。）
{@b Corpses}. 女妖最近干掉了一对冒险者，让他们的尸体在地图10上标有X的方块中腐烂。
Charinidia、Grazthrae和T'riizlin是被Lolth改造成女妖的女祭司，因为她们的虚荣心。如果她们的祈祷被打断，她们就会发动攻击，错开她们消耗生命的哀号的时间，如下所示。

items: 查里尼迪亚在战斗的第一个回合就发出哀号。
格拉兹拉在战斗中第一次受到伤害后发出哀号。
T'riizlin在其他女妖之一被摧毁后哀嚎。

entries: 一个{@spell detect magic}的咒语在祭坛周围显示出一个魔法光环，它有30英尺长，15英尺宽，3英尺高。就像一团网一样，祭坛的表面有缝隙。当一个生物第一次接触到祭坛时，有八个(1%)的魔力从它里面涌出。这些蜘蛛迅速将祭坛包裹起来，并攻击周围5英尺内的所有生物，追击逃跑的猎物。如果不打扰它们，这些蜘蛛会爬回祭坛，并在1小时后消失，届时陷阱会重新设置。
在他最后一次访问大殿时，{@creature Muiral|WDMM}从死去的冒险者身上拿走了任何有价值的物品。检查尸体的人物会发现以下情况。

items: 北方的尸体（Kravos，一个盗贼流氓）穿着皮甲，拿着一把短剑。坏死的能量使他的肉体萎缩。
南方的尸体（即矮人野蛮人Zundra Underdottir的尸体）身穿皮甲，附近躺着一把大斧头。她的脸被冻结在可怕的尖叫声中。

entries: If a character casts {@spell speak with dead} on a corpse and asks what it knows about Undermountain, the corpse shares a secret determined by drawing a card from the {@deck Secrets Deck|WDMM} (see {@adventure appendix C|WDMM|27}).

entries.name: 4. Muiral's Laboratory
entries: {@creature Muiral|WDMM}在建筑群的这个角落里进行着神秘的实验。

entries.name: 4a. Disembodied Voice
entries: If Vlonwelv is still alive, the characters hear her disembodied voice when they enter this chamber for the first time (see "{@area Vlonwelv's Pulpit|562|x}").

entries.name: 4b. Laboratory

entries: {@b Bones}. 房间的角落里堆放着无法辨认的生物的骨头（是{@creature Muiral|WDMM}失败的实验的残骸）。在这些骨头堆下面藏着八块（2%），每堆有两块。
{@b Equipment}. 生锈的操作工具和干涸的炼金术士用品（不再有效力）覆盖了房间中央的五张木质栈板。
{@b Mirror}. 北墙中央挂着一面高大的椭圆镜，装在雕刻的石框中。
{@b Pneumatic Tube}. 固定在西墙的是一根铜管，消失在天花板上。在它下面的地板上躺着一个铜罐子。
{@creature Muiral|WDMM}利用冒险者和乌鸦的尸体制造了食尸鬼。如果{@creature Muiral|WDMM}以外的生物搜索房间，食尸鬼就会冲出来攻击。

连接到西墙的气管连接到一个管道系统（见"{@area Pneumatic Tubes|4ab|x}"），并允许用铜罐向{@area area 15a on level 9|4e7|x}发送信息。躺在地上的罐子里有一封写给{@creature Muiral|WDMM}的信，署名是H。信息是用普通话写在一张卷起的羊皮纸上，邀请{@creature Muiral|WDMM}到Dweomercore({@adventure level 9|WDMM|9})做客座讲师。

entries.name: Mirror Gate to Level 6
entries: The mirror is one of Halaster's magic gates (see "{@area Gates|028|x}"). Carved into its frame are dozens of lidless eyes and the following phrase in Common: "The gate cannot hide from those it cannot see." The rules of the gate are as follows:

items: 当一个{@condition invisible}的生物直接站在镜子前面时，大门会打开1分钟。

Characters must be 9th level or higher to pass through this gate (see "{@area Jhesiyra Kestellharp|016|x}"). The first creature to pass through the gate triggers an elder rune (see "{@area Elder Runes|027|x}").
A creature that passes through the gate appears in {@area area 16 on level 6|35c|x}, in the closest unoccupied space next to the identical gate located there.

entries.name: 5. Dilapidated Rooms
entries: 这些房间的地板和天花板下垂，墙上贴着开裂和剥落的墙纸。
{@b Furnishings}. 三张20英尺长的黑石雕刻的桌子从西向东延伸。每张桌子周围坐着十几把雕刻着网和蜘蛛图案的铸铁椅子。
{@b Smashed Cabinet}. 靠着北墙，在通往(1%)的双门附近，有一堆残骸，曾经是一个用黑木头做成的华丽的柜子。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 搜索失事柜子的人物发现了50件被岁月染黑的银器。如果清洗干净，每件可以卖1戈比。

entries.name: 5b. Kitchen

entries: {@b Floating Items}. 三张破旧的木制工作台，几个生锈的器皿，几个木柜的碎片，以及一把特别结实的扫帚在房间里漂浮，仿佛没有重量。
{@b Fireplace}. 一个巨大的石制壁炉从西墙伸出来。
{@b Well}. 北墙的一个凹槽里有一口直径12英尺的露天井。(井口下行90英尺，通向一条地下溪流，无法进入山下的其他地方）。
魔法使厨房里所有的装饰品都飞了起来，相互碰撞。幸存的物品继续漂浮，即使从房间里移开也是如此。移动它们几乎不费吹灰之力，它们在1磅或更多的额外重量下沉到地板上。对漂浮物成功施展{@spell dispel magic}(DC17)，就会结束它身上的魔法，使它坠落。
壁炉的5英尺宽的烟囱垂直爬升了30英尺，然后戛然而止。其余的部分很早就塌陷了。
The well shaft has abundant handholds and requires a successful DC 10 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check to scale without gear or magic.

entries.name: 5c. Pantry

entries: {@b Cabinets}. 三个深色木头的高柜靠墙而立。它们的玻璃门上有网状的图案。
{@b Table}. 房间中间的一张石桌，上面摆满了冒险装备。
{@b Chest}. 桌子下面有一个用黄铜锁住的木箱，里面装着一个陷阱。
桌子上的装备可以组装成一个盗贼包和一个探险家包，缺少口粮。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 施放{@spell detect magic}会在箱子周围显示出一个堕落魔法的光环，这实际上是一个{@item chest of preserving|WDMM}。这个普通的神奇物品有以下神奇的特性：食物和其他易腐物品在里面不会老化或腐烂。这个箱子长2.5英尺，宽1.5英尺，高1英尺，有一个半桶的盖子。它重达25磅。{@creature Muiral|WDMM}携带有打开这个箱子的钥匙。锁可以用盗贼的工具和成功的DC15灵巧检查来撬开。砸碎锁或箱子的任何其他部分会使其失去魔力。

箱子的隔间里有五瓶炼金术士之火，还有以下材料成分（用于指定的法术）。一瓶血，一条肉，一撮骨粉({@spell animate dead})；一个装着坟墓泥土的陶罐，一个装着咸水的陶罐，以及三颗150gp的黑玛瑙宝石({@spell create undead})；一片维奇木({@spell dancing lights})；一袋石灰，一壶水，以及一袋土({@spell flesh to stone}) 一块狼皮和一根玻璃棒({@spell lightning bolt})；一个毛虫茧({@spell polymorph})；一袋滑石和银粉({@i see {@spell invisibility}})；一小瓶沥青和一只活蜘蛛({@spell spider climb})；和一袋宝石粉({@i wall of force})。

entries.name: 6. Teleportation Statues
entries: 每个区域都隐藏在一扇密门之后。被动智慧({@skill Perception})得分在15分以上的角色，接近任何一扇密门的20英尺范围内，都会听到密门后面传来低语的声音。这个声音用精灵语说："这边走。"
每扇暗门后面都有一条尘土飞扬的死胡同，里面有一尊10英尺高的乌鸦雕像，在{@spell detect magic}法术的监视下散发着魔力的光环。每个雕像都是一个大型物体，AC值为17，命中率为60，对中毒和精神伤害免疫。
任何除{@creature Muiral|WDMM}以外的生物接触到{@area area 6a|577|x}的雕像时，都会被立即传送到{@area area 6b|578|x}的雕像附近的一个无人空间，反之亦然，同时也会被传送到它所穿戴或携带的所有东西。(Vlonwelv Auvryndar用一种仪式来改变雕像的魔法，所以{@creature Muiral|WDMM}不能被传送。)
这些雕像描绘了来自敌对家族的鸦人恋人。他们的灵魂被束缚在雕像上，无法在物质世界中相互交流。摧毁一座雕像会将其灵魂放逐到深渊，只有摧毁两座雕像，这些邪恶的灵魂才能最终在恶魔的来世中重聚。

While trapped in their statues, the spirits are {@condition invisible} and can't affect their surroundings in any way. Though they can't prevent anyone from using the statues to teleport, each spirit asks the characters in Elvish to relay messages of love to the other. The characters receive no reward for doing so and are under no compulsion to heed the statues' wishes.

entries.name: 6a. Xyrxian's Statue
entries: Xyrxian Vandree被描绘成一个身穿蜘蛛长袍、手持祸水的皱眉女鸦。她的精神对她的爱人的死亡作出了反应。她的对话凝重而可恨。

entries.name: 6b. Dran'l's Statue
entries: 德兰-凯纳芬的雕像描绘了一个身穿网状长袍的英俊男性乌鸦，他紧握双拳，泪流满面。德兰'l的灵魂为失去他的爱人而感到悲痛。他的对话是忧郁的，令人沮丧的。

entries.name: 7. Halls of Selvetarm
entries: 较小的神灵塞尔维塔姆（Selvetarm）为洛尔思服务。塞尔维塔姆也被称为 "等待的蜘蛛"，因为他的战斗力和血腥欲望而受到鸦人的崇拜和敬畏。这些房间都是为他准备的。

entries.name: 7a. Cobbleskulls
entries: 这个20英尺高的前厅的地板下沉了几英寸，墙上挂满了人形头骨，这些头骨因年代久远而变黄变脆。乍一看，它们就像鹅卵石。地板是{@quickref difficult terrain||3}，因为这些头骨在脚下移动并破裂。

entries.name: 7b. Hall of the Spider That Waits

entries: {@b Ceiling Sculpture}. 这个密室有一个40英尺高的拱形天花板。攀附在天花板上的是一只直径20英尺的倒挂石蜘蛛，类似于一只巨大的狼蛛。
{@b Petrified Drow}. 八个栩栩如生的乌鸦战士的雕像，四男四女，摆放在房间周围。（这些雕像是八个{@creature drow}被{@creature Muiral|WDMM}的魔法变成石头的）。

If {@creature Muiral|WDMM} (see {@adventure appendix A|WDMM|25}) is here, he's lurking in the space between the spider sculpture and the ceiling, roughly 30 feet above the floor. Upon detecting intruders, he casts {@spell animate objects} on five of the drow statues and commands them to attack while he hides above the giant spider sculpture. If the animated drow statues are destroyed, {@creature Muiral|WDMM} casts {@spell wall of force} to attempt to separate one character from the others before crawling down to attack his lone prey.
摧毁蜘蛛雕塑的五条腿会使它脱离天花板并坠落到地上。每条腿都有AC17；25点命中率；对酸、冷和火的伤害有抵抗力；对毒和精神伤害有免疫力；对非金刚砂的非魔法武器造成的击打、穿刺和砍伤有免疫力。当雕塑倒下时，在它下面的任何生物都必须做一个DC 15的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到66({@dice 12d10})的重击伤害，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。

Casting a {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic on a {@condition petrified} drow restores it to flesh, provided the statue has not been destroyed. Drow restored in this manner have two goals: slay {@creature Muiral|WDMM}, and report back to their superior, {@creature Zress Orlezziir|WDMM}. The males are named Dhuurak, Jaratlab, Quenmourn, and Seldax. The females are Nizanna, Rezlyrr, Shynlue, and Zilvriss.

entries.name: 8. The Fate of Falkir's Fist
entries: 一年多以前，四个自称法尔基尔之拳的矮人冒险家在{@creature Muiral|WDMM}杀死他们之前，已经进入地下山这么远了。他们遭遇命运的房间有这些特征。
{@b Wreckage}. 这个房间曾经用于武器练习，几个射箭靶的残骸就是证明。
{@b Mirror}. 安装在北面墙上的是一面高大的、椭圆形的镜子，有一个雕刻的石框。这面镜子是哈拉斯特的魔法门之一（见"{@area Gates|028|x}"）。
{@b Dwarf Remains}. 四个矮人的严重腐烂的尸体在镜子前围成一个半圆。他们的大部分盔甲和武器都已损坏，无法修复。
Falkir Gravelfist和他的队伍死在了一道镜子门的脚下，如果他们有一根魔法棒来激活它的话，这道镜子门就会成为他们的救星。搜索遗迹的角色发现了一些宝藏（见 "宝藏"）。

entries.name: Mirror Gate to Level 1
entries: 镜子的石框上有一个巫师指着魔杖的图像。这道门的规则如下。

items: 当用至少有1个电荷的魔法棒触碰镜子时，大门会打开1分钟。

Characters must be 11th level or higher to pass through this gate (see "{@area Jhesiyra Kestellharp|016|x}"). The first creature to pass through the gate triggers an elder rune (see "{@area Elder Runes|027|x}").
A creature that passes through the gate appears in {@area area 26d on level 1|064|x}, in the closest unoccupied space next to the identical gate located there.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 曾经是法尔基尔-格雷夫斯特的矮人戴着一个钢制头盔，形状像野猪的头。一个{@spell detect magic}的咒语显示头盔周围有一个微弱的转化魔法的光环，它是被诅咒的。一旦戴上头盔，在佩戴者死亡之前，或者在对头盔施以{@spell remove curse}的咒语或类似的魔法之前，都不能将其摘除。任何戴着头盔的人都会获得以下缺陷，直到头盔被移除为止。"我非常固执，认为自己一直是对的。" (这个缺陷取代了任何相冲突的缺陷）。
在他死之前，法尔基尔吞下了一颗叫做蜘蛛之眼的宝石。如果人物刺破附着在他骨头上的皮肤，并在他的胸腔里扎根，他们就会在曾经是他的胃里找到这颗宝石。将这块宝石送回沃特德普的约罗斯-布莱特海姆（Joroth Brighthelm），就能完成一个任务（见"{@area Eye of the Spider|011|x}"），或者人物可以将它以1,000金币出售。

entries.name: 9. God-Watched Gates
entries: 这些房间里有供奉乌鸦万神殿诸神的神龛。20英尺高的拱形天花板被厚厚的网遮住了。

entries.name: 9a. The Elder Eye
entries: 一个直径为20英尺的魔法黑暗半球遮住了这个房间的大部分，并掩盖了南边一扇锁着的双门。光线和{@sense darkvision}都无法穿透这墨色的黑暗。一个成功的{@spell dispel magic}法术(DC18)可以结束黑暗1分钟，并在其中心显露出一个12英尺高的雕像。

这座雕像每分钟都会神奇地、无声地重塑自己，呈现出一个又一个狰狞的形态。初次见到时，雕像看起来就像一个没有眼睛的脸和扭曲的假肢的渗水柱子，从中伸出。其他形式包括一个长着翅膀和钳子的无眼巨人，以及一波浑身长满獠牙的粘液。任何生物在看到雕像的任何形态时，都必须在DC14智慧救赎上获得成功，否则就会获得一种随机的短期疯狂（通过在{@book chapter 8|DMG|8|Madness Effects}的短期疯狂表上滚动确定）。无论生物的蓄力动作是成功还是失败，它都不能再受到雕像的影响。
A character who sees the statue can, with a successful DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Religion}) check, ascertain that it represents Ghaunadaur, god of oozes, slimes, and all things subterranean.

entries.name: Locked Double Door
entries: 雕像南面的门拒绝移动，任何力量都无法将其撬开。它们也对任何来源的伤害免疫。一个{@spell knock}的咒语或类似的魔法可以打开这扇双门。如果一个患有任何形式的短期、长期或无限期的疯狂的生物触碰了这些门，这些门也会摆动开来。受到（1%）法术、（2%）法术或类似效果影响的生物也可以打开门。门会一直开着，直到有人或东西把它们关上。

entries.name: 9b. The Masked Lord
entries: 将光源带入这个房间的人注意到，他们的光所产生的阴影似乎有了自己的生命--这是一种阴森但无害的魔法效果。在一扇上了锁的双扇门前，站在一块2英尺高的石块上的是一个6英尺高的男性乌鸦雕像，他带着残酷的微笑，手持一把藏在背后的短剑。雕像的眼睛上戴着一个面具。
这座雕像代表了瓦伊伦，鸦人的盗贼之神。通过DC15智力检查成功的人物会想起Vhaeraun主要被男性乌鸦所崇拜。雕像不能被改造、损坏，也不能被撞离底座。

When a creature moves within reach of the statue, the statue animates and attacks the creature with its shortsword, striking unerringly and dealing 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage. After wounding a creature with its sword, the statue reverts to its inanimate state until triggered again.

entries.name: Locked Double Door
entries: 雕像南面的门上沾满了血迹，拒绝挪动。任何力量都无法将其撬开。它们也对任何来源的伤害免疫。一个{@spell knock}的咒语或类似的魔法可以打开这些门，在其中一扇或两扇门上涂抹血液也可以。门会一直开着，直到有人或东西把它们关上。

entries.name: 9c. The Dark Maiden
entries: 一束神奇的月光从天花板上照在一尊6英尺高的雕像上，雕像是一个衣着暴露的女性乌鸦，头发飘逸，僵持着做回旋动作，双臂伸展，双手蜷缩，似乎是要拿着什么东西似的。雕像站在一块2英尺高的石块上，作为底座。
月光与{@spell moonbeam}法术所产生的月光一样，吞噬了包含雕像的10英尺范围。一个成功的（1%）法术（DC16）可以在24小时内否定月光。
这座雕像描绘的是艾利斯特莱，鸦人的美貌、歌声和狩猎之神。黑暗少女在乌鸦社会中被憎恶，但在暗山中并非没有追随者。这座雕像不能被改造、损坏，也不能被从底座上敲下来。
通过DC15智力({@skill Religion})检查成功的人物会想起艾利斯特雷喜欢使用剑。如果这样的武器被放在它的手中，雕像的手就会紧紧握住剑柄。(雕像不接受虚幻的或精神上的武器。）然后雕像在它的底座上跳舞1分钟，然后把剑对准南方上锁的那组门，使它们打开。当门被打开时，雕像又恢复了原来的姿势，并放松了对剑的控制，导致武器从它的手中掉落。

entries.name: Locked Double Door
entries: 雕像南面的门拒绝移动，任何力量都无法将其撬开。它们也对来自任何方面的伤害免疫。一个{@spell knock}的咒语或类似的魔法可以打开这扇双门。如果Eilistraee的雕像用剑指着门，门也会摇晃着打开。

entries.name: 10. Queen's Parlor
entries: {@creature Muiral|WDMM}一气之下，把这个曾经富丽堂皇的客厅给砸了。该厅的内容如下。
{@b Hanging Lights}. 在30英尺高的尖顶下，有一个20英尺高的石椽格子，像一张巨大的网。这张网上用丝线挂着蜘蛛状的灯笼，里面有闪烁的紫色火焰（由{@spell continual flame}法术创造）。有几根吊绳没有灯笼。
{@b Furnishings}. 房间里散落着客厅里的物品：破碎的水晶餐具、破碎的装饰品、沙发、脚凳、茶几和从房梁上扯下来的灯笼。所有的物品都刻有蜘蛛网的图案，或以蜘蛛的形状来塑造。
{@b Floor}. 黑色大理石地板上有银色的、网状的脉络贯穿其中。
整个房间都被灯笼照得很暗。如果从这个房间移走一个蜘蛛灯笼，它的光就会熄灭。

entries.name: 11. Lolth's Palace
entries: 如果{@b Muiral}（见{@adventure appendix A|WDMM|25}）在这里，他就潜伏在阳台上（{@area area 11b|58d|x}）。当他探测到入侵者进入{@area area 11a|58b|x}时，他就会命令该区域的骨堆动画化并进行攻击。然后他在阳台上施放法术，当一个或多个敌人在他的范围内移动时，他就转为近战。

entries.name: 11a. Lower Level

entries: {@b Balcony}. 一个30英尺高的阳台环绕着房间。八根雕刻成蜘蛛腿的石柱支撑着阳台，阳台被形状像网的锻铁栏杆围住。
{@b Alcove}. 南边的一个深凹处有一大堆人形骨头。
{@b Stairs}. 两个石阶在北面入口的两边升起，爬到阳台上。
如果任何生物扰乱了凹洞中的骨头，或者如果{@creature Muiral|WDMM}命令它们上升，它们就会凝聚成四个{@creature Shambling Mound||shambling mounds}完全由头骨和骨头组成，并有这些变化。

items: 晃动的土堆是不死之身。
他们不再对雷电伤害免疫，而是对坏死和中毒伤害免疫。他们也对{@condition poisoned}条件免疫。
他们有坏死吸收，而不是闪电吸收。新特性在功能上与旧特性相同，只是它影响坏死的伤害。

entries.name: 11b. Spider Queen's Balcony

entries: {@b Statue}. 在南面凹室的屋顶上倒挂着一尊巨大的洛尔思雕像，她是半乌鸦、半蜘蛛的畸形。
{@b Railings}. 围住阳台的3英尺高的铁栏杆很结实，形状看起来像网。
{@b Decor}. 在六组双门之间的墙上挂着钢制盾牌，上面有网状和蜘蛛状的图案。

The statue of Lolth animates and attacks the nearest creature if it takes damage or if any of the double doors on the balcony are opened by a creature that isn't a drow. The statue can't leave {@area area 11|58a|x}. If the statue has no targets on its turn, it returns to its alcove and becomes inanimate until triggered again. It also returns to its alcove if the command word, "sleep," is spoken in Abyssal.
The statue is a {@creature stone golem} with a challenge rating of 11 (7,200 XP) and these changes:

items: 这座雕像是巨大的，有230({@dice 20d12 + 100})的命中率。
它能听懂深渊语，但不能说话。
它可以爬上困难的表面，包括倒立在天花板上，而不需要进行能力检查。
受雕像的慢动作选项影响的人似乎被困于短暂的网中，当对他们的影响结束时就会消失。

entries.name: 11c. Northwest Palace Quarters
entries: 旧家具和装饰的残骸表明，这个房间曾经是一个乌鸦女祭司的避难所。建在一面墙上的是一个巨大的、拱形的壁炉。壁炉的5英尺宽的烟囱垂直爬升了30英尺，然后戛然而止。它的其余部分早就塌陷了。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Characters who search the room and succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check find a secret compartment in the fireplace that contains a {@item potion of greater healing}.

entries.name: 11d. Southwest Palace Quarters
entries: 这个房间好像是{@area area 11c|58f|x}，但不包含任何宝藏。
{@b Mirror}. 安装在东墙上的是一面高大的长方形镜子，包裹在一个华丽的石框中，上面 "编织 "着人类的头骨。这面镜子是哈拉斯特的大门之一（见"{@area Gates|028|x}"）。
{@b Wardrobe}. 一个高大细长的紫木衣柜靠着南墙而立。(衣柜里曾经装过祭祀用的法衣，但很久以前就被偷走了。搜查后发现里面什么都没有）。

entries.name: Mirror Gate to Level 12
entries: 镜子的石框上雕刻着扭曲的藤蔓，藤蔓上交织着在暗山中被杀的11名人类冒险者的真实头骨。镜框的底部刻有以下天体字样。"死者知道这个秘密"。该门的规则如下。

items: 站在镜子前说出适当的命令词（"Axallian"），就能打开大门，持续1分钟。
角色必须达到12级或以上才能通过此门（见"{@area Jhesiyra Kestellharp|016|x}"）。第一个通过此门的生物会触发一个长老符文（见"{@area Elder Runes|027|x}"）。
A creature that passes through the gate appears in {@area area 6b on level 12|657|x}, in the closest unoccupied space next to the identical gate located there.

entries: 对其中一个骷髅头施放{@spell speak with dead}，迫使它说出大门的命令词，哈拉斯特每隔几天就会改变这个命令。除此之外，这些头骨还很有敌意，拒绝回答向它们提出的问题。

entries.name: 11f. Arcane Locked Doors
entries: {@creature Muiral|WDMM} has cast an {@spell arcane lock} spell on these doors, beyond which a stone staircase descends to {@area area 30b|5ef|x}. The characters can force open the doors with a successful DC 25 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check, but doing so alerts the drow in {@area area 30b|5ef|x}.

entries.name: 11g. Southeast Palace Quarters
entries: This room resembles {@area area 11c|58f|x}, except that the fireplace chimney is intact. The chimney has abundant handholds and can be climbed easily. After 90 feet, it opens into a damp, soot-stained natural cave roughly 30 feet wide by 60 feet long. Buried under the soot in a corner of the cave is a swollen wooden chest.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: The chest is unlocked, but its lid is stuck and must be pried open with a crowbar or similar tool. A character can also smash the chest's soft lid with a successful DC 9 Strength check. The chest contains 120 pp, a set of thieves' tools wrapped in lizard hide, and a stoppered gourd containing {@item oil of slipperiness}.

entries.name: 11h. Northeast Palace Quarters
entries: 这个房间好像是{@area area 11c|58f|x}，但不包含任何宝藏。

entries.name: 12. Ballroom

entries: {@b Pillars and Ceiling}. 十根雕刻着乌鸦战士的楣子的柱子支撑着50英尺高的拱形天花板，天花板上刻着网状的图案。大厅的远端有两根柱子倒塌了。
{@b Monsters}. 两个{@creature Muiral|WDMM}的神秘实验品（见下文）蜷缩在倒塌的柱子的废墟旁。
{@b Floor}. 尘土飞扬的黑色大理石瓷砖覆盖在地板上，其中许多已经开裂和破碎。
{@creature Muiral|WDMM}给两个鸦人囚犯注射了魔法药水，使他们永远变成了可怕的畸形巨人，肌肉隆起，皮肤呈炭黑色，头发长而脏白。马夫拉和纳达斯站在24英尺高的地方，他们的四肢比例不协调，背脊驼背。他们的眼睛闪闪发光，充满仇恨和红色。

The giants' {@sense darkvision} allows them to see almost the entire length of the hall, and they hurl rocks (chunks of toppled pillars) at any intruders they can see. If the rocks don't get the job done, the giants smash foes with wrought iron chandeliers that they wield like morningstars.
变异的乌鸦使用{@creature cloud giant}的统计数据，并有这些变化。

items: 他们是中性的邪恶。

They have the following racial traits: They speak Elvish and Undercommon. They have {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet. They have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put them to sleep. While in sunlight, they have disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.
用以下方法取代云巨人的法术。{@spell dancing lights}随心所欲，以及{@spell darkness}和{@spell faerie fire}（保存DC15）各一天一次。

entries.name: 13. Vestibule

entries: {@b Webs}. 一团10英尺厚的粘稠的网掩盖了30英尺高的天花板。三只(1%)潜伏在网中的轻度遮蔽区。
{@b Guards}. 四名男性（1%）在房间里站岗，每扇双门的两侧各有两名。
这些乌鸦被命名为赫隆洛克（Hlonlok）、伊佐维尔（Izzorvir）、奈弗伦（Nephraen）和索诺兹（Sornnozz）。他们奉命对入侵者格杀勿论，而相位蜘蛛则跟随他们的步伐。

索诺兹背叛了自己的亲属，选择为潜入{@creature Muiral|WDMM}高塔的弗雷特家族间谍Xarann A'Daragon服务。当战斗爆发时，Sornnozz改变了立场，帮助角色杀死了相位蜘蛛和其他卫兵。然后他提议带领角色们去找{@area area 17d|5b2|x}的Xarann。如果被追问细节，索诺兹声称Xarann正在寻找方法来削弱Auvryndar家族对{@creature Muiral|WDMM}高塔的控制，他认为一队冒险者可能是Xarann祈祷的答案。

entries.name: 14. Guest Apartment
entries: 弗隆韦尔夫为客人维护这些宿舍。

entries.name: 14a. Dining Room
entries: If Vlonwelv is still alive, the characters hear her disembodied voice when they enter this chamber for the first time (see "{@area Vlonwelv's Pulpit|562|x}").
{@b Chandelier}. 房间里有一个30英尺高的平顶，上面挂着一盏锻铁吊灯，形状依稀像一只巨大的蜘蛛，用一根链条固定在天花板上。
{@b Furnishings}. 吊灯下面是一张修长的椭圆形餐桌，上面有石板，有蜘蛛般的铁腿。八把带坐垫的铁椅围绕着它。一个华丽的木制柜子靠着北墙站着。
{@b Fresco}. 一幅大型的精灵城市壁画覆盖了南墙。
在鸦人被驱赶到地下，进入洛尔思的邪恶怀抱之前，他们在地表的城市中与他们的精灵亲属一起生活。南墙上的壁画描绘了其中一个古老的城市。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 柜子里有一盒10磅重的银质餐具（250GP）和一个银质鼻烟盒（25GP）。
{@b Fireplace}. 一个巨大的壁炉主导着东墙。(壁炉的5英尺宽的烟囱垂直爬升了50英尺，然后戛然而止。其余部分早就塌陷了）。
{@b Furnishings}. 壁炉附近摆放着六把毛绒椅子和一张贵妃椅。

entries.name: 14c. Study

entries: {@b Furnishings}. 一张优雅的榉木办公桌矗立在房间中央，一张薄薄的配套椅子摆在后面。
{@b Bookshelves}. 在西面、南面和东面的墙上刻有一排书架。南边的一个书架上放着五本书；其他的书架都是空的。

这五本书中有两本是空白的。其他的包括{@i Matrons of the Sunless Depths}（关于乌鸦母系的重要性的论文，由Vlonwelv Auvryndar用精灵语撰写），{@i The Poison Chalice}（关于Menzoberranzan市的政治阴谋的虚构故事，作者不详），以及{@i Demonic Infestations}（关于恶魔附身的故事集，用普通话撰写）。这些书都不是特别有价值。

entries.name: 14d. Mirror Gate to Level 7

entries: {@b Bed}. 一张披着蜘蛛丝天幕的紫檀木床靠着北墙而立。
{@b Mirror}. 一面高大的长方形镜子安装在东墙。这面镜子是哈拉斯特的魔法门之一（见"{@area Gates|028|x}"）。
镜子的石框底部刻有字母T-U-O-Y-A-W（是W-A-Y-O-U-T的反映）。这道门的规则如下。

items: 如果一个生物在指着镜子时说出 "出去的路！"这句话，大门会打开1分钟。

Characters must be 9th level or higher to pass through this gate (see "{@area Jhesiyra Kestellharp|016|x}"). The first creature to pass through the gate triggers an elder rune (see "{@area Elder Runes|027|x}").
A creature that passes through the gate appears in {@area area 41 on level 7|439|x}, in the closest unoccupied space next to the identical gate located there.

entries.name: 15. Screaming Skulls

entries: {@b Collapse}. 这条走廊的东边分支已经坍塌了。对废墟的搜索没有发现任何有价值的东西。
{@b Skulls}. 西部分支有六大堆的乌鸦头骨（每个都在地图10上标有X）。
{@creature Muiral|WDMM}很久以前就收集了这些头骨，而乌鸦选择不打扰它们。靠近骷髅堆5英尺以内的生物可以听到从骷髅中发出的微弱的、垂死的尖叫声。从头骨堆中取出的头骨会陷入沉默。

entries.name: 16. False Mirror Gate

entries: {@b Mirror}. 安装在北墙长方形台子上方的是一面6英尺高的椭圆形镜子，镶嵌在石框中，雕刻成哈拉斯特打哈欠的样子，镜子形成了他大张的嘴。
{@b Dais}. 在台子的地板上刻着 "阿谀奉承会让你走遍天下 "的字样。
{@b Statues}. 在台子的两侧有两个{@condition petrified}{@creature Hook Horror||hook horrors}，看起来像雕刻的雕像。(勾魂怪在目前的状态下不构成任何危险。对其中一个施以{@spell greater restoration}法术或类似的魔法，它就会恢复成血肉之躯，从而发动攻击）。
The mirror looks like one of Halaster's magic gates and functions similarly (see "{@area Gates|028|x}"). Its rules are as follows:

items: 如果一个生物站在台子上，说了一些关于哈拉斯特的奉承话，镜子就会消失，露出外面一条尘土飞扬的走廊，通往黑暗中。这条走廊是一个幻觉。
任何踏过镜子的生物都会被传送，连同其所有穿戴和携带的物品，在{@area area 22a|5c5|x}内被传送到60英尺高的竖井顶部，在那里生物会坠落，并在撞击时受到21({@dice 6d6})的重击伤害。
第一个落入陷阱的生物会触发一个{@spell magic mouth}的法术，时间为{@area area 22a|5c5|x}。哈拉斯特的嘴出现在墙上，用普通话说："你上当了！"。明白吗？上当了？哈哈哈哈！"

entries.name: 17. The Dark Seldarine
entries: 这些神庙供奉着黑暗塞尔达林，这是洛尔思手下的一个乌鸦神殿。每个房间的墙壁都升高了15英尺，然后向内倾斜到离地板中间30英尺的中心点。

entries.name: 17a. Temple of Ghaunadaur
entries: Ghaunadaur是地下恐怖之神，受到包括乌鸦在内的许多地下城种族的尊敬和畏惧。这座神庙包含以下特点。
{@b Green Slime}. 每段10英尺宽、15英尺高的垂直墙面上有6块5英尺见方的{@hazard green slime}（见{@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}第五章的"{@book Dungeon Hazards|DMG|5|Dungeon Hazards}"）。
{@b Secret Door}. 粘液掩盖了一个暗门。搜索墙壁上的暗门的能力检查是以劣势进行的，直到粘液被从隐藏暗门的墙壁上刮掉。
{@b Altar}. What appears at first viewing to be a glistening altar of variegated gray stone is, in fact, a hollow glass altar with three psychic {@creature Gray Ooze||gray oozes} sealed inside it.
玻璃祭坛是一个大型物体，AC为11，命中率为55，对非金刚砂的非魔法武器的伤害免疫，对酸、毒和精神伤害免疫。
灰色ozes使用它们的通灵粉碎行动选项攻击所有进入房间的生物（见 "变体。通灵灰烬 "的侧边栏，在"{@book Monster Manual|MM}中的 "灰烬 "条目中）。当被包含在祭坛中时，这些ozes有完全的掩护，它们的速度是0英尺，而且它们不能用它们的假肢进行攻击。

entries.name: 17b. Temple of Kiaransalee
entries: 这座乌鸦不死之神Kiaransalee的神庙散发着腐烂的气息，里面有以下内容。
{@b Altar}. 一个由人形头骨和骨头组成的祭坛就在南墙附近。
{@b Decor and Secret Door}. 嵌在墙上的乌鸦骷髅摆出的姿势就像在跳舞。沿着南墙的一个骷髅头不见了（在它后面是一扇不会动的秘密门）。
只有不死生物或被不死生物附身的生物才能在没有{@spell knock}法术或类似魔法的帮助下打开这道密门。

If a character kneels before the altar and offers a prayer to Kiaransalee, or leaves a respectful offering on the altar, the room grows markedly colder as the silent {@creature ghost} of a drow priestess materializes next to the altar and tries to possess the nearest humanoid creature. If it succeeds, the ghost uses its host to open the secret door, then releases its host and shifts into the Ethereal Plane. An oath of service binds the ghost to the temple for as long as it stands. The ghost is unaligned and fights only in self-defense. If reduced to 0 hit points, the ghost is destroyed for 24 hours, then re-forms.

entries.name: 17c. Temple of Selvetarm
entries: 鸦人的战神塞尔维塔姆的神庙包含以下特点。
{@b Blood}. 干血的条纹在墙壁和地板上形成网状图案。
{@b Altar}. 一个锻铁祭坛上面有一个右手的血色凹痕。一把非魔法短剑漂浮在一英尺高的地方，血迹斑斑的剑刃朝下。
{@b Secret Door}. 藏在南墙的一个秘密门需要用血祭才能打开（见下文）。
祭坛拒绝移动。一个{@spell detect magic}的法术在它周围和上方显示出一个转化魔法的光环。任何重量在10磅或以下的物体，如果被留在祭坛上无人看管，就会上升，直到它悬浮在表面以上1英尺。这个悬浮场不能被驱散，但在反魔法场中被压制。
如果一个人形生物将其切开的手（即使是表面的伤口也可以）按在祭坛的手形凹陷处，南墙的秘密门就会打开。一个{@spell knock}的法术或类似的魔法也能打开这扇门。

entries.name: 17d. Temple of Vhaeraun
entries: 这座盗贼和刺客之神瓦伊伦的庙宇包含以下特点。
{@b Assassin's Altar}. 一个血红色石头的祭坛矗立在南墙附近。男性鸦人刺客Xarann A'Daragon在它面前默默祈祷。
{@b Curtains}. 沿着西边、南边和东边的墙壁，有三个黑色的窗帘挂在铁钩上。
{@b Secret Door}. 藏在南边窗帘后面的墙上的一个秘密门只有在满足某些条件时才会打开（见下文）。

A character who examines a curtain and succeeds on a DC 19 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check notices the slightly darker silhouette of a drow sewn into it. If the characters find the silhouette in one curtain, they gain advantage on checks made to spot the silhouette hidden in each of the other two curtains. Each silhouette makes a sign with one of its hands; drow characters recognize these hand-signs that, collectively, spell out the Elvish phrase {@i oloth elgg ssussun}, which translates to "darkness slays light." If a creature makes these hand-signs in the proper order anywhere in the room, the secret door in the south wall swings open. A {@spell knock} spell or similar magic also opens the door.

entries.name: Xarann A'Daragon
entries: Xarann, a spy for House Freth, is posing as a House Auvryndar assassin. He came here to pray to Vhaeraun before setting out on two missions: the rescue of Tazirahc Oussar (see {@area area 19|5bd|x}) and the assassination of Vlonwelv Auvryndar.

Xarann is initially friendly toward the characters. In exchange for their help killing the guards in {@area area 18b|5ba|x} and rescuing Tazirahc in {@area area 19|5bd|x}, Xarann will show them the way to {@adventure level 11|WDMM|11}. If they agree to help kill Vlonwelv, Xarann will show them where the drow priestess keeps her treasure ({@area area 27b|5de|x}) and lead them through back tunnels ({@area area 24b|5cc|x}) to get there. Once Xarann's missions are complete, he tries to eliminate the characters, choosing a moment when they appear weakest to betray them. Sornnozz (see {@area area 13|59b|x}) and Tazirahc are loyal to Xarann and follow his lead.
Xarann is a drow {@creature assassin}, with these changes:

items: 夏兰是中性的邪恶。

He has these racial traits: He speaks Elvish and Undercommon. He has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep. He has {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet. He can innately cast {@spell dancing lights} at-will, and {@spell darkness}, {@spell faerie fire}, and {@spell levitate} (self only) each once per day. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). While in sunlight, he has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Xarann戴着一个{@i piwafwi}，一个鸦人制造的{@item cloak of elvenkind}。如果暴露在阳光下1小时不间断，它就会失去魔力。在这件斗篷上别着一个黑曜石刀疤，上面刻着奥弗林达家族的徽章。Xarann也有一个类似的刀疤，这个刀疤上刻着Freth家族的标志，夹在他的腰带里。每块猩红宝石价值25金币。

entries.name: 17e. Temple of Eilistraee
entries: 这座美丽、舞蹈和狩猎之神埃利斯特雷的庙宇有以下特点。
{@b Music}. 一首赞美诗神奇地在整个寺庙里播放。
{@b Secret Door}. 南墙的一个秘密门只有在大声说出赞美诗的名字时才会打开。
{@b Altar}. 一个雕刻精美的石坛支撑着一个竖琴形状的雕塑。竖琴的设计中雕刻了一个女精灵，看起来她正无忧无虑地跃入空中，头部和手臂向后甩动。
对祭坛的检查显示，精灵族的符文被刻在竖琴上。任何懂精灵语的人物都可以把这些话翻译成 "赞美诗是钥匙"。
通过DC20智力({@skill Religion})检查成功的角色可以认出这首赞美诗是 "Bwaelan Dro"，或 "活着真好"，这是一首精灵族的庆祝歌曲。精灵和半精灵在这个检查上有优势。如果在神庙的任何地方大声说出赞美诗的名字，无论是普通话还是精灵语，南墙的秘密门就会打开。一个{@spell knock}的咒语或类似的魔法也能打开密门。

entries.name: 18. First Blood
entries: 如果角色与Xarann A'Daragon结盟（见{@area area 17d|5b2|x}），他就会走在他们前面，在{@area area 18b|5ba|x}的地方分散乌鸦的注意力，让角色获得惊喜。

entries.name: 18a. Voices
entries: 进入这个大厅的角色会听到从东边{@area area 18b|5ba|x}传来的叫喊声和欢呼声。如果弗隆韦尔夫还活着，当他们第一次走到这个走廊时，也会听到她的失声（见"{@area Vlonwelv's Pulpit|562|x}"）。
沿着北墙的凹槽后面有秘密的门。这些门很容易从这边拉开，露出外面的{@area areas 17a|5ac|x}和{@area 17e|5b6}。

entries.name: 18b. Fight Club

entries: {@b Drow}. 在房间的中间，一个名叫德林立斯-奥夫林达（Vlonwelv的侄女）的女性（1%）正在为十四个较小的、较弱的男性（2%）提供近战训练，每个人都还有6点命中率。
{@b Fresco and Spiders}. 东面的墙壁上有一幅破裂的壁画，画的是地下世界的一个乌鸦城市。在这面墙上有四个（1%）作为德林立斯的保镖。
{@b Wreckage}. 残破的家具堆积在东南角。碎石堵住了北墙的一个大壁炉。
十三个男性鸦人站在德林立斯和第十四个男性鸦人的周围，他们正在进行决斗。当德林立斯抽血或将男性打倒在地时，她要么用新的挑战者替换他，要么命令另外两个男性在她的批评声中互相厮杀。
如果人物允许Xarann A'Daragon分散房间里的人的注意力，他就会向Drinrith挑战，进行一对一的战斗。德林立斯接受了挑战，在这场旷日持久的战斗中引发了男性的欢呼和嘲讽，并在比赛进行时给予人物灵巧（{@skill Stealth}）检查的优势来突袭乌鸦和巨型蜘蛛。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 德林立斯佩戴着刻有奥弗林达家族徽章的黑曜石刀疤（25GP）和一个铂金镶嵌的黑金属头盔，头盔的形状是一只蜘蛛，眼睛是红玉髓（750GP）。

entries.name: 19. Interrogation Room
entries: 在双门处倾听的人物会听到从外面传来的受折磨的尖叫声。这个20英尺高的房间曾经被用作厨房，现在大部分已经被清理掉了。
{@b Interrogation}. 一个叫Kereth Ichorzza的男性（1%）和一个被召唤者（2%）正在审问一个叫Tazirahc Oussar的男性（3%），他被用蜘蛛丝绑在铁椅子上。
{@b Observers}. 观察审讯的是两名男性（1%），名叫Gelgos Argonrae和Jevan Kron'tayne。

entries.title: Obsidian Scarabs of Houses Freth and Auvryndar

entries: 在不担任德林立斯-奥夫林达（Drinrith Auvryndar）的妃子时（见{@area area 18b|5ba|x}），凯瑞斯的任务是审问被指控为弗雷斯家族间谍的鸦人。Quasit已经对Tazirahc使用了惊吓行动选项，Kereth正准备用一个{@spell ray of frost}的咒语斩杀这个囚犯，希望他能泄露他们中间其他弗雷斯家族间谍的身份。

The drow attack characters who interfere in the interrogation. Once Kereth and his cronies are dealt with, characters can cut through Tazirahc's bonds and release him if they so desire. If Xarann A'Daragon (see {@area area 17d|5b2|x}) is with the party, he questions Tazirahc to make sure he didn't divulge any compromising information. If the characters haven't met Xarann yet, Tazirahc is determined to find him once he is released. Tazirahc rewards his liberators by sharing one Undermountain secret with them; draw a card from the {@deck Secrets Deck|WDMM} (see {@adventure appendix C|WDMM|27}) to determine what Tazirahc knows.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Kereth、Gelgos和Jevan各自携带了一个刻有Auvryndar家族徽章的黑曜石scarab（25gp）。凯瑞特还携带了一根紫檀木魔杖（他的奥术重点）和一本包含他准备的所有法术的皮制法术书。

entries.name: 20. Servants' Quarters
entries: 这个大房间曾经住着仆人。现在它包含了几张床和梳妆台的网状残骸。东墙上的壁炉被瓦砾堵塞。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 如果人物搜索充满瓦砾的壁炉，他们会发现一个半烧的木制卷轴管，里面有{@item spell scroll}的{@spell hold person}。
{@b Webs}. 厚厚的网填满了墙角，笼罩着天花板，闷死了旧家具的腐烂残骸。
{@b Spiders and Eggs}. 四只（1%）守卫着东北角的一大群20个巨型蜘蛛蛋。其中一半的蛋是已经孵化的蜘蛛留下的空囊。(如果不去管它，这里剩下的蛋将在几天后孵化）。

entries.name: 22. Troglodyte Turf
entries: 乌鸦避开这些地方，因为它们的气味很难闻。

entries.name: 22a. Shaft
entries: 这个60英尺高、20英尺宽的石井坐落在两扇暗门之间，其中一扇门拉开后，露出了一个又臭又脏的troglodyte洞穴（{@area area 22b|5c6|x}）。另一扇门则通向一条走廊。在{@area area 16|5a9|x}中落入哈拉斯特陷阱的角色会在这里结束。

entries.name: 22b. Troglodyte Den
entries: 蛙人把这个肮脏的房间当作巢穴。人物刚到时，房间里没有人。
{@b Refuse}. 地板上散落着被啃咬的骨头、被砸碎的家具和其他垃圾。
{@b Gorzil's Throne}. 靠西墙的地方有一个用垃圾做成的宝座，周围堆满了财宝。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Gorzil's hoard includes 500 cp, 350 sp, 60 gp, a healer's kit, four torches, a rotted quiver containing seven silvered arrows, and a {@item potion of healing} in a crystal vial with a spider-shaped stopper.

entries.name: 23. Distant Music
entries: This 30-foot-wide hallway has a 45-foot-high arched ceiling carved with spiders and webs. Band music can be heard coming from a large chamber to the west (see {@area area 25|5ce|x}). The east end of the hall has collapsed, and a secret door in the north wall pushes open to reveal a hallway that leads to {@area areas 21|5c2|x} and {@area 18b|5ba}.

entries.name: 24. Collapsed Areas
entries: 地牢的这一部分因地震而坍塌，毁坏了两个房间（{@area areas 24a|5cb|x}和{@area 24c|5cd}），并形成一个小型的隧道迷宫（{@area area 24b|5cc|x}）。

entries.name: 24a. Guard Post
entries: A foul stench wafts through the double door, which stands ajar. This partially collapsed room is empty except for piles of rubble and six {@creature Troglodyte||troglodytes} wielding longswords and wearing breastplates (see "{@area Gorzil's Gang|55a|x}"). The troglodytes attack anything that isn't a troglodyte or a drow. If the adventuring party includes one or more drow characters or NPCs, the troglodytes bow their heads and wait for new orders, obeying any command from a drow that isn't clearly suicidal.

entries.name: 24b. Tunnels
entries: 这些自然形成的隧道蜿蜒穿过坍塌的房间和走廊。墙壁由参差不齐的石头组成，整个地面是淤泥状的，很潮湿。

entries.name: 24c. Morgue
entries: A foul stench wafts through the double door, which stands ajar. Piled near the tunnels at the back of the room are the stripped corpses of eight drow and sixteen troglodytes in varying stages of decay. Feasting on the remains are seven drow {@creature Ghoul||ghouls} that were created by Vlonwelv to devour the dead. The ghouls retreat into the back tunnels when one or more drow enter the room. If a drow is not among those who enter, the ghouls attack.

entries.name: 25. Auvryndar Hall
entries: 这个大厅曾经是鸦人饲养和出售奴隶的市场。现在它是奥夫林达家族在山下的主要军事要塞。如果弗隆维尔-奥夫林达在这里，那么这位乌鸦女祭司就会坐在南边小阁楼的宝座上（{@area area 25b|5d1|x}），听着对弗雷斯家族发动的战斗的乏味报告。

entries.name: 25a. Hall of the Dark Seldarine
entries: 任何试图潜入这个房间的角色都必须在DC13灵巧（{@skill Stealth}）的检查中获得成功，由于有大量的守卫，这个检查是不利的。
{@b Fountain}. 这个巨大的、80英尺高的房间的中心是一个直径60英尺的喷泉，上面装饰着八个代表黑暗塞尔达林（drow pantheon）的雕像。从喷泉中延伸出来的破裂的瓷砖在地板上形成了一个网状的马赛克。
{@b Guards}. 15个(1%)守卫散布在整个房间里。他们誓死保卫这个房间。

{@b Giant Lizards}. Two {@creature Giant Lizard||giant lizards} fitted with saddles, reins, and stirrups are parked in the southeast corner. These docile reptiles are used as mounts by the drow scouts in {@area area 25b|5d1|x} and have the Spider Climb trait (see the "Variant: Giant Lizard Traits" sidebar in appendix A of the {@book Monster Manual|MM}).
{@b Slave Pen}. 西北角的一个石头围墙是一个奴隶围栏。乐队音乐从里面传出。

喷泉由天然泉水提供，为乌鸦提供了几乎无穷无尽的淡水供应。这些雕像站在水面上的石座上，面向外面。从最北边的一座开始，顺时针方向移动，这些雕像代表着艾利斯特雷（Eilistraee）（美丽、舞蹈和狩猎之神）、马利克（野生魔法之神）、基亚兰萨利（不死之神）、高纳达尔（Oozes、粘液之神。和所有地下事物之神）、辛泽瑞纳（刺客之神）、瓦伊伦（盗贼之神）、洛尔思（蜘蛛的恶魔女王和黑暗塞尔达林的母亲）的乌鸦形态，以及塞尔维塔姆（战争和战士之神）。

This 40-foot-square slave pen has 20-foot-high walls of smooth stone. Instead of a roof, it has a 5-foot-thick covering of sticky webs. The webs provide an effective barrier, and any creature that enters the webs or starts its turn in them is {@condition restrained}. A {@condition restrained} creature can use its action to try to pull itself out of the webs, doing so with a successful DC 12 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check. Each 10-foot-square section of webs has AC 10, 10 hit points, vulnerability to fire, and immunity to bludgeoning, piercing, and psychic damage.

A sturdy iron-barred gate set into the east wall is held shut with an {@spell arcane lock} spell that only drow can ignore. Forcing the gate open requires a successful DC 25 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check.

The slave pen is lined with straw. It contains a halfling musical quintet that the drow kidnapped just outside the town of Daggerford. The performers call themselves the Sing-Alongs, and they're quite good. Vlonwelv makes sure that they're fed and treated well; in exchange, they fill her hall with music. The members and their instruments are Peeta Brightmoon (drum), Kevin Gladriver (fiddle), Philomena Gladriver (viol), Olivia Tallrush (horn), and Shardon Underbough (flute). They are strongheart halfling {@creature Commoner||commoners}, with these changes:

items: 唱歌的人是合法的好。
Each has a Charisma of 14 and the following skill: {@skill Performance} +4.
他们有这些种族特征。他们能说、能读、能写普通话和半身人。他们身材矮小，行走速度为25英尺。他们对毒药和被害的救赎有优势，他们对毒药伤害有抵抗力。他们可以在任何比他们大的生物的空间里移动。

entries: Although the halfling musicians are grateful for the kind treatment of their drow captors, they have grown weak from eating nothing but mushrooms and would like to return to the surface. They have little hope of reaching Waterdeep on their own and would appreciate an escort. Getting all five band members to the Yawning Portal alive completes this quest. Durnan is pleased to have the halflings perform for his patrons and rewards the characters with a round of drinks. If the heroes plan to return to Undermountain, Durnan also pulls a few strings to secure a {@item potion of superior healing} for each of them.

entries.name: 25b. Spider Throne

entries: {@b Throne}. 这个大凹室里有一个蜘蛛形状的宝座。一个红色的水晶球被镶嵌在一个扶手末端的固定装置上。
{@b Mirror}. 安装在东墙上的是一面高大的长方形镜子，有一个华丽的石框。这面镜子是哈拉斯特的大门之一（见"{@area Gates|028|x}"）。

如果Vlonwelv在这里，{@creature drow priestess of Lolth}就坐在宝座上，两边是她的乌鸦战士Zress（见"{@area Zress Orlezziir|558|x}"）和一个{@creature yochlol}顾问，这个顾问已经变成了一个身穿蜘蛛丝长袍的女性乌鸦的样子。跪在女祭司面前的是两名男性{@creature drow}侦察兵，名叫Llossul和Yuinfein，他们最近从第11层的侦察任务中回来。如果弗隆韦尔夫不在，Llossul和Yuinfein就在这里等着她回来。
王座是一个大型物体，AC值为18，命中率为80，对中毒和精神伤害免疫。一个{@spell detect magic}的法术在王座周围显示出一个堕落魔法的光环，在王座的红色水晶球周围显示出一个独立的召唤魔法的光环。
除了精灵之外，任何坐在宝座上的生物或在那里开始它的回合，都必须做一个DC13的宪法救赎，救赎失败会受到22({@dice 4d10})的中毒伤害，救赎成功会受到一半的伤害。坐在宝座上并接触到球体的生物可以使用一个额外的动作将自己的声音广播到{@creature Muiral|WDMM}的高塔中的每个地方。如果球体被从王座上扯下来，或者王座被摧毁，它就会失去魔力。

entries.name: Mirror Gate to Level 8
entries: 镜子的框架是由数百个微小的、相互交错的石制齿轮组合而成的。这道门的规则如下。

items: 任何检查框架并成功通过DC15智慧（{@skill Perception}）检查的生物都会看到其中一个齿轮已经轻微弹出。如果它被按下，齿轮就会被锁住，导致所有的齿轮转动，门会打开1分钟。当大门关闭时，一个不同的随机齿轮稍微弹出，导致所有的齿轮再次锁定。

Characters must be 10th level or higher to pass through this gate (see "{@area Jhesiyra Kestellharp|016|x}"). The first creature to pass through the gate triggers an elder rune (see "{@area Elder Runes|027|x}").
A creature that passes through the gate appears in {@area area 17c on level 8|46e|x}, in the closest unoccupied space next to the identical gate located there.

entries.name: 25c. Entrance

entries: {@b Stairs}. 石头坡道上刻出的楼梯，下行40英尺到一个巨大的天然洞穴的地面（{@area area 30|5ec|x}）。

{@b Guards}. Standing guard at the top of the stairs, facing westward, are two male {@creature Drow Mage||drow mages} named Gorthax Auvryndar (Vlonwelv's nephew) and Syrrak Argonrae. Positioned behind them, in the middle of the hall, is a transparent, 15-foot-diameter crystal spider (use {@creature stone golem} statistics).

The mages aren't expecting attacks from the east. If combat erupts in {@area area 25a|5cf|x} or {@area 25b|5d1}, Syrrak investigates while Gorthax and the crystal spider remain here. A battle in this hall brings reinforcements from {@area area 30a|5ed|x}.
蜘蛛魔像能听懂精灵语，但不能说话。它听从戈萨克斯的命令。

entries.name: 26. Spider Queen's Temple
entries: 多年来的忽视使这座寺庙处于一种可怕的状态。修复损坏的工作已经开始。

entries.name: Web Curtain
entries: 一道网状幕布将北面的50英尺高的拱形中庭与南面的寺庙隔开。帘子挡住了视线，并抓住了射向它的任何弹药。如果被点燃，它很快就会被烧掉。

entries.name: Temple Nave
entries: 如果弗隆韦尔夫在这里，{@creature drow priestess of Lolth}正站在大殿中央，监督其重建。她身边有她的保镖Zress（见"{@area Zress Orlezziir|558|x}"）和她的{@creature yochlol}顾问，后者已经变成了一只大蜘蛛的形状。
无论伏龙芝和她的随行人员是否在这里，寺庙的中庭都包含以下特点。
{@b Decor}. 六根开裂的柱子上雕刻着交织的恶魔，一直延伸到50英尺高的天花板，由厚厚的拱门支撑。裂开的墙壁上雕刻着受损的恶魔和巨大的蜘蛛。

{@b Webwork}. A giant spiderweb forms a false ceiling 40 feet above the floor. Throughout the room, in and atop this sturdy web, climb seven {@creature Giant Spider||giant spiders}. Hanging from the spiders at various heights are seven male {@creature drow} masons on spider silk swings. The spiders and drow form a work crew.
{@b Statue}. 西墙中间的一个凹槽里有一个20英尺高、被腐蚀的铁质雕像，是洛尔思的女性乌鸦形态，身上穿着无数的蜘蛛。

In place of scaffolding, the drow workers here use web lines and swings to get at hard-to-reach places. The giant spiders manipulate these webs to move the drow workers wherever they want to go. In addition to the other spells they can cast innately, the drow workers are blessed by Lolth with the ability to cast the {@spell mending} cantrip at will, and they use their magic to repair small cracks and broken stonework. If they notice intruders, the drow stop their work and attack with their hand crossbows. Each worker is suspended {@dice 2d4 × 5} feet off the ground.

entries.name: 27. Vlonwelv's Apartments
entries: 没有Vlonwelv Auvryndar的同意，任何人都不能进入这些房间。侵犯她的房间的惩罚是死亡。

entries.name: 27a. Council Room and Parlor
entries: 这个区域由两个房间组成，由一条10英尺高的短走廊连接。弗隆韦尔夫在西边的议事厅与她的队长们会面，在东边的会客厅招待客人。

If Vlonwelv is here, the {@creature drow priestess of Lolth} is relaxing in her parlor while receiving counsel from her {@creature yochlol} advisor, which appears in its natural form. Standing near Vlonwelv is her champion, Zress (see "{@area Zress Orlezziir|558|x}").

entries.name: Council Room
entries: 西边的房间里有一张用石头雕刻的蜘蛛形大桌子。这里没有椅子，因为弗隆韦尔夫希望她的队长们在做简报时站着。

entries.name: Parlor
entries: The room to the east smells of incense. It contains two male {@creature drow} attendants named Sharaun and Tarzyr; they're armed but unarmored (AC 12). These young drow dote on Vlonwelv when she's present.
客厅里摆放着软垫椅子、软垫沙发、装着熏香的青铜火炉、放着精灵酒和水晶杯的玻璃柜，以及恶魔的水晶雕塑。
{@b Mosaic}. 北面的墙壁上覆盖着一块变色的青铜马赛克，上面描绘着洛尔思的脸，银色的、像网一样的描边从它上面扇出。
{@b Furnishings}. 房间里有一张用祖尔卡木雕成的蜘蛛形床，一个与之相配的衣柜，里面有各种服装，还有一个装满清水的古老石制水箱。

entries.name: 27c. Giant Spider Den
entries: This 10-foot-high, web-filled chamber is home to three {@creature Giant Spider||giant spiders} that attack any non-drow who enter.

entries.name: 28. Hospital and Armory
entries: 为Auvryndar家族服务的鸦人来到这里，装备自己的战斗，并治疗他们的伤口。

entries.name: 28a. Hospital
entries: This chamber contains two dozen wooden cots in rows. Resting in six of them are wounded {@creature drow} (three females and three males), each with {@dice 1d12} hit points remaining. They are still clad in armor, and they keep their weapons within arm's reach.

Tending to the injured are three junior priestesses of Lolth named Nyleene Auvryndar (Vlonwelv's grand-niece), Ereldra Abbath, and Llezorna Do'ett. These three are drow {@creature Priest||priests}, with these changes:

items: 他们是中性的邪恶。
每个人都有两个一级法术槽，没有更高等级的法术槽。

They have these racial traits: They speak Elvish and Undercommon. They have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put them to sleep. They have {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet. They can innately cast {@spell dancing lights} at will, and {@spell darkness} and {@spell faerie fire} each once per day. Their spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). While in sunlight, they have disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

entries: {@b Crates}. 堆放在房间中央的箱子里有60把短剑，100把手弩，以及数千把手弩的箭。
{@b Tunnel Entrance}. 北墙的一个缺口形成了一个隧道网络的入口（见{@area area 24b|5cc|x}）。

entries.name: 29. Abandoned Apartment
entries: 当地牢里的各种隧道和房间坍塌时，这些房间几乎被切断。一条狭窄的隧道提供了唯一的入口。在乌鸦与{@area area 29b|5e7|x}的巫师发生冲突后，他们决定不再进一步探索这些房间。

entries.name: 29a. Gallery
entries: Broken statuary litters this dust-choked gallery. Examination of the stone fragments accompanied by a successful Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check reveals that the statues once depicted drow.

entries.name: 29b. Wraith This Way
entries: 这个房间冷得要命，包含以下内容。
{@b Undead}. 一个（1%）和三个（2%）在房间里出没。他们攻击所有进入的生物。
{@b Corpses}. 在尘土飞扬的地板上，在破碎的家具碎片中，躺着三个死去的乌鸦，他们的身体已经干瘪。
{@b Fireplace}. 一个巨大的壁炉主导着东墙。(它的5英尺宽的烟囱垂直爬升了30英尺，然后戛然而止，很久以前就已经塌陷了）。
{@b Portrait of Halaster}. 歪歪扭扭地挂在壁炉上方的是一幅7英尺高、5英尺宽的有框画像，显示了哈拉斯特的后脑勺：一团白发（见下文 "绘画陷阱"）。
这个裹尸人是很久以前在这个房间里被哈拉斯特瓦解的一个邪恶冒险者的全部遗物。它能说普通话和暗语，但对活人没有什么可说的。
巫师杀死了三个乌鸦（两女一男），并将他们的灵魂变成了幽灵。每具乌鸦尸体都穿着一件链式衬衫，攥着一把短剑，并带着一把带有{@dice 1d20}箭的手弩。

entries.name: Painting Trap
entries: 一个{@spell detect magic}的咒语在画的周围显示出一个亡灵魔法的光环。如果有人把画拉直或以其他方式破坏它，Halaster的形象就会神奇地转过来，露出一张枯萎的骷髅脸，带着恐怖的笑容，任何生物看到它都必须做一个DC15的宪法救赎；如果救赎失败，该生物就会下降到0命中率，并且正在死亡。在露出其可怕的面容后，骷髅脸的Halaster又转过身来，以便再次看到其头发。一旦这个陷阱被触发，这幅画就会变得没有魔力且无害。

entries.name: 29c. Collapsed Tunnel
entries: This tunnel connected to {@area area 23|5c9|x} before earth tremors triggered a collapse. Characters who search the rubble at the end of the tunnel find a mostly buried dwarf skeleton with shiny gauntlets and a rusty warhammer.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 这名矮人是一名冒险家，一百多年前因天花板坍塌而丧生。她的铠甲没有凹痕，也没有腐蚀的痕迹。一个{@spell identify}的法术或类似的魔法显示它们是{@item gauntlets of ogre power}。

entries.name: 30. Natural Cavern
entries: Auvryndar家族在这里驻扎了一支庞大的部队，以防Freth家族的部队从第11层发起攻击。这个洞穴为奥夫林达家族的部队提供了大部分的食物，这对该家族在山下的生存至关重要。
主洞（{@area area 30a|5ed|x}）的北面有一个40英尺高的壁架（{@area area 30b|5ef|x}），有一个秘密楼梯连接它们。

entries.name: 30a. Main Cavern

entries: {@b Roof}. 洞穴的屋顶有80英尺高，上面挂满了滴水的钟乳石。

{@b Monsters}. Patrolling the cavern are four {@creature Drow Elite Warrior||drow elite warriors} (two females named Mizreen Abbath and Shynzal Tlin'orzza, and two males named K'yorl Tanor'thal and Rross Hylarn) mounted on {@creature Giant Lizard||giant lizards}, five giant flying spiders (see below), and eight {@creature Troglodyte||troglodytes} split into two groups of four.
{@b River}. 水从南边涌入，滋养了一条湍急的河流，它向西北方向蜿蜒了几百码，然后坠入地下世界。这条河有5英尺深，但在离开洞穴时加深到10英尺。河岸两边都生长着真菌和苔藓。
{@b Fungi}. 柔软的泥炭质地面产生了一个真菌森林，其中包括40英尺高的zurkhwood蘑菇（以及偶尔的树桩）。
鸦人把他们的蜥蜴坐骑当作珍贵的宠物。这些温顺的爬行动物有马鞍、缰绳、马镫、马鞍袋和蜘蛛爬行特质（见《变种。巨型蜥蜴特质 "的侧边栏，见{@book Monster Manual|MM}附录A)。
The flying spiders are {@creature Giant Spider||giant spiders} that have wings and a flying speed of 40 feet. They zip around the cavern and build web nests in the caps of zurkhwood mushrooms.

The drow cut down zurkhwood when they need to build furniture or rafts, while gardens of barrelstalk and trillimac provide food, water, and parchment (see "{@area Fungi|236|x}" for more information on barrelstalk, trillimac, and zurkhwood).
恶臭的troglodytes在{@area area 30b|5ef|x}中对Gorzil负责。他们穿着胸甲，挥舞着长剑（见"（1%）"）。

entries.name: 30b. High Ledge
entries: 这个壁架比{@area area 30a|5ed|x}的地板高40英尺。一条刻在北墙的楼梯可以爬到（1%）。

Stationed atop the ledge is a {@creature drow mage} named Nhilisstra Argonrae, who commands a force of seven {@creature drow} (two females named Vliss and Yereth, and five males named Chabbris, Dulorrn, Fral, Helxryn, and Tra'zorrl) and six {@creature Troglodyte||troglodytes}, including the troglodyte leader, Gorzil (who has 20 hit points). Gorzil hates Nhilisstra and tries to kill her if he thinks he can get away with it. The troglodytes wear breastplates and wield longswords (see "{@area Gorzil's Gang|55a|x}").
恩希斯特拉负责防守壁架，防止{@creature Muiral|WDMM}的入侵，但如果主洞受到攻击，她也会帮助防守主洞。如果发生这种情况，她会让troglodytes进入近战，而她和乌鸦则在远距离攻击。

entries.name: Aftermath
entries: 如果{@creature Muiral|WDMM}活了下来，而且奥夫林达家族的军队被击溃，他就会把他发现的任何死去的乌鸦和troglodytes的尸体变成动画，然后把这些僵尸和食尸鬼散布到整个关卡。
只要伏龙威夫还活着，奥夫林达家族就会继续在整个地下山获得立足点。Vlonwelv的死则使Auvryndar家族陷入混乱，因为盟友们撤回了他们的支持并与Freth家族结盟。在获得11级之后，弗雷斯家族开始缓慢而稳定地推进到{@creature Muiral|WDMM}的高塔，使{@creature Muiral|WDMM}和来访的冒险者再次与乌鸦发生冲突。

data.name: Level 11: Troglodyte Warrens
entries: Troglodyte Warrens是为四个11级的角色设计的，在这一层击败怪物的角色应该获得足够的XP值来达到12级。这些散发着恶臭的洞穴和粗糙的隧道长期以来一直是troglodytes部落的家园。上下两层的乌鸦的存在使这些岩洞变成了一个战场--也是一个建立不可能的联盟的机会。

entries.name: What Dwells Here?
entries: 蛙人居住在地下山的这一层。他们的统治地位被决心奴役他们的乌鸦、被哈拉斯特的魔法扭曲并渴望获得蛙人肉体的巨魔，以及意图恐吓所有人的魔法强化的贝希尔所争夺。

entries.name: Troglodytes
entries: The troglodytes in {@area area 2|5fb|x} on this level have been captured by drow, and they try to entice adventurers into helping them escape. Meanwhile, the strongest and last remaining free clan of troglodytes defends against encroaching drow in {@area area 7|60a|x}. The troglodytes might reveal secret locations and treasures to adventurers who eliminate their hated enemies.

entries.name: Drow
entries: 来自Auvryndar家族{@adventure level 10|WDMM|10}和Freth家族{@adventure level 12|WDMM|12}的乌鸦正在为控制这一层而互相争斗，同时抓捕troglodytes作为奴隶，并尽力避开beir。

entries.name: Mutated Trolls
entries: 战场上的巨魔已经被{@area area 11|626|x}处的发光的、覆盖着符文的洞穴变异了。洞穴中的魔法催生了具有怪异畸形和魔法特征的巨魔。这些生物只要能找到他们，就会吞噬troglodytes、drow和冒险者。这些巨魔很聪明，可以避开贝希尔。

entries.name: Behir
entries: 这种蛇形怪兽以troglodytes和巨魔为食，控制着它们的数量。哈拉斯特给贝希尔的皮上画上了神秘的符号，它可以激活这些符号来产生强大的魔法效果。
贝赫在整个关卡中游荡，但角色在{@area area 17|63a|x}中第一次遇到它。它的存在可以事先得到暗示，其形式是在隧道的尽头闪过一道蓝色的鳞片。在多个洞穴的天花板上可以看到巨大的、有爪子的脚印，远处不时爆发出闪电和雷鸣声。

entries.name: Exploring This Level
entries: 本层的所有位置描述都以地图11为关键。

entries.name: 1. Auvryndar Watch Post

entries: {@b Ceiling}. 这个洞穴的凹形天花板上升到20英尺的高度。
{@b Sentries}. 一个名叫Ventrid Xil'talan的女性（1%）带领六个（2%）（两个女性和四个男性）。
The drow, loyal to House Auvryndar, are tasked with guarding the tunnel that leads up to {@adventure level 10|WDMM|10}. They ambush and kill any non-drow coming from that direction.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 文特里德佩戴着刻有奥弗林达家族徽章的黑曜石刀疤（25GP）和一个镶嵌着黑珍珠的蜘蛛形水晶戒指（750GP）。

entries.name: 2. Captured Troglodytes
entries: 蛙人猎杀的小动物的碎骨和头骨在通往这个区域的隧道里随处可见，标志着曾经属于他们部族的领土的边界。来自{@adventure levels 10|WDMM|10}和{@adventure 12|WDMM|12}的入侵乌鸦奴役了曾经居住在这里的troglodytes，并不止一次地交换了对这个地区的占领。奥夫林达家族的乌鸦目前控制着这里。

entries.name: 2a. Troglodyte Chain Gang
entries: The air in this cavern is heavy with the stench of twenty-two adult {@creature Troglodyte||troglodytes}. They wear iron shackles on their ankles and are chained together while awaiting relocation to {@creature Muiral|WDMM}'s Gauntlet ({@adventure level 10|WDMM|10}).
被铐住的蛙人的速度减半，而且它不能在离其他蛙人超过5英尺的地方移动。在{@area area 2c|5fe|x}的鸦人法师拥有镣铐的钥匙。一个角色可以通过使用盗贼工具成功地进行DC15灵巧检查来打开一套镣铐上的锁。

Even if they are freed, the troglodytes won't flee this area while the drow are holding their young (see {@area area 2c|5fe|x}). Although initially fearful, the troglodytes engage with the characters in an attempt to turn them against the drow. They promise treasure in exchange for freeing them and their young. Characters who don't speak Troglodyte and don't have access to a {@spell tongues} spell or similar magic can use gestures, pictures, or other crude methods to communicate with the troglodytes on a rudimentary level. Getting a message across in this way requires a successful DC 15 Charisma ({@skill Performance}) check.
如果人物没有表现出援助他们的兴趣，troglodytes就会开始低头并大声吟唱，就像在崇拜人物一样。他们试图吸引{@area area 2c|5fe|x}乌鸦的注意，希望这种表现能激怒乌鸦，促使他们攻击人物。

The troglodytes enter any fight against the drow, under the limitations of their shackles. If they can, they focus their attacks on Tsabdrar Do'ett (see {@area area 2c|5fe|x}), hoping to acquire the key to the shackles. Any freed troglodyte tears into the drow with a vengeance.

If the characters help to liberate the troglodytes and their young from the drow, the troglodytes show the characters the secret door that leads to {@area area 2d|601|x} and allow them to take the treasure that's there. If the characters are unintentional participants in the troglodytes' escape, the troglodytes offer up the treasure only if they are subsequently threatened.

entries.name: 2b. Arch Gate to Level 6
entries: A stone arch is embedded in the west wall of this 10-foot-high cave, just around the corner from the entrance tunnel. The arch is one of Halaster's gates (see "{@area Gates|028|x}"). Carved into the arch's keystone is a hand-shaped indentation with a sigil representing magic scribed into the palm. Its rules are as follows:

items: 施放{@spell mage hand}的咒语，并将它的幽灵手指按在基石的凹陷处，可以打开大门1分钟。

Characters must be 9th level or higher to pass through this gate (see "{@area Jhesiyra Kestellharp|016|x}"). The first creature to pass through the gate triggers an elder rune (see "{@area Elder Runes|027|x}").
A creature that passes through the gate appears in {@area area 40 on level 6|3a8|x}, in the closest unoccupied space next to the identical gate located there.

entries.name: 2c. Amoral Dilemma

entries: {@b Monsters}. 在洞穴的北端，五名男性（1%）正用剑指着11名小蛙人（小型非战斗人员）。一个叫Tsabdrar Do'ett的男性（2%）正在考虑如何处理这些小蛙人。
{@b Crates}. 洞穴的南端摆放着装满铁链和脚镣的半截木箱。
{@b Secret Door}. 岩壁上的缝隙显示出一个秘密的旋转门，上面覆盖着油性的troglodyte分泌物。任何接触到油门的东西都会在1小时内或在洗净物品之前带有轻微的roglodytes的恶臭。这种臭味并不像troglodyte的臭味特性那样强烈，而且对闻到它的人没有任何影响。
鸦人法师正在决定是否要杀死小蛙人，因为他们太小了，不能用手铐铐住。他倾向于这样做，只有人物的干扰能阻止他的行动。萨布瑞尔带着钥匙，可以解开存放在这个房间里的镣铐，以及{@area area 2a|5fc|x}的troglodytes身上的镣铐。

乌鸦人调查{@area area 2a|5fc|x}的任何骚动，并攻击那些似乎在帮助或影响troglodytes的入侵者。如果这些人物没有这样做（或者他们能够通过谈判结束任何最初的敌对行动），乌鸦愿意与他们讨价还价。他们解释说，一只贝伊尔在这一层横冲直撞，杀死了所有它遇到的生物。如果角色们打败了贝伊尔，并且消灭了沿途遇到的弗雷特家族的任何乌鸦，萨布瑞尔承诺奥夫林达家族会让他们保留贝伊尔的囤积物。他还承诺会放过蛙人的孩子。成功通过DC15智慧（{@skill Insight}）检查，可以确认这两个保证都是假的。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 每个乌鸦都戴着一个刻有奥弗林达家族徽章的黑曜石刀疤（25金币）。萨布瑞尔还带着一本薄薄的、皮制的法术书，里面有他准备的法术。

entries.name: 2d. Troglodytes' Trove
entries: 这个洞穴有天然的架子，上面摆放着troglodytes前领导人的头骨。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 地板上堆满了蛙人的财富，一览无余。920金币，一把银色的长剑，以及三个紫水晶球（每个750金币）。

entries.name: 3. Hungry Gnome

entries: {@b Corpses}. 在这个10英尺高的洞穴里，8具乌鸦的尸体像布娃娃一样横七竖八地躺在地上。

{@b Troll in Gnome Form}. A naked, hairless, gray-skinned deep gnome is gnawing on one of the corpses. (The gnome is really a {@creature troll} named Xlorp, transformed by the runes in {@area area 11b|628|x}.)

In its current form, the troll has the statistics of an unarmored (AC 12), chaotic evil {@creature deep gnome (svirfneblin)} that speaks only Giant. Casting a successful {@spell dispel magic} spell (DC 19) on the troll causes it to revert to its normal form. Xlorp also reverts to its normal form when its gnome form is reduced to 0 hit points. It has full hit points in its troll form, but any excess damage from the attack that caused it to revert is carried over to that form.
如果人物给它食物，Xlorp就会跟着他们走。只要它保持快乐和吃饱，它就会与党一起战斗。如果Xlorp受到任何形式的虐待，它就会发狂并攻击所有人。
这些乌鸦是被贝希尔杀死的。检查尸体并成功通过DC10智慧({@skill Medicine})检查的人物会发现，四个乌鸦身上有与雷击一致的烧伤痕迹，三个被大爪子撕成了碎片，一个被压死了（beir的线圈的受害者）。

entries.name: 4. Loathsome Limbs

entries: {@b Rock Formations}. 钟乳石和石笋充满了这个区域。
{@b Warty Limbs}. 六个被砍掉的巨魔肢体（五条胳膊和一条腿）和一个被砍掉的巨魔头颅躺在地板上的黑粘的血泊中。
{@b Bloody Trail}. 天花板上的钟乳石周围蜿蜒着一串大而血腥的爪痕，然后向西南方向退出。

When the characters pass through this area, the limbs twitch as they come to life and attack, as described in the "Variant: Loathsome Limbs" sidebar in the "Troll" entry in the {@book Monster Manual|MM}. Any character who succeeds on a DC 10 Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check can identify the body parts as belonging to three separate trolls, which were torn apart and partially devoured by the behir. The tracks on the ceiling belong to the behir and fade out halfway to {@area area 14|631|x}.

entries.name: 5. Trolling the Troglodytes

entries: {@b Ceiling}. 这个天花板的高度从15到30英尺不等。
{@b Battle}. 一个(1%)正与六个(2%)在洞穴的西北部交战。
{@b Pit}. 洞穴的西南边缘有一个30英尺深的大坑，里面什么都没有。
{@b Secret Door}. 北墙有一扇秘密门，可以在中心轴上旋转。从隧道内可以自动看到这个秘密门。

If the characters watch to see how the battle plays out between the troglodytes and the troll, assume that one troglodyte dies each round, while the troll's hit points do not decrease thanks to its Regeneration trait. If the characters come to the troglodytes' aid, the fearful troglodytes disengage from combat on their next turn, flee through the secret door, and retreat to {@area area 7a|60b|x}, leaving the characters to deal with the troll on their own.

The mutated troll has an extra pair of arms sprouting from its chest and a fifth arm growing out of its back. The troll has made a successful saving throw against the stench of the troglodytes. It has the statistics of a normal {@creature troll}, with these changes:

items: 当人物第一次到达时，它有44点命中率。
它可以在多重攻击动作中额外进行三次爪击。

entries: 在受伤的状态下，巨魔的挑战等级为6（2,300XP）。如果它恢复了所有的命中率，它的挑战等级将变成8（3,900XP）。

entries.name: 6. Piercer Cavern
entries: This cavern is filled with stalactites and stalagmites, and hidden among the stalactites are twenty-six {@creature Piercer||piercers}. A piercer drops onto any creature that ends its turn in the cave, until all the piercers have dropped.
North of the cavern is a 30-foot-deep, yawning pit with nothing in it. Beyond this pit lies {@area area 5|607|x}.

entries.name: 7. Troglodyte Lair
entries: The last free clan of troglodytes inhabits these caves. Its members live in equal fear of the behir, the trolls, and the drow. Adventurers are perceived as just another threat until they prove otherwise. Characters who don't speak Troglodyte and don't have access to a {@spell tongues} spell or similar magic can use gestures, pictures, or other crude methods to communicate with the troglodytes on a rudimentary level. Getting a message across in this way requires a successful DC 15 Charisma ({@skill Performance}) check.

entries.name: 7a. Battle-Ready Troglodytes

entries: {@b Ceiling}. 钟乳石点缀着天花板，从北部的30英尺高到南部的50英尺高。
{@b Floor}. 这个洞穴有一个泥泞的、不平整的地面。
{@b Troglodytes}. 十八只成年{@creature Troglodyte||troglodytes}在散落的石笋后面做掩护。(在这个数字上加上任何从{@area area 5|607|x}逃出或从{@area area 2|5fb|x}逃出的troglodytes。)
{@b Ledge}. 沿着洞穴东侧的石坡上升到一个朝南的长壁架。壁架离洞底有20英尺高，有四条隧道从壁架上打开。一道火红的光芒从隧道中溢出，通向（1%）（详见该区域）。
{@b Secret Door}. 在洞穴的西南角有一扇秘密门，可以在中心轴上旋转。从隧道内可以自动看到这个秘密门。

The troglodytes are bracing for another drow attack from the north. The clan's current leader is a troglodyte with 20 hit points named {@creature Kol'daan|WDMM}. He carries a wooden sparring sword and can replace each of his claw attacks with a sword attack, dealing 4 ({@dice 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage on a hit. Whether in battle or negotiations, {@creature Kol'daan|WDMM} is prone to striking heroic poses with his sparring sword and giving inspiring speeches in Troglodyte.

entries.name: 7b. Battleground
entries: 在这个潮湿的洞穴中，地面上堆满了21个蛙人和9个乌鸦的尸体，周围都是粘稠的血迹，处于不同的腐烂阶段（说明这里发生过不止一次战斗）。蛙人是被乌鸦的武器砍死的，而乌鸦则被蛙人的牙齿和爪子撕成了碎片。一些乌鸦的尸体被吃掉了一半。

entries.name: 7c. Wounded Troglodytes
entries: Four adult {@creature Troglodyte||troglodytes} occupy this side cave. One troglodyte is at full health and guards the other three, which are wounded (each has {@dice 1d6} hit points remaining). If the characters offer magical healing to all the wounded troglodytes and word of the deed gets around, they gain advantage on subsequent Charisma checks made to influence any troglodytes throughout {@area area 7|60a|x}.

entries.name: 7d. Fire Beetle Farm
entries: 一个火热的光芒从这个洞穴里发出。这里住着六个{@creature Giant Fire Beetle||giant fire beetles}，由一个{@creature troglodyte}拿着一根10英尺长的柱子看管着。自从被乌鸦困住后，这个蛙人氏族就开始饲养甲虫作为食物。

entries.name: 7e. Halaster Formation
entries: 几个世纪以来，滴落的沉积物在这个洞穴的后壁上形成了一个类似于{@creature Halaster Blackcloak|WDMM}脸的岩石阵。蛙人在岩层周围留下了一些小祭品，包括半打蝙蝠粪便球、一个鸦人肠子的花环，以及一把带着弯刀的泥质匕首。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 泥泞的匕首是一个{@item dagger of venom}。蛙人没有意识到它的神奇性质。

entries.name: 7f. Troglodyte Nursery
entries: Four adult {@creature Troglodyte||troglodytes} look after twenty-two troglodyte young (Small noncombatants) in this area. Two of the adults stand guard in the front cave; the other two feed and play with the young troglodytes in the rear cave.

entries.name: 7g. Chieftain's Cave
entries: The last troglodyte chieftain was killed by drow some time ago, leaving {@creature Kol'daan|WDMM} in charge. Lurking in the chieftain's cave are three toothless old {@creature Troglodyte||troglodytes}, each with 8 hit points remaining and no bite attack. These evil troglodytes served as the former chieftain's advisors. {@creature Kol'daan|WDMM} thinks they're weak and wants nothing to do with them. They fight only in self-defense, and each has a challenge rating of 1/8 (25 XP).

entries.name: Secret Door
entries: 在这个洞穴的西北墙上有一扇暗门。老蛙人不愿意透露这扇秘密门的位置，他们对任何敢于打开它的人进行辱骂。

entries.name: 7h. Blessed Laogzed
entries: This dank cave contains a 5-foot-tall, 8-foot-diameter mud sculpture of a loathsome creature that combines the features of a demonic toad and a lizard. Any character who has an appropriate background or who succeeds on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Religion}) check knows that the sculpture represents the demon-god Laogzed, worshiped by many troglodytes.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 砸开劳格兹的泥塑，发现了50颗孔雀石宝石（每颗10gp）。

entries.name: 8. Illusory Front Line
entries: The drow of House Freth have learned the hard way that the troglodytes in {@area area 7|60a|x} are too hardy and stubborn to be easily conquered. A male {@creature drow mage} named Orl Telenna has been tasked with holding these caves until reinforcements arrive. Using the resources at his disposal, Orl has created illusions designed to discourage the troglodytes from entering this area. As part of this tactic, he has the {@spell hallucinatory terrain} spell prepared instead of {@spell Evard's black tentacles}, {@spell seeming} instead of {@spell cloudkill}, and {@spell rope trick} instead of {@spell alter self}.

entries.name: 8a. False Impasse
entries: 由于奥尔的{@spell hallucinatory terrain}法术，这个20英尺高的洞穴看起来从墙到墙都充满了一池冒泡的酸。对任何接近这个区域的生物来说，酸液的腐蚀性气味似乎是真实的，但与酸液接触不会造成伤害。这个幻觉可以通过一个成功的（1%）法术（DC14）来消除。奥尔每天都会刷新该咒语。

entries.name: 8b. False Camp
entries: 奥尔在这个布满碎石的洞穴中间一个30英尺见方的区域内建立了一个假营地。这个营地看起来是九个全副武装的乌鸦巫师和战士的安静聚会，他们正在用手语互相交流。事实上，这些乌鸦是用{@spell animate dead}创造出来的九个troglodyte{@creature Zombie||zombies}，并以{@spell seeming}的法术进行伪装。

entries.name: 8c. Orl's Cave

entries: {@b Water}. 淡水从西边的死胡同的裂缝中流入这个洞穴，在大部分地面上形成一个5英尺深的水池。
{@b Encampment}. 在东南面的一个凹槽里建立了一个粗糙的营地。

The alcove holds a blanket, a cask of mushroom wine, and a satchel made of spider silk that contains 10 days of rations and Orl's spellbook (see "Treasure" below). Orl spends most of his time here, but he listens for trouble and slips out every once in a while to check {@area area 8b|619|x}.

奥尔的命令并不包括单枪匹马地与troglodytes或全副武装的冒险家作战。如果他发现有任何生物接近，他就施展一个{@spell rope trick}的法术，爬进法术创造的超维空间，并拉起绳子。他这样躲藏了10分钟，然后探出头来看看入侵者是否已经离开。如果他没有时间以这种方式躲藏，他就对自己施展一个{@spell greater invisibility}的法术，然后撤退到{@area area 9b|620|x}。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Orl's spellbook contains a drow mage's normal spells, plus {@spell animate dead}, {@spell hallucinatory terrain}, {@spell rope trick}, and {@spell seeming}.

entries.name: 9. Contested Caves
entries: 弗雷斯家族的乌鸦对这些洞穴保持着脆弱的控制。他们的防御系统每天都会受到蛙人、巨魔和忠于奥夫林达家族的渗透者的考验。

entries.name: 9a. Hidden Threats

entries: {@b Sentries}. 两名男性（1%）藏在北面的天然岩柱后面。
{@b Eater of Corpses}. 洞穴里到处都是腐烂的尸体（20个troglodytes，9个drow，和5个巨型蜘蛛）。在洞穴的中点，一个被哈拉斯特的魔法永久化{@creature troll}的胖子{@condition invisible}正在享用其中一个蜘蛛的尸体。

The drow, Eilthymmar and Zaztorrl, serve House Freth. They have been watching the {@condition invisible} troll but aren't sure what to make of it. They retreat to {@area area 12|62a|x} (through {@area areas 9b|620|x}, {@area 10a|624}, and {@area 10b|625}) if threatened.

Zaztorrl's loyalty to House Freth is shaky, the result of a series of dull assignments that have left him feeling underappreciated and scornful. If the characters capture or corner him, he offers to lead them to House Freth's fortress on {@adventure level 12|WDMM|12} in exchange for his freedom. If he is treated with respect, Zaztorrl might befriend the characters and help them in battle.
对巨魔成功施展{@spell dispel magic}的法术(DC18)，使其可见1分钟。巨魔会攻击它看到的任何生物，但在它第一次受到酸或火的伤害时，会退到（1%）（通过（2%））。

entries.name: 9b. Drow Staging Area
entries: This 20-foot-high cavern is used as a staging area for House Freth's raids into troglodyte territory. Six {@creature drow} loyal to House Freth (four females and two males) and four {@creature Shadow Demon||shadow demons} lurk here. The drow and their demon allies are planning to soften up the troglodytes in {@area area 7a|60b|x} and are not expecting to face adventurers. If four of the drow fall, the survivors use {@spell darkness} spells to cover their retreat to {@area area 13|630|x}.

entries.name: 9c. Roper Ruse
entries: 乌鸦和troglodytes避开了这个洞穴，因为他们认为这里住着一个roper，但这个生物是Halaster创造的一个幻觉。

能够看到这个黑暗洞穴的人物观察到，最北边的石笋有一只刺眼的眼睛，一张充满獠牙的嘴，以及六根挥舞的卷须。一个{@spell detect magic}的法术显示出石笋周围有一个幻觉魔法的光环，成功通过DC15智力({@skill Investigation})检查，可以确认这个 "罗珀 "是一个无声的幻觉，投在一个原本普通的石笋上。对石笋成功施展{@spell dispel magic}的法术(DC15)可以结束这个幻象，它不会对任何东西进行攻击或反应。任何攻击或效果，只要是针对罗珀的，都会以石笋为目标，而不是针对石笋。石笋有17点攻击力，120点命中率，对毒药和精神伤害有免疫力。看到石笋受到伤害的角色可以重复智力检查（（3%）），以分辨出这是一个幻觉。

entries.name: 9d. Stalagmites
entries: 这个20英尺高的洞穴里有一片石笋林，没有其他东西。

entries.name: 10. Troll Tunnels
entries: 乌鸦经常在这些地区巡逻，总是在寻找潜伏在这里的巨魔。

entries.name: 10a. Sinkhole
entries: This 30-foot-high cave is filled with the echoes of water dripping from stalactites, as well as the fluttering wings of thirteen {@creature Stirge||stirges} that live in a 30-foot-deep sinkhole to the west. The stirges attack anyone that disturbs them.

entries.name: 10b. Main Artery
entries: A mutated {@creature troll} feeds on a dismembered drow corpse in this 10-foot-high passage. The troll is a corpulent specimen covered with green boils. Whenever it takes damage, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 5 or 6, one of the troll's boils bursts open, releasing a {@b {@creature swarm of insects} (wasps)} that fills a random space within 5 feet of the troll. The swarm acts on its own initiative count and attacks the nearest creature that isn't a troll. If the troll is killed, it no longer releases any swarms.

entries.name: 11. Forest of Stone
entries: 这些20英尺高的岩洞里布满了石笋、钟乳石和其他岩层，使这个地区看起来像一片茂密的石林。

entries.name: 11a. Standing Gate to Level 8
entries: 在这些岩层中，有一个由一对10英尺高的石笋组成的立门（见"{@area Gates|028|x}"），石笋被雕刻成巨大的石蛇形象，缠绕着它们。石笋的尖部被锯掉了，上面放着一块门楣石。门楣石上凿有矮人语的 "DON THE CRYSTAL CROWN "字样。这道门的规则如下。

items: The gate opens for 1 minute if a creature wears King Melair's crystal crown ({@area level 6, area 11d|349|x}) while standing within 5 feet of it.

Characters must be 10th level or higher to pass through this gate (see "{@area Jhesiyra Kestellharp|016|x}"). The first creature to pass through the gate triggers an elder rune (see "{@area Elder Runes|027|x}").
穿过大门的生物会出现在{@area area 18b on level 8|472|x}，位于大门旁边最近的未被占用的空间。

entries.name: 11b. Trollwarp Cavern

entries: {@b Stalagmites}. 这个20英尺高的洞穴里有10个被哈拉斯特的魔法扭曲的石笋，所以每个石笋都和疯狂法师有几分相似：一个穿着长袍的老巫师，浑身长满了无盖的眼睛，他的面孔凝固在疯狂的尖叫声中。
{@b Glowing Runes}. 漂浮在每个石笋上方的是一个发光的符文。

A character who succeeds on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check recognizes that the runes floating above the stalagmites represent the school of transmutation. A {@spell detect magic} spell reveals an aura of transmutation magic around each stalagmite. The runes' magic poses no danger to adventurers, but it causes weird, permanent transformations in any troll that lingers in this area. (For example, a troll might sprout an extra head or tentacles, or gain some kind of magical ability or aura.) Casting {@spell dispel magic} on a rune causes it to vanish—and makes the stalagmite below it explode. Each creature within 20 feet of an exploding stalagmite must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@dice 4d10}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

If the characters linger here, a magical gate might open just long enough to expel {@dice 1d4 + 2} {@creature Troll||trolls} and an equal number of chickens. The trolls immediately chase the chickens—or any other visible food source.

entries.name: 12. Drow Battle
entries: 第一次接近这个50英尺高的洞穴的人物会听到前面有战斗的声音。
{@b Demons}. 在洞穴南北两半之间较窄的部分，两个（1%）与一个（2%）战斗。三个恶魔都在发光。
{@b Drow}. 两组对立的乌鸦正在用法术和弩箭互相攻击，无视恶魔的存在。10个乌鸦分散在恶魔的北面。16个乌鸦站在恶魔的南方。
{@b Corpses}. 五十名乌鸦和二十名塔格罗迪人的尸体在战场上散落在恶魔的血池中。他们的装备已经无法挽救了。

The cavern is the site of a heated battle between House Freth (to the north) and House Auvryndar (to the south). House Freth's forces are nine male {@creature drow} led by a male {@creature drow mage} named Spirreth Dalambra. The forces of House Auvryndar are fifteen {@creature drow} (twelve females and three males) led by a female {@creature drow priestess of Lolth} named Shindreer Argonrae.
裂缝是弗雷斯家族的代理人，而赫兹鲁则是奥夫林达家族的仆人。这三个恶魔都被对方的乌鸦施以{@spell faerie fire}的法术而勾勒出轮廓。
站在一个乌鸦家族一边的角色会成为对立家族愤怒的焦点。如果角色站在获胜的家族一边，胜利的乌鸦族首领就会与他们进行对话，了解他们希望得到的回报（见下文）。如果人物最终站在失败的一方，乌鸦就不会对他们手下留情。

If the characters stay out of the fight, the forces on both sides dwindle slowly until the hezrou finally defeats the chasmes. The drow mage, Spirreth, escapes using {@spell greater invisibility}, leaving his forces to die fighting the hezrou. He has expended all his spell slots and must drink a potion (see "Treasure" below) to restore his lost hit points. If he escapes, Spirreth tries to hide and rest in {@area area 13|630|x}. The hezrou has 72 hit points remaining at the end of the fight, and Shindreer has cast none of her spells. She uses her healing magic to return the demon to full health as quickly as possible. House Auvryndar's surviving fighting force consists of six female {@creature drow}, which are healed by Shindreer's {@spell mass cure wounds} spell.

entries.name: Spirreth Dalambra
entries: Spirreth found himself forced to assume command of House Freth's dwindling forces on this level after his superior, Beranica Freth, was killed by demons. Spirreth's job was to protect and serve Beranica. Now he faces the unwelcome task of reporting her death to her older sister, Erelal Freth, on {@adventure level 12|WDMM|12}.

If the characters help Spirreth overcome the forces of House Auvryndar, or if they corner and capture him, he slyly offers to facilitate an audience with Erelal Freth, commander of the House Freth fortress on {@adventure level 12|WDMM|12}. Spirreth declares that Erelal will want to reward them for their heroism or trade for his safe release. But the drow mage's offer is merely a desperate ploy to please his superiors, which characters can ascertain with a successful Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check contested by his Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check. Spirreth is actually hoping to deliver the characters to Erelal Freth, then pass them off as Beranica's murderers.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Spirreth的法术书包含了他所准备的所有法术，加上{@spell crown of madness}、{@spell fear}、{@spell Melf's acid arrow}和{@spell sending}。系在他斗篷上的是一个刻有弗雷斯家族徽章的黑曜石刀疤（25GP）。在他腰带上的一个特殊袋子里，他带着一个装在透明水晶瓶里的（4%）（5GP）。

entries.name: Shindreer Argonrae
entries: 辛德瑞尔是她的小乌鸦家族的强大成员，她将其力量投入到奥弗林达家族的大事业中。然而，她也认为弗隆威夫-奥夫林达是她的死敌，并计划废黜她--从而扭转奥夫林达家族和阿尔贡雷家族之间的效忠关系。
充分意识到她的对手的野心，弗隆韦尔夫命令辛德勒在与弗雷斯家族日益加剧的冲突中上前线。弗隆韦尔夫指望弗雷斯家族为她解决辛德勒，但事实证明辛德勒比弗隆韦尔夫预期的更难杀。
如果人物在{@adventure level 10|WDMM|10}时杀死了弗隆韦尔夫，并且他们与辛德勒分享了这一信息，她就会因为他们剥夺了她的快乐而变得愤怒，并攻击他们。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 辛德瑞尔戴着缝有血石的蜘蛛丝手套（一双750金币）和银质的洛尔思圣物标志（25金币）。在她的鞭子的手柄上有一个黑曜石的刀疤，上面刻着阿贡雷家族的徽章（25GP）。

entries.name: 13. Freth Refuge
entries: 在这个30英尺高的洞穴中，厚厚的网帘被串联在钟乳石和石笋之间。除非它们被砍掉或烧掉，否则这些网会形成一个名副其实的迷宫，使洞穴中的能见度降低到10英尺。它们还捕捉蝙蝠、蜥蜴和海蜇，其中许多还活着，并发出叫声。

At the north end of the cavern, hidden behind a stalagmite, is a cache of supplies left here by drow scouts of House Freth. The supplies include a cask of mushroom wine, 20 days of rations (dry meat and moss) in a satchel made of lizard skin, and a sealed gourd containing 20 applications of {@item drow poison} (see "{@book Poisons|DMG|8|Poisons}" in chapter 8 of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}).

entries.name: 14. Auvryndar Watch Post

entries: {@b Ceiling}. 这个区域的天花板和地板是不均匀的，它们之间的距离从20到40英尺不等。三根天然的岩石柱支撑着屋顶。
{@b Scouts}. 两个女性（1%）（名为阿科拉和达纳费）被安装在靠近洞穴中心的（2%）上。
鸦人一有入侵者就会发动攻击。他们的蜥蜴装有马鞍、缰绳和马镫，并具有蜘蛛爬行的特质（见《变种。{@book Monster Manual|MM}附录A中的 "巨蜥特质 "侧边栏）。乌鸦人把蜥蜴带到墙上，这样他们就可以在人物接近时看得更清楚。
如果人物从这里转向{@area area 12|62a|x}，阿科拉和达纳费尽量先到那里，以警告辛德勒。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 每个乌鸦都佩戴一个刻有奥弗林达家族徽章的黑曜石刀疤（25GP）。

entries.name: 15. Cleared-Out Caves
entries: 蛙人曾经生活在这里，但他们中的大多数都被乌鸦抓走了，或者被贝希尔和巨魔吞噬了。

entries.name: 15a. Filthy Den
entries: 这个20英尺高的洞穴曾经是蛙人的巢穴，到处都是污垢。墙壁上肮脏的油性分泌物是蛙人留在那里的。

entries.name: 15b. Stone Troll
entries: A mutated {@creature troll} is searching through piles of troglodyte filth for edibles. The troll looks normal but has a peculiar trait. At the start of each of its turns, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 1, the troll turns to stone and is {@condition petrified} until the start of its next turn. Casting a {@spell greater restoration} spell on the troll rids it of this magical malady.

entries.name: 15c. Empty Nursery
entries: 蛙人曾经在这里养育他们的孩子，地上散落着害虫的骨头。

entries.name: 16. Arch Gate to Level 7
entries: Embedded in the north wall of this 10-foot-high cave is a stone arch. Carved into its keystone is a picture of a hand clutching a lit torch. The arch is one of Halaster's magic gates (see "{@area Gates|028|x}"). Its rules are as follows:

items: 如果把点燃的火把带入拱门5英尺范围内，大门会打开1分钟。

Characters must be 9th level or higher to pass through this gate (see "{@area Jhesiyra Kestellharp|016|x}"). The first creature to pass through the gate triggers an elder rune (see "{@area Elder Runes|027|x}").
A creature that passes through the gate appears in {@area area 29 on level 7|41c|x}, in the closest unoccupied space next to the identical gate located there.

entries.name: 17. Behir Lair
entries: The floor of the behir's musty lair is covered with broken bones that crunch underfoot. Creatures that walk on the floor have disadvantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to move silently through these caves.
{@b Rock Formations}. 尖锐的石笋和钟乳石填满了这个40英尺高的洞穴，使它看起来像一个有牙齿的大嘴。无害的蝙蝠在钟乳石之间飞舞。
{@b Lightning Flashes}. 如果贝里在{@area area 17c|63e|x}，通往该区域的隧道中会出现零星的蓝白色闪光，并伴有噼啪声。

entries.name: 17b. Crushed Drow
entries: 在这个30英尺高的山洞的北面入口处，一具刚被杀死的男性乌鸦的半截尸体靠在石笋上。这名乌鸦的胸部被贝希尔踩得凹陷下去了。

entries.name: 17c. Behir
entries: The {@creature behir} lies in wait in this 50-foot-high cavern, its muscled, serpentine body woven through the stalagmites. Scars are carved into its hide in the form of arcane runes, placed there by Halaster. The runes grant the behir the ability to use the following legendary actions.

entries.name: Legendary Actions
entries: 贝里尔可以采取三种传奇行动，从下面的选项中选择。它一次只能采取一个传奇行动，而且只能在另一个生物的回合结束时采取。在它的回合开始时，behir会重新获得已使用的传奇行动。它的法术能力是 "魅力"（法术伤害DC13）。
{@b Lesser Magic}. 该人投出（1%）或（2%），不需要任何组件。
{@b Greater Magic (Costs 2 Actions)}. 该人投出（1%）或（2%），不需要任何组件。

entries.name: 17d. Hoard of the Behir
entries: This ledge stands 30 feet above the floor of {@area area 17c|63e|x} and 20 feet below the cavern roof. The behir has fashioned a nest of bones here, decorated with gleaming coins and gems.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: The behir's hoard includes 6,700 gp, 4,100 sp, a gold-and-onyx scorpion brooch (250 gp), a silver music box of elven design (1,000 gp), and a {@item dread helm|XGE}. A common wondrous item, the {@item dread helm|XGE} is a fearsome steel helm that makes its wearer's eyes glow red.

entries.name: Aftermath
entries: Houses Auvryndar and Freth continue to send forces to this level until their strongholds (on {@adventure levels 10|WDMM|10} and {@adventure 12|WDMM|12}, respectively) are destroyed. In addition to drow, adventurers could find themselves facing demons sent by the drow to destroy the behir. Drow that succeed in killing the behir take its treasure back to their stronghold.
如果角色们在这一层消灭了贝希尔，化解了巨魔，并对弗雷特家族和奥夫林达家族造成了致命打击，那么蛙人的力量和数量就会增长。即使troglodytes也被消灭了，新的部族也会从山下的其他地方来到这里。由于缺乏敌人，重新控制了自己以前的巢穴的蛙人变得对所有其他生物充满敌意，不管过去是否有休战协议。

data.name: Level 12: Maze Level
entries: 迷宫关卡是为四个12级的角色设计的，在这一关卡击败怪物的角色应该获得足够的XP，可以在半路上晋级到13级。

entries.name: What Dwells Here?
entries: 本关是弗雷斯家族的乌鸦和牛头人部落之间的战场。牛头人控制着一个充满魔法效果和陷阱的隧道迷宫，而乌鸦则占据着一个名为 "蜘蛛守卫堡 "的优雅堡垒周围的洞穴--这是弗雷斯家族征服整个地下山的目标的中转站。
鸦人和牛头人之间的敌对行动最近有所缓和，因为双方都遭受了毁灭性的损失。鸦人大法师{@creature Drivvin Freth|WDMM}希望利用这一喘息之机为他的家族带来好处，他召唤了一个戈里斯特恶魔，迫使牛头人服从弗雷斯家族的控制。

entries.name: House Freth
